column2: Eiyr-jee da’n ynrickys, shiuish vriwnyn ny hooirey: smooinee-jee er y Chiarn lesh cree mie, as ayns ynrickys cree shir jee huggey.
Son bee eh er ny gheddyn lioroosyn nagh vel dy vrasnaghey eh: as t’eh soilshaghey eh hene dauesyn nagh vel jannoo mee-hreishteil er.
Son ta smooinaghtyn camlaagagh scarrey shin veih Jee: as ta e phooar, tra te er ny vrasnaghey, smaghtaghey ny mee-cheeayllee.
Son ayns annym goanlyssagh cha jean creenaght tannaghtyn; ny cummal ayns y challin ta fo ream peccah.
Son nee yn spyrryd casherick dy ynsaghey chea veih molteyrys, as scughey veih smooinaghtyn neu-hushtagh, as cha nuirree eh raad ta neu-ynrickys cheet stiagh.
Son ta creenaght ny spyrryd graihagh: as cha jean eh seyrey yn mollaghtagh ayns e ghoan; son ta Jee feanish cheu-sthie jeh, as dy baghtal cur-my-ner e chree, as clashtyn e ghoan.
Son ta spyrryd y Chiarn lhieeney yn seihll: as t’eshyn, ta cummal seose dagh nhee, toiggal e choraa.
Shen-y-fa cha vod eshyn ve keillit ta loayrt goan mee chrauee; chamoo nee cooilleeney, tra t’ee kerraghey, shaghney eh.
Son bee briaght jeant ayns coyrleyn yn er mee-chrauee, as nee coraa e ghoan roshtyn gys y Chiarn, dy hoilshaghey e obbraghyn peccoil.
Son ta’n chleaysh eadolagh clashtyn dy chooilley nhee, chamoo ta’n accan trughanagh er ny cheiltyn.
Shen-y-fa faag jee veue tallagh gyn-foaynoo, as smaght-jee nyn jengey veih cooyl-chassid: son cha vel fockle erbee cha follit shen, nagh bee er ny vriwnys; as ta’n beeal breagagh stroie yn annym.
Ny shir-jee baase liorish shaghrynys nyn mea: as ny tayrn-jee erriu hene toyrt-mow lesh obbyr nyn laueyn.
Son cha chroo Jee yn baase: chamoo ta taitnys echey ayns toyrt-mow ny bioee.
Son chroo eshyn dy chooilley nhee dy ve beayn: as va sheelogheyn y theihll slayntoil: as cha vel pyshoon dy varvaanys ayndoo: ny reeriaght y vaaish er yn ooir.
Son ta ynrickys dy bragh beayn.

Agh ren deiney mee-chrauee lesh nyn yannoo, as nyn ghoan [baase] y hayrn orroo hene: son tra smooinee ad dy beagh eh nyn garrey, hie ad naardey, as ren ad conaant rish, toilliu dy ghoaill ayrn mârish.

Son dooyrt ny mee-chrauee, resooney roo hene, agh dy aggairagh, Giare as deinagh ta nyn laghyn, as noi baase dooinney cha vel saase erbee, chamoo ve rieau er ny chlashtyn, dy ren dooinney erbee chyndaa veih’n oaie.

Son she marran haink shin er y theihll: as bee mayd ny yeï shoh myr nagh beagh rieau nyn lheid ayn: son cha vel yn ennal t’ayns nyn stroanynagh myr jaagh, as myr drillin beg ta greesaghey ayns nyn gree:
Cooid, tra te er ny vooghey, bee nyn gallin er ny hyndaa gys leoie, as nee nyn spyrryd lheïe ersooyl myr kiunid yn aer veeley.

As bee eer nyn annym er ny yarrood lurg traa, as cha bee nyn obbraghyn ayns cooinaghtyn ec dooinney erbee, as nee nyn mioys shymley ersooyl myr scheïm dy vodjal, as bee eh er ny skeayley myr kay ta er ny imman roish gollyn ny greïney, as er ny lheïe lesh y chiass echey.
Son cha vel nyn mea agh eer scadoo ta lheïe ersooyl: as lurg nyn maase cha vel chyndaa: son te dy shickyr dooint, myr shen nagh vel dooinney erbee chyndaa reesht.
Tar-jee eisht, lhig dooin nyn soylley ’ghoaill jeh ny nheeghyn mie ta roïn: as lhig dooin dy jeean ymmyd y yannoo jeh ny bannaghtyn shoh myr ayns nyn aegid.
Lhig dooin shin hene y lhieeney lesh feeyn costal as ooilyn miljey, as ny lhig da blaa erbee souree shaghney shin.
Lhig dooin nyn ghing y choamrey lesh roseyn ayns slane blaa.
Ny lhig da fer j’in goll fegooish ayrn jeh nyn rouanys: lhig dooin cowraghyn jeh nyn ghennallys y aagail ayns dy chooilley voayl: son shoh nyn doghyr, as nyn gronney shoh.
Lhig dooin yn kercheen boght shen dy ghooinney cairal y hranlaasey, gyn sparail y ven-treoghe, ny cur arrym da kione lheeah yn chendeeaght.
Lhig da laue-lajerys goaill niart er leigh as cairys: son cha vel fort ec ny annoonee dy hassoo roïn.

Shen-y-fa lhig dooin lhie cooyl-chlea son yn dooinney ynrick; son cha vel eh gys yn ymmyd ain: t’eh soiaghey eh hene noi nyn yannoo, t’eh goltooaney shin lesh brishey yn leigh, as gys nyn nearey coyrt ass nyn lieh shaghrynys nyn ghrogh-ynsaghey.
T’eh goaill er dy vel echey tushtey dy Yee, as t’eh genmys eh hene lhiannoo yn Chiarn.
T’eh soiaghey seose eh hene dy choyrt oghsan da ny smooinaghtyn ain.
T’eh seaghnagh dooin eer dy yeeaghyn er: son cha vel y vea echeysyn casley rish bea gheiney elley, ny e raaidyn myr ny raaidyn ocsyn.
T’eh jeeaghyn orrin myr kialgeyryn, t’eh shaghney myr breinid nyn gliaghtaghyn: t’eh lhiasaghey dy vel jerrey yn sleih cairagh dy ve bannit, as boggyssagh dy vel Jee yn ayr echey.
Lhig dooin fakin vel firrinys ayns e ghoan: as hee mayd cre haghyrys da ec y jerrey.
Son my ta’n dooinney ynrick mac dy Yee, nee eh cooney lesh, as livrey eh veih laue e noidyn.
Lhig dooin eshyn y phrowal lesh goanlys as torchaghey, dy vod mayd fakin e veenid, as prowal e hurranse.
Lhig dooin eh y cherraghey lesh baase scammyltagh: son my sheer da hene bee soiaghey jeant jeh.
She myr shoh smooinee ad, agh v’ad mollit: son ta nyn mee-chraueeaght hene er gholley ad.
Agh son folliaghtyn Yee cha row geill oc daue, chamoo v’ad jeeaghyn son faill yn ynrickys, chamoo va scansh oc jeh leagh son anmeenyn gyn-loght.
Son chroo Jee dooinney dy ve dy bragh beayn, as ren eh cummey eh ayns tuarystal e veaynid hene.
Ny-yeih, trooid goanlys y jouyl haink baase stiagh ’sy theihll: myr t’adsyn gennaghtyn ta fo e reill.
Agh ta anmeenyn y vooinjer chairal ayns laue Yee, as cha jean guinn y vaaish bentyn roo.
Er-lesh ny mee-cheeayllee dy row ad geddyn baase: as dy row ad paartail gys seaghyn.
As nyn immeeaght dy ve slane toyrt-mow: agh t’adsyn ayns shee.
Son ga dy vel ad seaghnit fenish deiney: foast t’ad ayns slane treishteil yn vaynrys veayn.
As lurg nyn seaghyn giare bee ad dy mooar er ny chooilleeney: son ta Jee er phrowal, as er gheddyn ad dy ve feeu jeh hene.
Myr airh ayns y choirrey t’eh er phrowal ad, as er ghoaill roo myr slane oural taitnyssagh.
Agh ayns laa nyn mriwnys nee ad soilshean: as roie noon as noal myr smayllyn mastey’n stubbyl.
Nee ad briwnys ny ashoonyn, as bee oc ream harrish y pobble, as nee yn Chiarn oc reill er son dy bragh.
Nee e hreishteilee toiggal yn ynrickys: as nee adsyn ta firrinagh ayns graih tannaghtyn mârish: son ta grayse as myghin cour e nooghyn, as jeh e chloan reiht t’eh goaill ard-chiarail.
Agh bee ny mee-chrauee er nyn gerraghey ’syn ardalys oc hene, ta er hoiaghey beg jeh deiney mie, as er hreigeil y Chiarn.
Son quoi-erbee ta soiaghey beg jeh creenaght as ynsaghey, t’eh ny vouran: as ta nyn dreishteil ayns fardail, nyn laboraght neu-vessoil, as nyn obbraghyn neu-vondeishagh.
Ta ny mraane oc mee-cheeayllagh, as nyn gloan er drogh-ynsagh.
Ta’n sluight oc fo mollaght: shen-y-fa bannit ta’n ven ghennish, nagh vel er n’yannoo peccah, nagh vel er n’eiyrt er maarderys: bee sluight eck ayns briwnys ny anmeenyn.

As bannit ta’n dooinney gennish nagh vel lesh e laueyn er n’eiyrt da mee-chairys, ny ayns drogh smooinaghtyn noi Jee: son dasyn vees er ny choyrt yn ard-yioot dy chredjue, as cronney ayns chiamble y Chiarn, ny s’ennoil gys e aigney.
Son s’gloyroil ta’n mess dy obbraghyn mie! as cha jean y fraue dy chreenaght dy bragh failleil.
Er son cloan ny maarderee cha bee oc dy yannoo ayns oikyn casherick: as bee sluight yn lhiabbee foalsey er ny astyrt ass ny fraueyn.
Son ga dy vel nyn mea beayn, cha bee veg y scansh soit jeu, as bee ad eer gys nyn shenn eash fegooish ooashley.
As my vees ad giare-heihltagh, t’ad gyn treishteil, as fegooish gerjagh ayns laa ny briwnys.
Son s’atchimagh ta jerrey yn cheeloghe vee-chrauee!
Te ny share dy ve gyn sluight, as grayse ’ve ain: son bee yn imraa jeh shen gys eashyn braa: er-y-fa dy vel eh er ny lowal liorish Jee as dooinney.

Tra te kionfenish ta deiney goaill sampleyr veih: as tra te er n’immeeaght t’ad dy yeearree eh, te ceau attey, as cosney yn varriaght, as laue yn eaghtyr son dy bragh, lurg streeu son leaghyn nagh jed naardey.
Agh cha jean sluight raahoil ny mee-chrauee cheet er-ash, ny fraue dowin y ghoaill veih settyn oainjyragh, ny troggal er undin shickyr.
Son ga dy vel ny banglaneyn oc blaaghey son tammylt; foast, myr nagh vel ad soit dy shickyr bee ad craait lesh y gheay, as trooid niart ny geayee bee ad astrit ass ny fraueyn.
Bee ny banglaneyn faase er nyn mrishey jeh, nyn mess neu-ghooghyssagh, gyn appee son beaghey, neu-chooie son ymmyd erbee.
Son bee cloan oainjyragh nyn veanishyn noi drogh-yannoo nyn ayraghyn as nyn moiraghyn ayns laa ny briwnys.
Son ga dy vel baase leah berraghtyn er yn ynrick; foast bee eh ayns fea.
Son cha vel eash ooasle er ny howse liorish traa liauyr, ny er ny choontey veih mooarane bleeantyn.
Agh ta creenaght ny chione lheeah da deiney, as bea gyn loght myr shenn eash.
Ren eh Jee y wooiys, as ghow Jee taitnys ayn: myr shen veih beaghey mastey peccee ghow Jee eh huggey hene.
Dy jarroo v’eh er ny ghoaill ersooyl dy leah, er-aggle dy jinnagh mee-chraueeaght e hoiggal y chaghlaa, ny molteyrys e annym y violaghey.
Son ta cleayn peccah cur naardey reddyn ta mie ayndoo hene: as ta shaghrynys yeearree neu chooie cleiy fo yn annym ôney.
Jeant ynrick ayns earish yiare chooilleen eh bea liauyr.
Son ren e annym yn Chiarn y wooiys, shen-y-fa ren eh siyr dy ghoaill eh veih mastey ny mee-chrauee.
Honnick y pobble shoh, agh cha row toiggal oc jeh, chamoo smooinee ad ayns nyn aignaghyn, Dy vel grayse as myghin Yee cour e nooghyn, as dy vel eh jannoo slane soiaghey jeh e chloan reiht.
Myr shoh nee yn marroo ynrick deyrey ny mee-chrauee ta foast bio: as nee yn aegid, t’er leeideil bea ghlen, deyrey bleeantyn liauyr as shenn eash ny drogh-yantee.
Son ga t’ad fakin jerrey yn dooinney creeney; cha vel ad toiggal cre ta Jee ayns e choyrle hene er chiarail er e hon, as cre’n-oyr ta’n Chiarn er hoiaghey eh ayns sauchys.
Ver ad my-ner eh, as soiee ad beg jeh: agh bee adsyn ayns faghid ec Jee; as bee ad ny lurg shoh nyn gallinyn eajee, as son oltooan mastey ny merriu er son dy bragh.

Son nee Jee ad y raipey ayns peeshyn; tuittee ad sheese gour nyn mullee, as bee ad nyn-dhost: as nee eh craa ad veih’n undin: as hed ad dy slane bollagh naardey ayns trimshey: as nee’n imraa jeu cherraghtyn.
As tra t’ad cur stiagh coontey nyn beccaghyn, nee ad shen lesh atchim; as nee eer nyn beccaghyn hene gymmyrkey feanish nyn ’oï.
Eisht nee yn dooinney ynrick shassoo ayns dunnallys vooar, cur eddin dauesyn t’er heaghney eh, as nagh ren scansh jeh e yannoo-mie.
Tra nee ad fakin eh, bee ad seaghnit lesh aggle atchimagh, as hed nyn dappey voue ec e haualtys yindyssagh, foddey erskyn ooilley ny v’ad jeeaghyn er y hon.
As adsyn, arryssagh as osnaghey ayns angaish nyn spyrryd, nee gra cheu-sthie jeu hene, Shoh eshyn v’ain keayrt dy row ayns faghid, as son raa dy oltooan.
Yeeagh shinyn, giare-cheeayllagh myr va shin, er y vea echeysyn dy ve ommijys, as ec y jerrey dy ve gyn ooashley.
Agh kys t’eh nish er ny earroo mastey cloan Yee, as e chronney mastey ny nooghyn!
Shen-y-fa ta shinyn er n’gholl er-shaghryn veih raad yn irriney, as cha vel soilshey yn ynrickys er hoilshean orrin, as cha ren grian yn ynrickys girree orrin.
Ren shin deinagh j’in hene ayns raaidyn mee chraueeaght as toyrt-mow: dy jarroo, ta shin er n’gholl trooid faasaghyn neu-chassanagh: agh er son raad y Chiarn cha dug shin geill da.
Cre’n vondeish t’ain liorish nyn mooaralys? ny cre’n cosney t’ain liorish boggyssagh ass nyn merchys?
Ta ooilley ny reddyn shen er n’gholl shaghey myr scadoo, as myr chaghter siyragh er y raad.
As myr lhong ta shiaulley harrish tonnyn ny marrey, tra t’ee er n’gholl shaghey, cha vod y scheïm eck v’er ny chronnaghey, ny cassan y cheuyl eck ayns ny tonnyn;

Ny goll-rish eean ta getlagh trooid yn aer, cha vel cowrey erbee jeh’n raad eck dy ve ry-akin, agh ta’n aer veeley er ny woalley lesh bennalt e skianyn, as er ny scarrey lesh y sheean mooar as yn obbragh oc, myr shen dy vel ee goll trooid, as ny lurg cha vel cowrey erbee ry-akin cre’n raad ren ee goaill.
Ny myr side tra t’ee lhiggit er mark, t’ee scarrey yn aer, ta chelleeragh cheet dy cheilley reesht, myr shen nagh vod dooinney ginsh cre’n raad hie ee ny hrooid:
Eer myr shen shinyn, cha leah’s ruggyr shin, ghow shin toshiaght dy hayrn gys nyn yerrey, gyn cowrey erbee dy vieys; agh goll naardey ayns nyn mee-chraueeaght hene.

Son ta treishteil ny mee-chrauee goll-rish joan sheebit ersooyl lesh y gheay; myr kesh thanney eebrit ersooyl lesh y doirryn; myr yn jaagh t’er ny imman noon as noal lesh y sterrym, as goll shaghey myr cooinaghtyn jeh troailtagh goaill aaght-laa.
Agh ta’n vooinjer ynrick son dy bragh beayn, ta’n leagh oc myrgeddin marish y Chiarn, as ta’n chiarail oc marish yn er smoo syrjey.
Shen-y-fa yiow ad reeriaght gloyroil, as attey aalin veih laue yn Chiarn: son lesh e laue yesh nee eh ad y choodaghey, as lesh e roih nee eh ad y choadey.
Gowee eh da hene e eadolys son slane eilley-caggee, as yn cretoor son wappin dy cherraghey dewil er e noidyn.
Ver eh mysh ynrickys myr eilley-vroghil, as briwnys cairagh son helmet.
Gowee eh casherickys son scape lajer.
E yymmoose yeyre nee eh shlieu son cliwe, as nee yn seihll caggey marish noi ny mee-hushtee.
Eisht hed ny claghyn-taarnee magh er feaï-ny-cruinney lesh aim cairagh, as veih ny bodjallyn, myr veih bow slane tayrnit, nee ad lesh y vark.
As ver eh magh claghyn-sniaghtee myr veih bow-cloaie, as nee ushtaghyn ny marrey freaney nyn ’oï, as nee ny thooillaghyn dy dewil ad y vaih.
Dy jarroo nee geay lajer troggal seose nyn ’oï, as goll-rish doirryn ad y heebey ersooyl: myr shoh ver neu-ynrickys mow yn slane seihll, as ver drogh-ghellal naardey stuill-reeoil ny treanee.
Clasht-jee, er-y-fa shen, O shiuish reeaghyn, as toig-jee; gow-jee ynsagh, shiuish vriwnyn er king ny hooirey.
Eaisht-jee shiuish ta reill y pobble, as ta boggyssagh ayns ymmodee ny ashoonyn.
Son ta pooar currit diu veih’n Chiarn, as reiltys veih’n er-syrjey, eh nee prowal ny obbraghyn eu, as ronsaghey magh ny coyrleyn follit eu.
Er-yn-oyr nagh vel shiuish ta shirveishee yn reeriaght echey, er vriwnys dy cairal; cha vel shiu er vreayll yn leigh, ny er n’immeeaght lurg aigney Yee.
Dy atchimagh as doaltattym hig eh erriu, son briwnys ghewil ver eh orroosyn ta ayns ard-phooar.
Son trooid myghin yiow yn vooinjer imlee pardoon: agh er ny ard-gheiney hig ard-cherraghey.

Son ersyn, ta ny hiarn harrish ooilley, cha bee aggle roish persoon dooinney erbee; chamoo vees eh ayns ammys roish pooar dooinney erbee: son t’eh er chroo beg as mooar, as goaill yn un chiarail jeu ooilley.
Agh bee briaght geyre jeant er ny tranlaasee.
Riuish, er-y-fa shen, O reeaghyn, ta mee loayrt, dy vod shiu creenaght y ynsaghey, as gyn tuittym ersooyl.
Son adsyn ta dy casherick freayll casherickys, bee ad er nyn mriwnys dy casherick: as adsyn t’er leeideil lheid y vea bee ansoor oc ass nyn lieh hene.
Shen-y-fa, soie-jee nyn aigney er my ghoan: yeearree-jee ad, as yiow shiu ynsaghey.
S’gloyroil ta creenaght, nagh vel dy bragh goll naardey! dy jarroo t’ee dy baghtal er ny chronnaghey lioroosyn ta graihagh urree, as er ny gheddyn lioroosyn ta shirrey ny-jeï.
T’ee ro laue roosyn ta dy yeearree ee, soilshaghey ee hene hoshiaght dauesyn.
Eshyn ta dy leah shirrey ee, cha mooar vees e ghoccar, son yiow eh ee ny soie ec e ghorryssyn.
Te ard-chreenaght, er-y-fa shen, dy smooinaghtyn urree, as eshyn ta aggindagh dy chosney ee, bee eh dy leah seyr veih imnea.
Son t’ee goll mygeayrt shirrey lheid as ta feeu j’ee: t’ee soilshaghey ee hene foayroil daue ayns ny raaidyn, as coyrt quaaltys daue ayns dagh smooinaghtyn.
Son t’ee eer goaill toshiaght ayns y yeearree dy ynsagh: as ayns y chiarail dy gheddyn ynsagh ta graih;
As ayns graih, ta freayll e annaghyn: as ayns freayll e annaghyn, ta shickyrys dy veaynid braa;
As ta’n veaynid braa tayrn shin er-gerrey da Jee.
As shoh myr ta’n yeearree dy chreenaght cosney dooin reeriaght.
My ta nyn daitnys, er-y-fa shen, ayns stuill as luirg-reeoil, O shiuish reeaghyn y phobble, cur-jee ooashley da creenaght, dy vod shiu reill son dy bragh.

Er son creenaght, cre t’ee hene, as kys ghow ee toshiaght, insh-ym diu, as cha vreill-ym folliaghtyn veue; agh nee’m briaght ny-jeï veih’n toshiaght, neayr haink ee er-ash, as soilshee-ym diu slane toiggal j’ee, chamoo nee’m yn ynrickys y cheiltyn.
Chamoo hem laue rish yn obbyr shoh lesh troo olkyssagh, son cha vel creenaght sheshey cooie da e lheid.
Agh ta earrooyn dy leih creeney maynrys y theihll; as ta ree creeney barrant y theay.
Gow-jee, er-y-fa shen, ynsagh veih my ghoan, as bee eh son ard foays diu.
Ta mish mee hene myrgeddin my ghooinney marvaanagh, myr ta ooilley sheelnaue, as jeh’n sluight echeysyn, va hoshiaght er ny chroo veih’n ooir.
As ayns breïn my vayrey va mee er my chummey ry jeih meeaghyn, jeant jeh fuill as bree dooinney, ’syn eunys ta cheet lesh cadley.
As cha leah’s ruggyr mee, hayrn mee yn ennal cadjin, as huitt mee er yn ooir co-dooghyssagh, as va my chied choraa, keayney, myr ta dagh unnane elley.
Va mee er my voandyrys ayns aanrityn soïllee, as shen dy keaïn.
Son er aght erbee elley cha row rieau eer ree er ny ruggey.
Son ta ooilley sheelnaue cheet stiagh ’sy theihll, as goll magh co-laik.
Shen-y-fa ghow mee padjer, as va tushtey er ny choyrt dou; ren mee my accan gys Jee, as haink spyrryd dy chreenaght orrym.
Ren mee soiaghey jeeish roish pooar as ooashley reeoil, as son berchys cha ren mee scansh erbee jeh ayns co-soylaghey jeeish.
Chamoo ren mee jewellyn costal y hoylaghey r’ee, er-yn-oyr nagh vel ooilley’n airh ’sy theihll agh myr grine dy gheinnagh, as bee argid coontit myr cray, ayns co-soylaghey jeeish.
Va mee ny s’graihagh urree na er slaynt as aalid, as ghow mee ee son soilshey dou: son cha bee yn soilshey ecksh dy bragh er ny vooghey.
Haink dy chooilley nhee mie hym’s mâree, as berchys erskyn earroo ayns e laue.
As ghow mee boggey ayndoo ooilley, er-yn-oyr dy deiyr ad er creenaght: ga nagh row toiggal aym dy nee ish va’n voir oc ooilley.
Ren mee ish y ynsaghey dy imneagh, as ta mee dy ockley magh ee dy arryltagh: cha vel mee keiltyn yn verchys eck.
Son t’eeish berchys da deiney nagh jean dy bragh failleil: cooid ta tayrn adsyn ta jannoo ymmyd jeu gys caardys rish Jee, ayns ard-ghoo son ny giootyn ta cheet veih ynsagh.

Son ta Jee er choyrt dou yn gioot dy loayrt, myr baillish, as dy smooinaghtyn myr te cooie jeh ny giootyn t’eh er stowal orrym: son dy nee eshyn ta cur lesh shin gys tushtey, as leeideil yn vooinjer chreeney.
Son ayns e laue ta chammah shin hene as nyn ghoan, marish dy chooilley chreenaght as schleï keirdee.
Son t’eh er choyrt dou tushtey cooie jeh ny nheeghyn t’ayn: eer dy hoiggal kys va’n seihll er ny chroo, as bree stoo yn theihll:
Toshiaght, as jerrey, as mean ny traaghyn: caghlaaghyn, as chyndaaghyn ny greïney, as imbaghyn ny bleeaney:
Coorse ny bleeantyn, as order ny rollageyn:
Dooghys dagh cretoor bio, as eulys ny beishtyn oaldey, niart ny geayee, as resoon deiney; dy chooilley cheint dy lossreeyn, as bree ny fraueyn oc:
As jeh dy chooilley nhee ta edyr keillit, ny cronnal, ta aym toiggal.

Son ren creenaght, yn ard-obbree ayns dy chooilley nhee, mish y ynsaghey: son aynjeeish ta spyrryd dy hoiggal, casherick, ynrycan, ymmodee-filley, breeoil, bioal, gloyroil, glen, cronnal, seyr veih assee, graihagh er mieys, tappee, nagh vod v’er ny lhiettal, arryltagh dy yannoo mie,
Dooie da dooinney, niartal, shickyr, gyn imnea, ooilley-pooaral, ooilley-reiltagh, as goll trooid dagh spyrryd glen, as smoo flaunyssagh.
Son ta creenaght ny s’bioyr na dy chooilley vioyrid: t’ee ayns as trooid dy chooilley nhee, liorish e dooghys spyrrydoil.
Son she ish ennal pooaral Yee, as bree slane glen, geill veih gloyr yn Ooilley-niartal, myr shen nagh vod nhee erbee neu-ghlen lhiantyn r’ee.
Son t’eeish sollyssid y toilshey dy bragh farraghtyn, skell aalin jeh pooar Yee, as eer co-chaslys e vieys.

As myr t’ee ynrycan, t’ee ooilley-pooaral, as tannaghtyn aynjee hene, t’ee aa-chroo dy chooilley nhee: as ayns dy chooilley eash cummal ayns anmeenyn casherick, t’ee jannoo ad nyn gaarjyn dy Yee as phadeyryn.
Son shynney lesh Jee eshyn ny-lomarcan ta beaghey marish creenaght.
Son t’ee ny s’aalin na’n ghrian, as erskyn ooilley order ny rollageyn, as ny sollys na’n soilshey hene, tra t’ad er nyn soylaghey ry-cheilley.
Agh lurg ooilley shoh ta’n oie cheet: agh cha vow mee-chraueeaght yn varriaght er creenaght.
Ta creenaght dy breeoil roshtyn harrish ooilley yn seihll; as dy keaïn gordrail dy chooilley nhee.
Veih m’aegid va sooill ghraihagh aym urree, va mee aggindagh dy ve nasht r’ee, as va mee ayns graih rish e aalid.
Ta’n ainjys t’ecksh rish Jee soiaghey magh yn ooashley eck; dy jarroo va eer Chiarn dy chooilley nhee eh hene graihagh urree.
Son ee hene ta gynsaghey ny folliaghtyn jeh tushtey Yee, as shynney lh’ee e obbraghyn.
My ta berchys eiraght dy ve er ny yeearree ’sy vea shoh, cre ta ny s’berchagh na creenaght ta roshtyn er dy chooilley nhee?
As my ta tushtey gobbraghey, c’raad ta obbree s’aghtal ry-gheddyn?
As my ta dooinney graihagh er yn ynrickys, t’ee gymmyrkey mienyn: son t’ee gynsaghey

My ta dooinney geearree mooarane tushtey, t’eeish ainjyssagh ayns shenn chooishyn, as slane toiggalagh ayns ny ta ry-heet: t’ee tushtagh ayns feyshtyn follit, as dy choyrt bun er raaghyn-dorraghey: t’ee fakin ro-laue cowraghyn, as yindyssyn, as taghyrtyn keillit ayns imbaghyn as traaghyn.
Shen-y-fa, chiare mee dy ghoaill ee hym pene, dy veaghey mârym, toiggal dy beagh ee my choyrleyder mie, as my gherjagh ayns deinys as seaghyn.
Er y ghraih ecksh beem’s ayns goo-mie ec y theay, as ayns ooashley ec y chanstyr my s’aeg mee.
Bee’m er my gheddyn jeh tushtey geyre ayns briwnys, as bee’m ayns ard-ghoo mastey deiney ooasle.
Tra ta mee my-host, nee adsyn farkiaght; as tra ta mee loayrt, ver ad geill vie dou: as my ta mee foddey loayrt, ver ad nyn laue er nyn meeal.
Myrgeddin, liorish creenaght cosne-ym yn vea dy bragh farraghtyn; as faag-ym imraa foddey beayn dauesyn hig my-yeï.
Nee’m reill harrish y pobble, as bee ny ashoonyn fo my ammys.
Bee tranlaasee dewilley as ad atchimagh tra chlinnys ad jee’m: jeeaghee sleih orrym myr dooinney mie as dunnal ayns caggey.
Bee’m eunyssagh mâree ayns my hie: son ’sy cheshaght ecksh cha vel anvea, as ayns beaghey mâree cha vel veg y trimshey, agh boggey as gennallys.
Nish tra smooinee mee dy dowin er ny reddyn shoh rhym pene, as dy ghow mee ad gys my chree: dy vel creenaght as y vea dy bragh farraghtyn ayns caardys ry-cheilley,

As s’mooar y voggey te dy ve ayns aigney-mie r’ee, son ayns obbyr ny laueyn ecksh ta berchys erskyn-earroo, as tushtey ayns cliaghtey yn cheshaght eck, as goo-mie ayns taggloo r’ee; shen-y-fa va mee aggindagh dy chosney ee.
Son va mee my lhiannoo keeayllagh, as jeh spyrryd mie.
Er-nonney, myr va mee mie haink mee stiagh ayns corp gyn-loght.

Ny-yeih, tra hug mee tastey, nagh voddin ee y chosney, mannagh jebbagh Jee dou ee (as va shen hene ayrn dy chreenaght dy hoiggal quoi dy gioot v’ee) ghow mee padjer gys y Chiarn, as ren mee m’accan huggey, as ayns jeeanid cree dooyrt mee,
O Yee m’ayraghyn, as Hiarn dy vyghin, t’er chroo dagh nhee liorish dty ghoo,
As trooid dty chreenaght t’er n’oardaghey da dooinney, dy beagh reill echey harrish ny cretooryn t’ou er chroo,
As yn seihll y ordrail cordail rish cairys as kiartys, as briwnys y chooilleeney lesh cree ynrick:
Cur dooys yn chreenaght ta ny hoie liorish dty stoyl-reeoil, as ny jean m’y yiooldey veih mastey dty chloan.
Son ta mish dty harvaant, as mac dty inney-veyl, my ghooinney faase, as giare-heihltagh, as ro-aeg dy hoiggal briwnys as leighyn.
Son lhig da dooinney ve cha ynrick as saillish mastey cloan gheiney, ny-yeih mannagh vel dty chreenaght mârish, cha bee soiaghey jeant jeh.
T’ou er my reih dy ve my ree harrish dty phobble, as dy ve my vriw er dty vec as dty inneenyn.
T’ou er my harey dy hroggal chiamble er dty chronk casherick, as altar ayns ard-valley dty chummal, co-soylaghey yn chabbane-agglish casherick t’ou er chummey veih’n toshiaght.
As va creenaght mayrt ta toiggal dty obbraghyn, as v’ee kionfenish tra ren oo yn seihll y chroo, as bione jee cre va mie ayns dty hilley, as jeeragh ayns dty annaghyn.
O cur neose ee veih dty niaughyn casherick, as veih stoyl-reeoil dty ghloyr, dy vod ee goll mârym ayns my obbraghyn, as cur orrym toiggal cre ta taitnyssagh hoods.
Son ta fys as toiggal eck ayns dy chooilley nhee, as nee ee mish y leeideil dy sheelt ayns my yannoo, as mee y choadey liorish e pooar.
Myr shen bee my obbraghyn booisal gys Jee, as eisht nee’m yn pobble y vriwnys dy cairal, as bee’m feeu dy hoie er stoyl my ayrey.
Son quoi yn dooinney oddys toiggal coyrleyn Yee? ny quoi echey ta fys cre ta aigney yn Chiarn?
Son s’fardalee ta smooinaghtyn deiney marvaanagh, as s’neu-hickyr ta nyn saaseyn!
Son ta’n corp marvaanagh laadey sheese yn annym, as ta’n cabbane-thallooinagh ny errey da’n aigney ta smooinaghtyn er ymmodee cooishyn.
As s’coan ta shin briwnys dy cairal mychione nheeghyn thallooinagh, as dy deinagh ta shin geddyn baght jeh ny reddyn ta kiongoyrt rooin: agh jeh ny nheeghyn flaunyssagh quoi ec ta slane toiggal?
As dty choyrle quoi t’er doiggal, mannagh der oo creenaght da, as dty spyrryd casherick y choyrt veih’n yrjid?
Shoh myr va raaidyn cummaltee yn thallooin er nyn lhiasaghey, as va deiney ynsit ayns ny reddyn va lurg dt’aigney’s, as v’ad er nyn sauail liorish creenaght.
Ren ee chied ayr y theihll y hauail, va ynrycan er ny chroo; as eh y hroggal veih e lhieggey.
As hug ee da yn reill harrish dy chooilley nhee.
Agh tra va’n
Tra va’n seihll, er yn oyr shoh, er ny vaih lesh y thooilley, ren creenaght yn seihll y hauail, as ren ee stiurey coorse yn
Myrgeddin, erreish da’n Chiarn v’er choyrt shaghrynys er glare ny ashoonyn peccoil, hooar ee magh yn
Tra ren ny mee-chrauee cherraghtyn, livrey ee yn

Jeh’n vee-chraueeaght oc, eer gys y laa t’ayn jiu, ta’n thalloo traartagh foast ayns jaagh, ny phrowal; myr ta myrgeddin ny biljyn nagh vel dy bragh gymmyrkey messyn appee. As ta’n pillar dy hollan foast ny hassoo son cowrey kinjagh jeh

Son myr nagh dug ad geill da creenaght, cha dooar ad ynrycan yn assee shoh, nagh row toiggal oc jeh shen ny va mie; agh myrgeddin daag ad nyn-yei ’sy theihll imraa jeh nyn ommijys: myr shen nagh voddagh nyn voiljyn v’er ny cheiltyn.
Agh ren creenaght livrey veih toyrt-mow adsyn va ’syn ammys eck.
As tra roie yn
Noi saynt e hranlaasee, hass ee liorish, as ren ee magh eh lesh berchys.
Ren ee eh y choadey veih e noidyn, as livrey eh vouesyn va lhie ayns farkiaght er e hon, as ayns gleck gastey hug ee dasyn yn varriaght; dy chur toiggal da dy vel craueeaght ny s’troshey na ooilley.
Tra va’n

As cha daag ee eh ayns geulaghyn, derrey hug ee da lorg-reill yn reeriaght, as pooar harrish e hranlaasee: as son ny feanishyn foalsey, ren ee soilshaghey ad dy ve nyn mreagyryn, agh choamyr ee eshyn lesh ooashley beayn.
Livrey ee yn pobble ynrick, as yn sluight ooasle veih’n ashoon tranlaasagh.
Ghow ee aaght ayns annym
Cooilleeney da’n vooinjer ynrick leagh nyn laboraght; leeideil ad trooid raad yindyssagh; as v’eeish dauesyn son coodaghey ’sy laa, as soilshey rollageagh ayns imbagh ny hoie,
Hug ee lh’ee ad trooid yn aarkey jiarg, as dy sauchey trooid ushtaghyn dowiney.
Agh ren ee ny noidyn oc y vaih, as hilg ee seose ad veih diunid ny marrey.
Shoh myr ren y chloan ynrick spooilley ny mee-chrauee, as hug ad moylley da dty ennym casherick, O Hiarn, as ard-voylley lesh un aigney gys dty laue v’er chaggey ass nyn lieh.
Son ren creenaght beeal ny balloo y osley, as hug ee er y chengey voandagh, nagh voddagh loayrt, dy ve floaoil ayns glare.
Hug ee aïgh vie da ny obbraghyn oc ayns laue yn adeyr casherick.
Jimmee ad trooid yn aasagh follym-faase, as hoie ad nyn gabbaneyn ayns ynnydyn neu-chassanagh.
Hug ad eddin da nyn noidyn, as ghow ad cooilleeney er nyn dranlaasee.
Tra v’ad feme ushtey deïe ad ort’s, as va ushtey er ny hirveish orroo ass y chreg chloaie, as chuir ad nyn baays ass y chreg chreoi.
Son shen ny va kerraghey da nyn noidyn ve dauesyn son ooraghey ayns nyn veme.
Son ayns ynnyd ushtey as awinyn roie lesh fuill,
Myr oghsan cronnal da’n sarey dy stroie ny oikanyn, hug oo daue nyn saie dy ushtey liorish saaseyn erskyn nyn yercal.
Soilshaghey liorish y phaays shen, kys v’ou er cherraghey nyn noidyn.
Son tra v’ad er ny phrowal, ga ayns myghin er nyn gerraghey, hoig ad kys va ny mee-chrauee er nyn mriwnys ayns jymmoose, as er nyn dorchaghey lesh paays foddey s’dewil na va’n chloan chairal.
Son ad shoh ren oo y vreagey, as dellal roo myr ayr: agh y vooinjer elley, myr ree dewil, ren oo deyrey as kerraghey.
Edyr ad ve mooie ny sthie v’ad seaghnit co-laik.
Son haink trimshey dooble orroo, as osnaghyn tromey ayns cooinaghtyn jeh ny v’ad er hurranse.
Son tra cheayll ad, liorish yn cherraghey oc hene, dy row yn vooinjer elley er nyn mannaghey, dennee ad dy nee laue yn Chiarn va shoh.
Son eshyn va oc ayns faghid tra v’eh foddey roïe faagit magh dy ve stroit, marish ny oikanyn elley, jeh shoh fy-yerrey ghow ad yindys mooar, tra honnick ad cre haink gy-kione.
Agh son saaseyn ommijagh nyn mee-chraueeaght, ayns dy row ad cleaynit dy ooashlaghey ard-nieughyn as beishtyn eajee, lhig oo feayshlit orroo earroo mooar dy chretooryn dewilley son kerraghey.
Dy chur toiggal daue dy bee dooinney er ny cherraghey lesh ny peccaghyn t’eh hene er n’yannoo.
Son cha row dty laue ooilley-niartal, ren y seihll y chroo jeh stoo gyn cummey, laccal pooar dy choyrt ny mast’ oc earroo dy vucyn-awin as dy lionyn dewil,
Ny beishtyn oaldey joarree, lane dy eulys, noa crooit, sheidey magh ennal aileagh, skeayley mygeayrt torcan breinn dy yaagh, ny lhiggey magh loandernee atchimagh veih nyn sooillyn:
Cha nee ynrycan lesh nyn mree pyshoonagh dy varroo ad jeeragh; agh myrgeddin dy stroie ad lesh nyn shilley eajee atchimagh.

As dy jarroo fegooish veg jeu shoh oddagh ad v’er duittym sheese ec un vlast, seaghnit lesh kerraghey, as skeaylt dy lhean liorish ennal dty phooar: agh t’ou er n’ordrail dagh nhee ayns towse, as earroo, as corrymid.
Son foddee oo ec dy chooilley hraa dty phooar niartal y hoilshaghey, myr sailt; agh quoi oddys shassoo noi niart dty roih?
Son cha vel y slane seihll kiongoyrt rhyt, agh myr eer grine gennee ayns ny meihaghyn, as eer myr bine jeh druight y voghrey, ta tuittym er yn ooir.
Son ta dty vyghin’s roshtyn er ooilley; t’ou ooilley-pooaral, as chymmoil gys peccaghyn deiney, ad dy lhiasaghey nyn mea.
Son ta graih ayd’s er dy chooilley nhee, as cha vel dwoaie ayd’s er nhee erbee dy vel oo er n’yannoo, son cha beagh oo dy bragh er chroo ad as dwoaie er ny ve ayd orroo.
As kys oddagh nhee erbee v’er hannaghtyn, agh lurg dty aigney? ny ve er-mayrn, agh fo dty ard-chiarail?
Agh t’ou uss gymmyrkey lesh ooilley, son t’ad lhiat hene, O Hiarn, oo ta graihagh er anmeenyn.
Agh ta dty spyrryd dy bragh farraghtyn reill ayns dy chooilley nhee.

Shen-y-fa ren oo ad y smaghtaghey ny veggan as ny veggan er son nyn voiljyn; as hug oo raaue daue, liorish soiaghey kiongoyrt roo nyn beccaghyn, dy voddagh ad treigeil nyn ghrogh-yannoo, as credjal aynyd’s, O Hiarn.
Son dty aigney’s ve dy stroie, liorish laueyn nyn shenn-ayryn, chammah
Daue hug oo dwoaie er coontey ny obbraghyn feohdagh dy obbeeys, as ourallyn peccoil;
As myrgeddin dunveryn dewil nyn gloan, va stroie feill gheiney, as rouanys ayns cuirraghyn folley.
Marish nyn saggyrtyn mastey nyn sheshaghtyn jalloonagh, as ny ayraghyn lesh nyn laueyn hene dunverys anmeenyn gyn-cooney:
Dy voddagh yn cheer smoo by-haittin lhiat geddyn cummaltee ooasle dy chloan Yee.
Ny-yeih dymmyrk oo lhieu shoh hene myr lesh deiney, as hug oo shellanyn-nieunagh roish dty heshaght-chaggee atchimagh, dy stroie ad ny veggan as ny veggan.
Cha nee son nagh row fort ayd dy choyrt yn varriaght da’n chloan ynrick harrish ny mee-chrauee, ny dy stroie ad dy cheilley liorish beishtyn feïe, ny lesh un ockle jymmoosagh:

Agh cooilleeney dty vriwnyssyn orroo ny veggan as ny veggan, hug oo daue traa son arrys: son va fys ayd’s dy nee drogh-heeloghe v’ad, dy row nyn ghoanlys ruggit ayndoo, as nagh beagh nyn smooinaghtyn peccoil dy bragh er ny chaghlaa.
Son v’ad nyn sluight chustey veih’n toshiaght, chamoo ren oo, trooid aggle roish dooinney erbee, lhiggey lhieu son nyn beccaghyn.

Son quoi ghoys er dy ghra, Cre t’ou er n’yannoo? ny quoi oddys shassoo noi dty vriwnys? ny quoi oddys foill y gheddyn dhyt son stroie ny ashoonyn, ad t’ou hene er chroo? ny quoi hassys magh dt’oï, dy ghoaill cooilleeney son ny peccee?
Chamoo ta ayn Jee erbee elley cheu-mooie jeed hene, echey ta kiarail son ooilley, da oddagh oo soilshaghey nagh vel dty vriwnys neu-yeeragh.
Chamoo oddys ree ny tranlaasagh erbee cur eddin dhyt er coontey unnane erbee t’ou er cherraghey.
Son wheesh eisht as dy vel oo hene cairagh, t’ou gordrail dagh nhee dy cairal: jeeaghyn er myr neu-chooie ayns dty phooar dy gheyrey eshyn nagh vel er hoilchin kerraghey.
Son ta dty phooar goaill toshiaght ayns cairys, as myr t’ou dty Hiarn harrish ooilley, te coyrt ort ve graysoil da ooilley.
Son tra nagh jean deiney credjal dy vel uss jeh slane pooar, t’ou eisht soilshaghey magh dty niart; as dauesyn ta goaill-rish t’ou jeeaghyn daanys y vooinjer elley.
Agh t’ou uss, meiyghey dty phooar, briwnys ayns cairys, as reill harrin lesh slane foayr; son foddee oo ymmyd y yannoo jeh dty phooar hene, myr sailt.
As lheid ny obbraghyn shoh t’ou er n’ynsaghey dty phobble, dy lhisagh yn dooinney cairal ve chymmoil: as t’ou er lhieeney dty chloan lesh treishteil vie, dy jean oo soiaghey jeh arrys nyn beccaghyn.
Son my ghow wheesh dy hraa ayns kerraghey noidyn dty phobble hene, as adsyn va toilliu baase, chebbal daue caa as ynnyd dy v’er ny livrey veih nyn olkys;
Cre cha meeley v’ou ayns briwnys dty chloan hene, da ny ayraghyn oc v’ou er loo, as er n’yannoo conaant dy yialdynyn mie.

Shen-y-fa ga dy vel oo smaghtaghey shinyn, t’ou coyrt kerraghey erskyn-towse smoo er nyn noidyn, dy vod mayd, tra ta shin briwnys, dy imneagh smooinaghtyn er dty vieys: as tra ta shin er nyn mriwnys dy yeeaghyn son myghin.
Er shoh, tra va deiney er cheau nyn draa ayns rouanys as mee-chairys, ren oo ad y smaghtaghey lesh ny peccaghyn feodagh oc hene.
Son hie ad foddey ass y raad ayns shaghrynys, as ghow ad son jeeghyn eer ny beishtyn feodagh shen va dwoaiagh da nyn noidyn, son v’ad fo molteyrys myr cloan fegooish tushtey.
Shen-y-fa, orroosyn myr er cloan vee-cheeayllagh hug oo magh briwnys ayns faghid.
Agh adsyn nagh beagh tayrnit gys mieys lesh lheid y smaghtaghey meein shoh, ennee ad briwnys cooie veih Jee hene.
Cur-my-ner, son ny reddyn shen v’ad jymmoosagh fo kerraghey; ta shen er y ghraih ocsyn smooinee ad dy ve jeeghyn; (nish) dy row ad kerrit mâroo shoh, tra honnick ad eh, ghow ad

S’fardalagh shickyr, t’adsyn ooilley liorish dooghys, ta mee-hushtagh dy Yee, as nagh voddagh, veih ny nheeghyn mie ta ry-akin, goaill baght jehsyn ta ayn; chamoo, goaill tastey jeh ny obbraghyn, ren ad goaill-rish pooar yn ard-obbree hene.
Agh smooinee ad dy row edyr yn aile, yn gheay, ny’n aer eddrym, ny coorse ny rollageyn, ny ny ushtaghyn freanagh, ny ny soilshaghyn flaunyssagh dy ve jeeghyn reiltee yn theihll.

Agh my v’ad wheesh shen cleaynit dy ghoaill taitnys ayns aalid ny reddyn shoh, as dy ghoaill ad son jeeghyn; lhig daue toiggal cre-woad s’aalin erskyn-earroo ta’n Chiarn oc ooilley: son she eer bun dy chooilley aalid t’er chroo ad.
As my v’ad lhieent lesh yindys ec y phooar as y vree oc, lhig daue toiggal lioroosyn cre-woad s’pooaral t’eshyn ren ad y chroo.
Son cordail rish mooadys as aalid ny cretooryn ta’n fer-croo oc er ny akin.
Foast ayns shoh hene cha vel yn foill oc mooar, son shirrey lurg Jee, as aggindagh dy gheddyn eh, hoiggal dy row ad fo marranys.
Son ainjyssagh er e obbraghyn, t’ad briaght dy imneagh er e hon, as credjal myr t’ad fakin: er-y-fa dy vel e aalid hene ayns dy chooilley nhee ta er ny akin.
Chamoo foast ta’n leshtal oc dy ve goit.
Son my va wheesh shen dy hushtey oc as dy choyrt cheb er order y theihll, kys nagh row ny sleaie toiggal oc jeh Chiarn y theihll ooilley?

S’treih t’ad! son ayns reddyn gyn-vioys ta nyn dreishteil; t’ad genmys adsyn jeeghyn ta obbyr laueyn deiney, airh as argid cummit dy schleïoil, as co-chaslys dy chretooryn, ny red gyn-foaynoo dy chlagh, obbyr shenn laue aghtal.

Nish tra ta’n feyir ta lhieggal billey, as er fawal yn fuygh gys yn ymmyd cooie, dy glen er n’ghoaill jeh ooilley yn roost, as er n’obbraghey eh dy stoamey, as er n’yannoo saagh jeh son ymmyd ghooinney;
As lurg da v’er lostey ny spollagyn ayns gaarlaghey e vee, as dy vel eh jeant magh;
As goaill unnane jeh ny peeshyn gyn-ymmyd (dy jarroo ceab cam-chrontagh) as er ghrainney eh dy kiarailagh ec e chaa, er chummey shen dy aghtal, as er chiaddey eh ayns co-chaslys dooinney;
Ny, er n’yannoo eh lurg caslys beisht eajee ennagh, layal harrish eh lesh vermilion as paint, daahghey jiarg eh, as coodaghey dy chooilley chron t’ayn;
As er n’yannoo room jesh er y hon, t’eh dy hoiaghey eh ’sy voalley, jannoo shickyr jeh lesh holtyn yiarn:
Son ghow eh kiarail er y hon nagh duittagh eh; toiggal dy row eh red gyn lheihll, (son cha vel eh agh jalloo, as eh hene feme cooney).
Eisht t’eh goaill padjer gys y jalloo shoh ass lieh e chooid, e ven, as e chloan: as cha vel nearey er dy ghuee gys red gyn-vioys.

Son slaynt, t’eh geamagh huggeysyn ta faase: son bioys, t’eh guee gys red gyn-vioys: son cooney, t’eh jannoo accan imlee gys y red sloo cooney t’ayn: as son jurnah mie t’eh jannoo padjer gys red nagh vod cass y ghleashagh:
As son cooid as cosney, as son aïgh vie er e laueyn t’eh geearree cooney ersyn sloo fort t’ayn dy yannoo nhee erbee.
Reesht, my ta dooinney mysh shiaulley, as kiarit dy gholl harrish tonnyn freanagh yn aarkey t’eh geamagh gys y jalloo (fuygh) ta ny s’loau na’n lhong t’eh ry-hoi shiaulley aynjee.
Son s’feer eh dy nee saynt cosney hooar magh shen, as hug yn obbree schleïoil er dy hroggal eh.
Agh she dty ard-chiarail’s, O ayr, ta dy reill harrishjee; t’ou er n’yannoo raad rhymbee ’syn aarkey, as cassan sauchey trooid ny tonnyn.
Soilshaghey dy vod oo sauail veih dagh gaue, ga dy ragh dooinney neu-schleïoil er shiaulley.

Ny-yeih cha bailts dy beagh obbraghyn dty chreenaght nyn-daaue, as shen yn oyr dy vel deiney treishteil nyn mioys ayns saagh fuygh fardalagh, as dy sauchey goll harrish yn cheayn freanagh ayns lhong faase brishlagh.
Son ’sy chenn earish myrgeddin, tra ren ny tranlaasee mooaralagh cherraghtyn, ren
Son bannit va’n (arg) fuygh, lioree va ynrickys er ny choadey.
Agh cursit ta’n jalloo ta jeant lesh laueyn, chammah yn jalloo hene, as eshyn ta dy chummey eh: yn obbree hene, er-yn-oyr dy ren eh lheid y red; as yn jalloo, son dy vel red marvaanagh enmyssit Jee.
Son ta chammah yn dooinney mee-chrauee, as e vee-chraueeaght dwoaiagh da Jee.
Son bee chammah yn jalloo grainnit as e ghrainneyder er nyn gerraghey dy cheilley.

Shen-y-fa eer er jallooyn ny ashoonee vees kerraghey er ny ghoaill: er-yn-oyr, ayns cummey cretooryn Yee haink ad dy ve feohdagh, as oyr peccah da anmeenyn deiney, as ribbey ayns raaidyn ny mee-hushtee.
Son jalloonys va toshiaght maarderys spyrrydoil, as moir bea pheccoil.
Son cha row ad veih’n toshiaght, chamoo vees ad gys y jerrey.
Son veih gloyr fardalagh deiney ghow ad toshiaght ’sy theihll, as shen-y-fa bee ad dy gerrit ec kione.

Son ayr seaghnit lesh dobberan leah, as jannoo co-chaslys e lhiannoo t’er n’immeeaght roish e hraa; t’eh nish dy ooashlaghey eshyn myr jee, nagh row eisht agh corp marroo, as doardee eh da e hirveishee dy reayll cooinaghtyn jeh liorish cliaghtaghyn as shirveish faase-chredjueagh.
Myr shoh lurg traa ghow cliaghtey peccoil lheid y raad dy row eh freilt myr leigh, as va jallooyn grainnit er nyn ooashlaghey liorish sarey reeaghyn.

As myr nagh voddagh sleih va cummal foddey jeh ooashley kionfenish y choyrt da, ghow ad co-chaslys scaanagh jeh, as ren ad jalloo coamrit er dy chooilley aght myr ree, as da shoh hug ad ooashley, liorish yn cowrey shoh jeh nyn aigney-mie dy wooiys y ree va foddey voue, eer myr dy beagh eh kionfenish mâroo.
Myr shoh ren schleï vooar cummeyder ny jallooyn dy mooar niartaghey ny mee-hushtee ayns faase-chredjueys.
Son aggindagh dy wooiys fer ayns pooar, hug eh ooilley e cheeayll gys obbyr, dy chiaddey yn jalloo er y chummey s’aalin.
As y pobble cleaynit lesh aalid yn obbyr, ghow ad nish son jee eshyn va tammylt roïe er ny ooashlaghey myr dooinney.
As shoh va oyr shaghrynys y theihll: son deiney surranse fo arkys ny tranlaase erbee, hug ad da claghyn as fuygh yn ennym shen nagh row cooie daue.
As cha row eh dy liooar daue dy row ad fo shaghrynys ayns tushtey dy Yee: agh myr v’ad ayns geulaghyn fo yn chragh vooar dy vee-hushtey, yn stayd seaghnagh shoh denmys ad shee.
Son myr v’ad chebbal nyn gloan ayns ourallyn-losht, ny cur rish obbeeys follit, ny lhie ayns rouanys reaïd neu-chooie;
Cha row ad ny-sodjey gyn-loght ayns nyn mea, ny nyn stayd-phoosee: agh varr ad yn derrey yeh yn jeh elley fo chlea, ny brishey e chree lesh brishey-poosey.
Myr shen dy deiyr dy chooilley ghooinney er fuill, er dunverys, er maarlys, er foalsaght, er molteyrys, er neu-firrinys, er anvea, as er loo-oaiagh,
Boirey shee deiney mie, jarrood thurnyn dooie, tayrn anmeenyn fo peccah, caghlaa dooghys, drogh-choardail ’sy stayd-phoosee, brishey-poosey, as neu-ghlennid gyn nearey.
Son ta geiyrt er jallooyn, nagh lhisagh ve enmyssit, toshiaght, oyr, as jerrey dagh olk.
Son edyr t’ad ass nyn geeayll tra t’ad ayns nyn reaïd, ny phadeyrys breagyn, ny dellal dy neu-chairal, ny gyn scansh ’ve oc jeh loo-oaiys.
Son wheesh as dy vel ad coyrt nyn dreishteil ayns jallooyn gyn-vioys; ga dy vel ad jannoo breearrey foalsey lioroo; ny-yeih cha vel ad ayns aggle kerraghey.

Ny-yeih son y daa oyr shoh bee ad dy cairal er nyn gerraghey, chammah er yn oyr nagh smooinee ad dy mie jeh Jee, coyrt geill da jallooyn, as (er-yn-oyr) neesht dy ghow ad loo oaiagh ’syn aggair, soiaghey beg jeh craueeaght.
Son cha nee yn phooar ocsyn lioroo t’ad breearrey, agh briwnys cairal Yee er peccee, ta dy kinjagh kerraghey loghtyn ny mee-chrauee.
Agh t’ou uss, O Yee, graysoil as firrinagh: foddey-surransagh, as ayns myghin gordrail dy chooilley nhee.
Son my ta shin jannoo peccah, lhiat’s ta shin, toiggal dty phooar: agh cha jean mayd peccah, as fys ain dy vel shin goit son dty vooinjer hene.
Son dy chur enney orts, te yn eer ynrickys: as dy hoiggal dty phooar fraue yn vea dy bragh beayn.
Son chamoo ren saaseyn olkyssagh deiney shin y volley, ny jalloo spottagh lesh ymmodee cullyryn, schleï fardalagh yn obbree.
Yn shilley echey ta dy chleayney ommydanyn dy ve jollyssagh ny-yeï, as myr shen t’ad geearree co-chaslys jalloo marroo, gyn ennal.
Ta chammah adsyn ta jannoo ad, adsyn ta geearree ad, as adsyn ta dy ooashlaghey ad, as nyn aigney soit er drogh reddyn, as toilchin lheid ny reddyn dy ve nyn marrantee.

Son ta’n pasheyder tempreil yn chray voug, as dy deinagh cummey dagh saagh son nyn ymmyd; dy feer, jeh’n chray cheddin t’eh jannoo chammah siyn dy hirveish ymmydyn glen, as myrgeddin lheid as ta shirveish gys ymmydyn elley: agh ta ymmyd dagh saagh lurg aigney yn phasheyder hene:

As cur-rish drogh-obbyr, t’eh jannoo jee fardalagh jeh’n chray cheddin, eer eshyn nagh row foddey roish jeant jeh’n chray cheddin eh hene, as ayns traa gerrit vees er ny hyndaa gys yn ooir, ass shen v’eh er ny ghoaill, tra vees e vioys, va eeasit da, er ny harey voish.

Ny-yeih, cha vel eh soiaghey scansh jeh deinys e obbyr ny girrid e vea, agh t’eh streeu dy ghoaill raad ayns schleï jeh ny gaauenyn airh, as argid, as prash, as t’eh dy choontey eh e ghloyr dy yannoo caslyssyn molteyragh.
Ta e chree myr leoaie, ta e hreishteil ny s’faase na’n ooir, as ta’n vea echey ny s’fardalee na’n chray.
Son wheesh as nagh dug eh geill da e er-croo, as dasyn ren eh y choamrey lesh annym gastey, as spyrryd breeoil ennal y vea.
Son cha choont ad agh gamman jeh’n vea shoh, as nyn draa ’sy theihll shoh dy ve agh margey son cosney: son, jir adsyn, shegin dooin ve cosney er dy chooilley aght, ga liorish drogh-haaseyn.
Son y dooinney shoh ta jeh stoo thallooinagh jannoo siyn brishlagh, as jallooyn grainnit, ta fys echey hene dy vel eh ny s’foiljagh na peccee elley.
As ny s’ommijee erskyn ooilley, as ny s’treih na eer oikanyn, ta noidyn dty phobble, ta jannoo tranlaase orroo.

Son ghow ad ooilley jallooyn ny ashoonee dy ve jeeghyn; nagh vel oc sooillyn dy akin, ny stroanyn dy hayrn ennal, ny cleayshyn dy chlashtyn, ny meir nyn laueyn dy loaghtey, as er son nyn gassyn cha vel lheihll erbee ayndoo.
Son cha row eh agh dooinney ren ad, as eshyn deeassee yn spyrryd echey hene ren ad y chummey: agh cha vod dooinney erbee jannoo jee cha mie rish hene.

Son ta dooinney marvaanagh gobbraghey stoo marroo lesh laueyn mee-chrauee: son t’eshyn eh hene ny share na ny reddyn t’eh dy ooashlaghey: son wheesh as dy row eshyn keayrt bio, agh cha row adsyn rieau.
Dy feer hug ad ooashley da ny cretooryn s’eajee: son cosoylit ry-cheilley ta paart ny smeilley na paart elley.
Chamoo t’ad cha aalin shen mastey cretooryn elley, as dy ve cha aggindagh shen orroo: agh jimmee ad fegooish moylley Yee as e vannaght.
Shen-y-fa liorish y lheid cheddin v’ad er nyn gerraghey dy cairal, as liorish ymmodee beishtyn dewilley er nyn smaghtaghey.
Ayns ynnyd yn cherraghey cheddin, liorish dty ghellal ghraysoil rish dty phobble hene, chiare oo daue bee jeh blass joarree, eer quaylyn dy ghoostey jollys:
Dy choyrt
Son ve cooie yn êgin dy heet er ny tranlaasee, dy hoilshaghey daue shoh kys va nyn noidyn er nyn dorchaghey.
Son tra haink dewilys atchimagh ny beishtyn orroo shoh, as ren ad cherraghtyn liorish gahghyn ard-nieughyn cam-chassagh, cha ren dty yymmoose tannaghtyn foddey.
Agh v’ad seaghnit son earish yiare, dy chur ad ayns kiarail liorish yn cowrey dy haualtys, dy hayrn ad gys cooinaghtyn jeh annaghyn dty leigh.
Son eshyn yeeagh
As ayns shoh hug oo er dty noidyn dy ghoaill-rish, Dy nee uss ta livrey veih dy chooilley olk.
Son ren guinn beishteigyn nieunagh as creoghanyn ad shen y stroie, chamoo va saase erbee er ny gheddyn cour nyn mioys: son v’ad toilchin dy ve kerrit ry lheid.
Agh er dty vec hene, cha dooar eer feeacklyn ny dragonyn pyshoonagh yn varriaght; son va dty vyghin dy kinjagh harrystoo, as ren eh ad y lheihys.
Son v’ad guint dy chur orroo cooinaghtyn er dty ghoan’s; as v’ad dy leah er nyn lheihys; dy reayll ad veih tuittym ayns jarroodys dowin, agh dy ve dy kinjagh cooinaghtagh jeh dty vieys.
Son cha nee lesh lossreeyn, ny shelliu meeley hooar ad couyr: agh liorish dty ghoo’s, O Hiarn, ta lheihys dy chooilley nhee.
Son ayd’s ta pooar bea as baase: t’ou coyrt sheese gys beeal yn oaie, as troggal seose reesht.
Ta dooinney dy jarroo marroo dooinney ayns goanlys: as tra ta’n ennal er n’gholl ass, cha jig eh reesht; chamoo ta’n annym cheet arragh, keayrt dy vel eh goit seose.
Agh cha vel eh ayns pooar dooinney dy haghney dty laue.

Son va ny mee-chrauee, ren gobbal dy ghoaill tushtey jeed’s er nyn gerraghey liorish niart dty roih’s: lesh deayrtaghyn fliaghee yindyssagh, lesh sniaghtey-garroo, as lesh frassyn v’ad er nyn imman, nagh voddagh ad chea voue, as lesh aile v’ad er nyn stroie.
Agh yn yindys smoo ooilley, dy row bree yn aile ny stroshey ’syn ushtey, ta mooghey dy chooilley nhee: son ta’n seihll caggey ass lieh yn vooinjer chairal.

Son paart dy cheayrtyn va bree yn aile er ny chastey, nagh voddagh eh ny beishtyn dewilley y lostey seose va currit noi ny mee-chrauee: agh dy voddagh ad hene fakin as toiggal dy row ad fo eiyrtys briwnyssyn Yee.
As keayrt elley ve lostey eer ayns mean yn ushtey, erskyn dooghys yn aile, dy stroie messyn cheer mee-chrauee.
Ayns ynnyd shoh ren uss dty phobble hene y yannoo magh lesh
Son ren shoh dty veaghey soilshaghey magh dty chenjallys ghooie gys dty chloan, as myr ve cooie gys yeearree yn eeder, myr shen ren eh eh-hene y chummey gys blass dagh unnane.
Agh ren y sniaghtey as y rio tannaghtyn fud yn aile, as cha lheïe ad, dy chur daue toiggal, dy ren yn aile, va lostey mean y sniaghtey-garroo, as tendreil ayns y fliaghey, stroie messyn nyn noidyn.
Agh ren shoh reesht yn eer dooghys hene y yarrood, dy voddagh yn vooinjer chairal ve er nyn gherjagh.
Son ta’n cretoor, ta dy hirveish uss e er-croo, bishaghey ayns niart noi ny mee-chrauee, son nyn gerraghey, as lhaggaghey e niart son y foays ocsyn ta treishteil ort.
Shen-y-fa ec y traa shen hene ve er ny chaghlaa er dy chooilley aght, as ve biallagh gys dty ghrayse, ta gerjaghey dy chooilley nhee, cordail rish yn yeearree ocsyn va ayns feme:
Dy vod toiggal ’ve ec dty chloan shynney lhiat, O Hiarn, nagh nee liorish messyn y thallooin ta dooinney er ny veaghey, agh dy nee dty ghoo ta dy ooraghey adsyn ta cur nyn dreishteil aynyd.
Son shen nagh row er ny stroie liorish yn aile, ren dy leah lheïe ersooyl roish bree-hiass ny greïney.
Dy choyrt dooin toiggal dy lhisagh shin roish irree-ny-greïney booise y chur dhyt’s, as ec brishey’n laa goaill hood’s nyn badjer.
Son nee treishteil yn neu-wooisal lheïe ersooyl myr lheeah-rio geuree, as shilley ersooyl myr ushtey gyn-ymmyd.
Son s’mooar ta dty vriwnyssyn as erskyn-insh; shen-y-fa ta anmeenyn neu-hushtagh er n’gholl er-shaghryn.

Son tra ghow deiney mee-chrauee orroo dy hranlaasey yn ashoon casherick; myr v’ad jeight seose ayns nyn dhieyn, pryssoonee yn dorraghys, as freilt fo geulaghyn oie liauyr, lhie ad ayns shen, giarit magh veih’n ard-chiarail dy bragh farraghtyn.
Son smooinaghtyn dy cheiltyn ad hene fo nyn beccaghyn follit, v’ad skeaylt noon as noal fo coodaghey dorraghey dy yarroodys, agglit ass nyn geeayll, as seaghnit lesh ashlishyn atchimagh.

Son chamoo oddagh yn cooill dorraghey shen, ayn v’ad lhie, ad y reayll voish aggle, agh sheean [myr jeh ushtaghyn] feiyral mygeayrt-y-moo, as shillaghyn agglagh v’er ny akin lioroo lesh eddinyn graney groamagh.
Cha row bree yn aile dy choyrt soilshey daue: chamoo oddagh sollyssid soilshean ny rollageyn surranse dy cheau soilshey ’syn oie atchimagh cheddin.
Ynrycan honnick ad aile foaddit jeh hene, feer agglagh; son myr v’ad fo mooarane atchim, er-lhieu dy row shen honnick ad ny smessey na ny shillaghyn nagh vaik ad.
Agh son molteyrys nyn obbeeys v’ad er nyn gastey, as hooar boggyssagh nyn ysseree oghsan naareydagh.
Son adsyn ghow orroo dy eiyrt ersooyl atchim as anvea veih annym seaghnit, v’ad hene seaghnit lesh aggle faghidagh.
Son ga nagh row oc oyr erbee dy aggle; ny-yeih v’ad ec kione nyn geiley, mannagh row agh y maase goll shaghey, as ec tassane ard-nieughyn,
As hooar ad baase son aggle, gra, Nagh vaik ad yn aer, va mygeayrt-y-moo er dy chooilley heu.
Son ta olkys, deyrit liorish y feanish eck hene, feer agglagh, as tra t’ee er ny ghoostey liorish cooinsheanse, t’ee dy kinjagh cur-ro-laue mee-ourys atchimagh.
Son cha vel aggle monney arragh, agh brah yn chooney shen ta nyn resoon dy hebbal dooin.
As myr sloo t’ad seaghnit cheu-sthie, wheesh shen s’trimmey hig orroo kerraghey nyn mee-hushtey.
Agh adsyn nyn lhie fo cadley trome yn oie cheddin, va dy jarroo atchimagh, as nagh dod shaghney shen haink orroo veih diunidyn niurin,
Va paart jeu seaghnit lesh scaanyn neu-ghooghyssagh, as paart goll my-neealloo, nyn gree failleil ad: son haink aggle doaltattym orroo, as shen nagh row ad jeeaghyn er y hon.
Myr shen, cre-erbee yn raad huitt fer ny lhie, shen y raad duirree eh, myr dooint ’sy phryssoon gyn boltyn yiarn.
Son edyr eh ve ny eirrinagh, ny bochil, ny jiulean ’sy vagher, haink eh er, as êginit v’eh dy hurranse shen ny va nauyn da: son v’ad ooilley kianlt lesh yn un gheuley dy ghorraghys.
Edyr eh ve geay rastagh, ny bingys eeanlee kiaulleeaght mastey banglaneyn ny biljyn, ny feiyr ushtey tuittym veih’n yrjid,

Ny tharmane atchimagh dy chlaghyn tilgit neose, ny lheimyragh noon as noal dy veishtyn ’sy dorraghys, ny buirroogh agglagh ny cretooryn oaldey s’atchimee, ny sheean dooble veih ny sleityn ooiganagh; hug lheid ny reddyn shoh orroo goll my-neealloo son aggle.
Son harrish yn chooid elley jeh’n theihll va’n soilshey sollys soilshean, as cha row unnane erbee er nyn lhiettal ayns nyn obbyr.
Harrystoo shoh ny-lomarcan va skeaylt oie ghroamagh, co-chaslys jeh’n dorraghys shen, va lurg shen dy verraghtyn orroo: agh ny-yeih, v’adsyn daue hene ny seaghnagh na’n dorraghys.
Ny-yeih ec dty nooghyn va slane soilshey, yn coraa oc tra cheayll ad, as gyn fakin nyn gummey; er-yn-oyr nagh row ad er hurranse ny reddyn cheddin, ren ad coontey ad maynrey.
Agh er-yn-oyr nagh ren ad skielley daue nish, lioroo hurr ad aggair roïe, hug ad booise daue, as ghuee ad leih orroo, son dy row ad roïe nyn noidyn.
Ayns ynnyd y chooid cheddin, hug oo daue pillar lossey dy aile, dy ve chammah leeideilagh daue er nyn yurnah gyn-oayl, as grian breeoil dy chur soilshey ooasle daue.

Son v’adsyn toilchin yn soilshey dy ve goit voue, as dy ve er ny phryssooney ayns dorraghys, va er reayll ayns bondiaght dty vec, lioroosyn va soilshey glen y leigh dy ve er ny hoilshaghey da’n seihll.

As tra v’ad kiarit dy stroie oikanyn dty chloan chasherick, myr va un lhiannoo er ny hilgey magh, as er ny hauail dy chur oghsan daue, ghow uss ersooyl earroo nyn gloan, as stroie oo ad ooilley cooidjagh ayns ny ushtaghyn mooarey.
Jeh’n oie shen va nyn ayraghyn er ny hickyraghey ro-laue, myr va fysseree firrinagh oc gys cre ny breearraghyn v’ad er choyrt nyn marrant, oddagh ad ny lurg shen ve jeh gien mie.
Shoh myr hooar dty phobble yn vondeish, chammah jeh saualtys y vooinjer chairail, as jeh toyrt-mow nyn noidyn.
Son lesh shen ren uss nyn noidyn y cherraghey, lesh y chooid cheddin t’ou uss er ghloyraghey shinyn dty chloan reiht.

Son ren cloan chrauee deiney mie ouralley dy follit, as lesh un aigney ren ad leigh casherick, dy beagh ny nooghyn ayns paarteeas ry-cheilley chammah ayns maynrys as seaghyn, nyn ayraghyn nish fockley-magh arraneyn moyllee.
Agh er y cheu elley va er ny chlashtyn eam atchimagh ny noidyn, as va bardoon trimshagh goll mygeayrt son y chloan v’ad dy ghobberan.
Va’n mainshtyr as y charvaant er nyn gerraghey co-laik, as y ree myr dooinney erbee elley.

Myr shen va oc ooilley dy cheilley earrooyn erskyn-towse dy verriu, lesh yn un cheint dy vaase, chamoo va ny bioee dy liooar dy oanluckey ny merriu: son ’sy tullogh va nyn sluight s’ooasle er nyn stroie.
Son ga nagh jinnagh ad nhee erbee y chredjal fo molteyrys nyn obbeeys; ny-yeih tra honnick ad cragh nyn mec shinney, ghow ad roo shoh dy ve nyn gloan dy Yee.
Son tra va dy chooilley nhee ayns fea as fast, as yn oie shen ayns mean e jurnah siyragh,
Haink dty ghoo’s ooilley-niartal neose doaltattym veih dty stoyl-reeoil ayns niau, myr dooinney-caggee niartal ayns mean cheer kiarit son toyrt-mow.
As hug eh lesh dty harey firrinagh myr cliwe geyre, as shassoo seose, lhieen eh dy chooilley nhee lesh baase, as v’eh roshtyn gys niau, ga dy hass eh er y thalloo.
Er shoh v’ad seaghnit lesh ashlishyn dy ghreamallyn atchimagh, as haink aggle doaltattym orroo.
As fer as fer jeu lieh-varroo scaait noon as noal, hoilshee ad oyr nyn maaish.
Son va fysseree oc jeh shoh ro-laue veih nyn ghreamallyn seaghnagh, nagh jinnagh ad cherraghtyn gyn toiggal cre’n oyr v’ad seaghnit.
Dy jarroo haink blass jeh’n vaase er y vooinjer chrauee hene, as haink cragh er y pobble ’syn aasagh: agh cha row yn jymmoose foddey-farraghtyn.
Son eisht ren y

Shoh myr hooar eh barriaght er y stroieder, cha nee lesh troshid corp, chamoo lesh eilley-caggee, agh lesh fockle hug eh fo-chosh yn cragheyder, liorish lhiasaghey ny breearraghyn, as ny conaantyn, va jeant rish ny ayraghyn.
Son tra va ny merriu nish er duittym sheese ayns carnaneyn yn derrey yeh er y jeh elley, shassoo eddyr ad, ren eh castey yn jymmoose, as lhiettal y raad gys ny bioee.
Son ayns y choamrey liauyr va slane aalid, as ayns ny kiare roaghyn dy chlaghyn costal va grainnit gloyr ny ayraghyn, as dty ard-ooashley er attey e chione.
Daue shoh hug y stroieder raad, myr v’eh ’syn ammys oc: son s’lioar ve daue agh blass jeh e yymmoose y gheddyn.
Er son ny mee-chrauee huitt y jymmoose orroo gyn-vyghin gys y jerrey: son va fys echey ro-laue cre yinnagh ad;
Lurg kied y choyrt daue dy immeeaght, as geiyrt magh ad ayns preis siyr, dy goghe ad arrys, as goll er nyn eiyrt’s.
Son choud as v’ad foast dobberan as keayney harrish oaiaghyn ny merriu, ghow ad cooish ommijagh elley ayns laue, as deiyr ad orroosyn myr scapailtee, v’ad roïe er n’êginagh dy chosney roue.
Son y kerraghey va nauyn daue hayrn ad gys y jerrey shoh, dy daink jarrood orroo cre v’ad hannah er hurranse, dy yannoo magh slane towse ny briwnyssyn shen va kiart orroo.
Chammah dy osley raad yindyssagh da dty phobble; agh dy hayrn baase atchimagh orroo shoh.
Son va’n slane cretoor lurg e ghooghys er ny chummey reesht ass-y-noa, shirveish ayns nyn oikyn cooie, dy reayll dty chloan hene gyn assee.
Ta shen dy ghra, Bodjal scadooagh harrish y champ, as raad va ushtey roïe, thalloo chirrym cheet rish; as trooid yn aarkey-jiarg, raad rea; as trooid y thooilley niartal, magher glass.
Ny-hrooid hie ooilley yn pobble va fo coadey dty laue, cur-my-ner dty virrillyn erskyn-towse yindyssagh.
Son ghow ad raad gyn lhiettal myr cabbil, as lheimyragh myr eayin, cur moylley dhyt’s, O Hiarn, ren ad y livrey.
Son cha row ad foast er yarrood cre v’er daghyrt ayns cheer nyn yoarreeaght, kys dy dymmyrk y thalloo beishteigyn ayns ynnyd maase, as dy row yn awin er-croo lesh froggyn ayns ynnyd eeastyn.
Agh lurg shen honnick ad sheeloghe noa dy eeanlee, tra va nyn yeearreeyn miandagh jollyssagh er bee blaystal.
Son haink quaylyn seose huc veih’n aarkey, dy yannoo magh ad.
As haink kerraghey er ny peccee lesh cowraghyn agglagh dy haarneeyn atchimagh: son s’mie hoill ad shoh liorish nyn olkys ayns nyn ghrogh-ghellal creoi as dwoaiagh gys joarreeyn.
Son cha dug ny Sodomiteyn oltaghey-bea da ny joarreeyn haink ny mast’ oc: agh dreill ad shoh eer caarjyn fo bondiaght, va er hoilchin dy mie voue.
As cha nee shen ny-lomarcan, agh hoiggal dy bee foayr ennagh er ny hoilshaghey dauesyn, nagh ren ad hene y ymmyrkey dy dooie gys joarreeyn.
Agh ghell ad shoh dy feer dewil roosyn v’ad er n’ghoaill stiagh lesh cuirraghyn, as va hannah ayns commeeys mâroo ’sy leighyn cheddin.

Shen-y-fa lesh eer dellid v’ad shoh er nyn mwoalley, myr va’n vooinjer elley ec dorryssyn y dooinney cairagh; tra v’ad combaasit lesh dorraghys dullyr, atchimagh, as dagh unnane razey son raad e ghorrys hene.
Son va ny
Son va nheeghyn thallooinagh er ny chaghlaa gys ushtagh, as ny reddyn va roïe snaue ’syn ushtey, v’ad nish gimmeeaght er y thalloo.
Va pooar ec yn aile ’syn ushtey, jarrood yn dooghys echey hene: as chaill yn ushtey e ghooghys mooghee hene.
Er y cheu elley, cha ren bree yn aile stroie feill cretooryn marvaanagh, ga dy jimmee ad ayn; chamoo lheïe eh yn
Son ayns dy chooilley nhee, O Hiarn, ren oo mooar jeh dty phobble, as ren oo ad y ghloyraghey, chamoo ren oo beg y hoiaghey jeu: agh chooin oo lhieu ec dy chooilley hraa, as ayns dy chooilley voayl.
Ta dy chooilley chreenaght cheet veih’n Chiarn, as mârishyn te tannaghtyn son dy bragh.
Quoi oddys earroo y ghoaill jeh genniagh ny marrey, as jeh ny bineyn fliaghee, as y traa gyn toshiaght, gyn jerrey?
Quoi oddys toiggal yrjid niau, as lheead y thallooin, as diunid ny marrey, as creenaght?
Ta creenaght er ny ve ayn roish dy chooilley nhee, as ta fysseree e hushtey veih er-dy-rieau.
Ta goo yn Jee smoo syrjey bun e chreenaght; as ta ny raaidyn ecksh annaghyn dy bragh breeoil.
Quoi da ta bun creenaght er ve er ny hoilshaghey, ny quoi ta toiggal e coyrleyn creeney?
[Quoi da ta tushtey e chreenaght er ny ve soilshit? as quoi ta dy slane er hoiggal e obbraghyn yindyssagh?]
Ta un er ayn ynrycan creeney, as ard-aggle dy ve goit roish; eer y Chiarn ta ny hoie er e stoyl-reeoil.
Ren eh ish y chroo, as ghow eh yn baght eck, as yn earroo jee, as heeyn eh magh ee er ooilley e obbraghyn.
T’eeish marish dy chooilley chretoor cordail rish e yioot, as t’eh er choyrt ee dauesyn ta graihagh er.
Ta aggle y Chiarn ooashley as gloyr, as gennallys, as attey dy voggey.
Ta aggle y Chiarn jannoo cree gennal, as te coyrt boggey as gerjagh, as bea liauyr.
Quoi erbee, ayn ta aggle y Chiarn, hig eh jeh dy mie ec y jerrey, as yiow eh foayr ec laa e vaaish.
Dy ghoaill aggle roish y Chiarn, te bun dy chooilley chreenaght: as ve er ny chummey marish y chloan ynrick ayns y vreïn.
T’ee er hoiaghey undin dy bragh farraghtyn marish deiney, as nee ee tannaghtyn marish nyn sluight.
Dy ghoaill aggle roish y Chiarn, she shen yn ard-chreenaght; as t’ee jannoo magh cloan gheiney lesh ny messyn eck:
T’ee dy lhieeney ooilley nyn dhieyn lesh nheeghyn mie, as ny thieyn-tashtee lesh bishaghey.
Ta aggle y Chiarn attey dy chreenaght, cur er shee as slaynt firrinagh dy vlaaghey, as t’ad shoh ny neesht giootyn Yee: as te dy vishaghey yn voggey ocsyn ta graihagh er.
Ta creenaght shilley neose schleï, as tushtey dy hoiggal, as t’ee dy hroggal seose adsyn gys ard-ooashley, ta cummal dy kinjagh mâree.
Te fraue creenaght dy ghoaill aggle roish y Chiarn, as ta ny banglaneyn echey bea liauyr.
Ta aggle y Chiarn dy eiyrt ersooyl peccah, as cre-erbee yn raad te, te castey jymmoose.
Cha vod dooinney eulyssagh ve er ny heyrey, son nee aile e eulys eh hene y stroie.
Foddee dooinney soccaragh surranse son traa; agh fy-yerrey hig boggey ny whail.
Nee eh e ghoan y smaghtagh son traa, as nee meillyn ymmodee fockley magh e chreenaght.
Ta raaghyn tushtey ayns tashtaghyn creenaght: agh ta craueeaght dwoaiagh da’n vee-chrauee.
My t’ou geearree creenaght freill ny annaghyn, as nee yn Chiarn giootal ort ee.
Son ta aggle y Chiarn creenaght as ynsagh: as ta credjue as meenid yn taitnys echeysyn.
Ny bee lhag-hreishteilagh ayns aggle y Chiarn, tra t’ou boght: as ny tar kiongoyrt rish lesh cree dooble.
Ny bee dty er-crauee-oalsey ayns shilley gheiney, as gow kiarail vie cre t’ou dy loayrt.

Ny bee mooaralagh, er-aggle dy duitt oo, as dy dayrn oo scammylt er dty annym, as myr shen dy jean Jee dty pheccaghyn follit y hoilshaghey, as oo y cherraghey fenish ooilley yn pobble; er-yn-oyr nagh daink oo ayns ynrickys gys aggle y Chiarn, agh dy vel dty chree lane dy volteyrys.
My vac, my t’ou cheet dy hirveish y Chiarn, kiare dty annym son seaghyn.
Niartee dty chree, as jean gymmyrkey oo hene dy dunnal, as ny eiyr er drogh haaseyn dy haghney seaghyn.
Cum shickyr huggey, as ny scugh dy lhiattee, dy vod oo ve er dty vishaghey ec y jerrey.
Cre-erbee hig dty raad gow dy mie rish: as bee surransagh tra t’ou er ny chaghlaa gys stayd injil.
Son ta airh er ny phrowal ayns yn aile, as deiney cairal ayns y choirrey dy heaghyn.
Cred aynsyn, as nee eh cooney lhiat, freill dty chesmadyn dy kiart, as cur dty hreishteil ayn.
Shiuish ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, farkee jee er e vyghin, as ny gow-jee dy lhiattee, er aggle dy duitt shiu.
Shiuish ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, cred-jee ayn, as cha jean nyn leagh failleil.
Shiuish ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, jeeagh-jee son bannaght, as son boggey dy bragh farraghtyn, as myghin.

Jeeagh-jee gys sheelogheyn y chenn earish, as toig-jee: row rieau fer erbee, hug e hreishteil ayns y Chiarn, er ny choyrt mow? ny row rieau fer erbee, ren tannaghtyn ayns e aggle, er ny hreigeil? ny quoi ren eh rieau soiaghey beg jeh, ren geamagh er?
Son ta’n Chiarn lane dy hymmey as dy vyghin; foddey-surransagh, as feer erreeishagh, as leih peccaghyn, as sauail ayns earish seaghyn.
Smerg da’n moal-chreeagh, as y lhag-lauee, as y peccagh ta
Smerg da’n moal-chreeagh, son ta e chredjue faase, shen-y-fa cha bee eh er ny choadey.
Smerg diuish t’er choayll nyn meenid fo surranse: as cre’n erree hig erriu, tra lhieys y Chiarn e laue erriu?
Adsyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, cha bee ad mee-viallagh gys e ghoo, as adsyn ta graihagh er, freillee ad e raaidyn.
Adsyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, eiyree ad er shen ta taitnyssagh huggeysyn, as adsyn ta graihagh er, bee ad jeant magh lesh e leigh.
Adsyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, kiartee ad nyn greeaghyn, as nyn anmeenyn y injillaghey ayns e hilley.
Gra, Lhig dooin tuittym ayns laueyn y Chiarn, as cha nee ayns laueyn deiney: son lheid as ta e ard-ooashley, lheid cheddin ta e vyghin.
Clasht-jee rish nyn ayr, O shiuish chloan, as eiyr-jee er my raa’s, dy vod shiu ve sauchey.
Son ta’n Chiarn er choyrt da’n ayr arrym harrish y chloan, as t’eh er hickyraghey pooar y voir harrish ny mec.
Eshyn ta arrymagh da e ayr, t’eh jannoo lhiasaghey son e pheccaghyn.
As eshyn ta arrymagh da e voir, t’eh myr fer ta coyrt seose berchys.
Eshyn ta arrymagh da e ayr, bee boggey echey jeh e chloan hene, as tra t’eh jannoo e phadjer, bee eh er ny chlashtyn.
Eshyn ta arrymagh da e ayr, bee eh foddey beayn, as eshyn ta cur biallys da’n Chiarn, bee eh gerjagh da e voir.
Eshyn ta ayns aggle y Chiarn, ver eh arrym da e ayr, as bee eh beasagh da e ayr, as e voir, myr da e vainshtyryn.
Cur arrym da dty ayr as dty voir, chammah ayns goo, as jannoo, dy vod bannaght cheet ort vouesyn.
Son ta bannaght nyn ayr shickyraghey thieyn y chloan, agh ta mollaght mayrey dy astyrt ass ny undinyn.
Ny jean boggyssagh harrish mee-ooashley dty ayrey, son cha vel drogh-ghoo dty ayrey ooashley erbee dhyt’s.
Son ta gloyr dooinney veih ooashley e ayr; as ta moir scammyltagh nearey da e cloan.
My vac, coon lesh dty ayr, ayns e hendeeaght, as ny cur oyr trimshey da choud as t’eh bio.
As my ta e hushtey gaase moal, ymmyrk lesh, as ny soie uss beg jeh, tra t’ou ec dty slane niart.
Son cha bee dty chemmyrk gys dty ayr er ny yarrood, as ayns ynnyd peccaghyn, bee eh cour dty hroggal seose.
Ayns laa dty heaghyn bee eh er ny chooinaghtyn dhyt; nee dty pheccaghyn myrgeddin lheïe ersooyl, myr y rio ayns earish aalin ghrianagh.
Eshyn ta treigeil e ayr, t’eh myr lûnagh, as eshyn ta cur corree er e voir, t’eh fo mollaght Yee.
My vac, gow er dty hoshiaght lesh dty obbyr, ayns sheeltys; myr shen vees soiaghey jeant jeed liorish deiney mie.
My syrjey t’ou, wheesh shen smoo jean oo hene y injillaghey, as nee oo foayr y gheddyn ayns shilley yn Chiarn.
Ta ymmodee ayns stayd ard as mooaralagh, agh ta folliaghtyn er ny hoilshaghey da ny imlee.
Son s’mooar ta pooar y Chiarn, as ta ooashley er ny choyrt da liorish ny imlee.
Ny jean briaght ayns reddyn ta ro-ghoillee er dty hon, chamoo ronsee ayns cooishyn erskyn dty roshtyn.
Agh shen ny t’ou er dty harey, smooinee er dy arrymagh; son cha vel eh ymmyrchagh dhyt dy akin shen ta Jee er cheiltyn.
Ny bee imneagh dy gheddyn toiggal ayns cooishyn gyn ymmyd: son t’ou cur-my-ner ymmodee reddyn roish dty hooillyn ta erskyn tushtey dooinney.
Son ta ymmodee er ny volley liorish ny smooinaghtyn fardalagh oc hene, as ta drogh-ourys er chassey nyn mriwnys.
Fegooish sooillyn cha vod soilshey ’ve ayd; ny jean uss er-y-fa shen goaill ort yn ynsaghey shen nagh vel ayd.
Nee cree roonagh farrail dy olk fy-yerrey: as eshyn ta cur rish cliaghtaghyn gaueagh, nee eh cherraghtyn lioroo.
Bee cree condaagagh er ny laadey lesh trimshey, as nee’n drogh-ghooinney carnaneaghey peccah er peccah.
Cha vel dooinney mooaralagh er ny lhiasaghey liorish kerraghey erbee: son ta’n rass dy vee-chairys er ghoaill fraue ayn.
Nee cree yn dooinney tushtagh toiggal raaghyn-dorraghey, as ta cleaysh beasagh boggey yn dooinney creeney.
Nee ushtey mooghey chiass loshtee yn aile, as ta giastyllys jannoo lhiasaghey son peccaghyn:
As Jee ta cooilleeney kenjallys vees graysoil da ’sy traa ta ry-heet: as my haghyrys da tuittym, bee kemmyrk ny chour.
My vac, ny jean uss e veaghey y reayll voish y voght, as ny cur er sooillyn yn ymmyrchagh dy arkiaght foddey.
Ny cur sou-aigney er yn annym êginit: chamoo brasnee dooinney tra t’eh ayns seaghyn.
Ny jean uss seaghyn y vishaghey er cree ta seaghnit, as ny lhig shaghey dy chur dasyn t’ayns feme.
Ny jean uss soiaghey beg jeh aghin yn ymmyrchagh, chamoo chyndaa dty eddin ersooyl veih dooinney boght.
Ny chyndaa dty hooill veih’n ymmyrchagh, as ny cur oyr erbee da dy ghwee dhyt:
Son my ghweeys eh dhyt ayns angaish e annym, bee yn phadjer echey er ny chlashtyn liorish e er-croo.
Cosne dhyt hene graih yn phobble, as croym dty chione gys dooinney ooasle.
Ny jean mooaraghey dy chroymmey dty chleaysh gys y voght, as cur da ansoor dooie as meeley.
Jean uss eshyn y livrey, ta surranse aggair, veih laue y tranlaasagh; as ny bee lhag-chreeagh tra t’ou soie ayns briwnys.
Bee myr ayr da’n chloan gyn ayr, as ayns ynnyd e sheshey dooie da nyn moir: myr shen bee oo myr mac yn er smoo syrjey, as bee eh ny s’graihagh ort na ta dty voir.
Ta creenaght troggal seose e cloan, as goaill adsyn ry-laue ta shirrey ny-jeï.
Eshyn ta graihagh urree, t’eh graihagh er bea; as bee adsyn, ta geiyrt urree ayns nyn aegid, er nyn lhieeney lesh boggey.
Eshyn ta jannoo shickyr jee, yiow eh eiraght gloyroil, as cre theihll y raad t’ee taaghey nee yn Chiarn y vannaghey.
Nee ny shirveishee ecksh shirveish yn er smoo casherick: as adsyn ta graihagh urreeish, ta’n Chiarn graihagh orroosyn.
Nee quoi-erbee ta ’syn ammys ecksh briwnys ny ashoonyn: as eshyn ta geaishtagh r’ee bee e chummal ayns sauchys.
My ta dooinney firrinagh jee, yiow eh ee son eiraght, as bee ish ayns cronney yn cheeloghe echeysyn.

Son ec y toshiaght hed ee mârish trooid cassanyn camlaagagh, as ver ee lh’ee aggle as atchim er, as eh y heaghney lesh yn ynsagh eck, derrey oddys ee yn annym echey y hreishteil, as eh hene y phrowal liorish e leighyn.
Eisht hyndaays ee er y raad jeeragh huggey, as eshyn y gherjaghey, as ny folliaghtyn eck y hoilshaghey da.
Agh my hed eh er-shaghryn, treigys ee eh, as nee ee eshyn y livrey gys e hoyrt-mow hene.
Cur tastey da’n imbagh cooie, as bee er dty hwoaie roish olk; as ny gow nearey tra te bentyn rish dty annym.
Son ta nearey ayn, ta gymmyrkey peccah, as ta nearey ayn, ta gloyr as grayse.
Ny jean uss soiaghey jeh persoon erbee noi dty annym, as ny lhig da ooashley dooinney erbee cur ort tuittym.
As ny shaghyn dy loayrt, tra ta caa ayd dy yannoo mie, as ny follee dty chreenaght ayns e aalid.
Son liorish dty ghoan bee dty chreenaght er ny hoilshaghey, as dty ynsagh liorish goo yn chengey.
Ny loayr noi yn irriney er aght erbee, agh gow nearey son marranys dty vee-hushtey.
Ny bee nearey ort dy ghoaill-rish dty pheccaghyn, as ny gleck noi stroo yn thooilley.
Ny bee dty chercheen fo ammys dooinney ommijagh erbee, chamoo jean soiaghey jeh persoon y vooaralagh.
Streeu ass lieh yn irriney gys baase, as nee yn Chiarn caggey er dty hon.
Ny bee siyragh ayns dty hengey, as ayns dty obbraghyn lhag as liastey.
Ny bee myr lion ayns dty hie, ny myr dooinney baanrit gys dty vooinjer.
Ny lhig da dty laue ve foshlit dy ghoaill, ny jeight tra lhisagh oo geeck.
Ny soie dty chree er dty chooid, as ny abbyr, Ta dy liooar aym son earish my vea.
Ny eiyr er dty aigney hene, as er dty niart, dy immeeaght lurg raaidyn dty chree hene:
As cha jir oo, Quoi nee mish y lhiettal ayns my yannoo? son nee’n Chiarn, son shickyrys, kerraghey y ghoaill er dty voyrn.
Cha jir oo, Ta mee er n’yannoo peccah, as cha vel skielley erbee er daghyrt dou? son ta’n Chiarn foddey-surransagh, cha jean eh er aght erbee raad y lhiggey dhyt.
Ayns treishteil dy vod oo lhiasaghey y yannoo, ny bee gyn aggle, dy vishaghey dty pheccaghyn:
As cha jir oo, S’mooar ta e vyghin, bee eh er ny veeinaghey son earroo my pheccaghyn: son veihsyn ta cheet chammah myghin as kerraghey, as ta e yymmoose tannaghtyn er peccee.

Ny lhig shaghey dy hyndaa gys y Chiarn, as ny cur jeh veih laa gys laa: son doaltattym hig magh jymmoose y Chiarn, as ayns dty hauchys bee oo er dty stroie, as nee oo cherraghtyn ayns laa yn chooilleeney.
Ny jean soiaghey dty chree er cooid cosnit dy aggairagh, son s’beg vees nyn mondeish ayns laa dty heaghyn.
Ny fasnee lesh dy chooilley gheay, as ny gow er dy chooilley raad: son myr shen ta’n peccagh jannoo, ta jeh chengey lhiam chengey lhiat.
Freill shickyr ayns dty hushtey, as lhig da dty ghoan ve gyn caghlaa.
Bee arryltagh dy chlashtyn, as lhig da dty vea ve firrinagh, as cur ansoor meeley.
My ta toiggal ayd, freggyr dty naboo, mannagh vel, cur dty laue er dty veeal.
Ta chammah ooashley as nearey ayns taggloo, as ta chengey dooinney e hoyrt-mow.
Ny bee er dty enmys tutler, as ny lhie ayns farkiaght lesh dty hengey; son ta nearey eajee er y vaarliagh, as drogh gheyrey er y chengey foalsey.
Ny bee mee-hushtagh ayns nhee erbee, lhig da’n chooish ve mooar ny beg.
Ayns ynnyd carrey, jeeagh nagh jig oo dy ve noid; son liorish shoh yiow drogh ennym, nearey, as scammylt: eer myr shoh yiow yn peccagh, ta goll lesh chengey ghooble.
Ny jean boggyssagh ayns mooaralys dty chree hene; nagh bee dty annym er ny raipey ayns peeshyn, myr liorish tarroo [rouail ny lomarcan:]
Caillee oo dty ghuillagyn, as hed dty vess naardey, as bee oo hene faagit myr billey creen.
Nee drogh annym stroie eshyn by-lesh eh, as ver eh er dy ve son faghid ec e noidyn.
Nee glare millish caarjyn y vishaghey, as nee chengey veeley oltaghyn dooie y chosney.
Bee ayns shee rish ymmodee: ny-yeih, ny bee ayd agh un charrey-coyrlee mastey thousane.
My t’ou aggindagh carrey y gheddyn, prow eh hoshiaght, as ny bee siyragh dy hreishteil eh.
Son ta fer ayn ta ny charrey son yn ymmyd echey hene, agh cha jean ad tannaghtyn ’sy laa seaghnagh.
As ta sorch dy charrey ayn chyndaays gys noidys as streeu, as nee soilshaghey dty nearey.
Ta keint elley dy charrey ayn vees sheshey dhyt ec dty voayrd, agh cha jean eh tannaghtyn ayns laa dty arkys.
Agh ayns stayd dty vaynrys bee eh myr t’ou hene, as bee eh daaney harrish dty harvaantyn,
My hig caghlaa ort, bee eh dt’oï, as nee eh follaghey eh hene veih dty eddin.
Jean oo hene y scarrey veih dty noidyn, as gow tastey jeh dty chaarjyn.
Ta carrey firrinagh fendeilagh lajer, as eshyn t’er gheddyn e lheid, t’eh er daghyrt er berchys.
Cha vel red erbee oddys ve soylit gys carrey firrinagh, ta’n foays echey erskyn dy chooilley verchys.
Ta carrey firrinagh follanys nyn mea, as adsyn ta ayns aggle y Chiarn yiow ad e lheid.
Quoi-erbee ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, nee eh dy creeney reih e charrey, son myr t’eh hene, y lheid cheddin vees e naboo.
My vac, cosne ynsaghey veih dty aegid seose: myr shen nee oo creenaght y vishaghey gys shenn eash.

Eiyr urree myr eshyn ta traaue as cuirr, as farkee son ny messyn mie eck: son cha bee cooid vooar dy hooilleil ayd ayns dty laboraght, dy chosney ee, agh nee oo gee jeh ny messyn eck ’syn imbagh cooie.
T’ee feer dwoaiagh da ny mee-hushtee: eshyn ta gyn tushtey, cha jean eh tannaghtyn mâree.
Nee ee lhie er myr clagh hrome phrowalagh; as nee eh dy gerrit scarrey r’ee.
Son ta creenaght cordail rish yn ennym eck hene, as cha vel ee er ny hoilshaghey da ymmodee.
Eaisht rhym, my vac, gow my choyrle, as ny jean gobbal my choonceil.
As cur dty chassyn ayns ny geulaghyn eck, as dty wannal fo yn whing eck.
Croym sheese dty gheaylin, as gow ort ee, as ny lhig da ny kianglaghyn eck ve deinagh dhyt.
Tar huic lesh dty slane cree, as freill ny raaidyn eck lesh ooilley dty phooar.
Ronsee, as shir magh, as bee ee er ny hoilshaghey dhyt: as tra t’ou er chosney ee, ny lhig y raad jee.
Son ec y jerrey nee oo soylley y gheddyn ayns fea mâree, as bee shen er ny hyndaa gys dty voggey.
Eisht bee ny geulaghyn eck fendeil lajer dhyt, as y whing eck coamrey dy ghloyr.
Son t’ee coamrit lesh jesheenyn airhey, as ta ny cryssyn eck laatchey dy ghorrym-jiarg.
Ver oo mood ee myr coamrey ooasle, as ver oo ort ee myr attey gloyroil.
My vac, my she dty aigney’s eh, yiow ynsaghey; as my ver oo dty aigney huggey, bee oo tushtagh.
My t’ou aggindagh dy chlashtyn, nee oo tushtey y gheddyn; as my nee oo dty chleaysh y chroymmey, bee oo creeney.
Shass ayns chaglym y chanstyr, as jean lhiantyn huggeysyn ta creeney.
Bee aggindagh dy eaishtagh rish dy chooilley haggloo crauee, as ny lhig da raaghyn creeney goll shaghyd.
As my t’ou fakin dooinney tushtagh, cosne huggey dy leah, as lhig da dty chass taaghey yn raad gys e hie.
Soie dty aigney er oardaghyn y Chiarn, as smooinee dy kinjagh er e annaghyn: nee eshyn dty chree y hickyraghey, as ver eh dhyt creenaght lurg dty yeearree hene.
Ny jean olk erbee, myr shen cha jig skielley erbee dty raad.
Chea veih ny mee-chrauee, as nee mee-chairys chyndaa ersooyl voïd.
My vac, ny cuirr er imraghyn mee-chairys, as cha jean oo ad y vuinn shiaght-filley.
Ny shir veih’n Chiarn oik staydoil, ny veih’n ree stoyl yn ooashley.
Ny jean uss oo hene y heyrey kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn, ny boggyssagh ass dty chreenaght fenish y ree.

Ny shir dy ve dty vriw, fakin nagh vod oo dy chooilley vee-chairys y chastey, er-aggle ec traa erbee dy bee oo fo smaght roish persoon dooinney s’pooaral, as dy der oo oyr snapperal ayns raad dty yeerid.
Ny jean brasnaghey jymmoose y theay, as ny lhig oo hene sheese mastey’n pobble.
Ny jean peccah y chiangley er peccah, son ayns unnane hene cha jed oo gyn kerraghey.
Ny jir, Nee Jee jeeaghyn er earroo my ourallyn, as tra ta mee dy hebbal gys y Jee smoo syrjey nee eh soiaghey jee’m.
Ny bee lhag-chreeagh ayns dty phadjeryn, as ny lhig shaghyd dy chur jeirk.
Ny jean craid mysh dooinney erbee ayns angaish e annym: son ta fer ayn ta dy injillaghey, as dy hroggal seose.
Ny lhiassee breg noi dty vraar: chamoo jean y lheid rish dty charrey.
Ny cliaght oo hene er keint erbee dy vreg, son cha vel eh agh drogh chliaghtey.
Ny gow rouyr taggloo ort ayns chaglym y chanstyr, as ny jean ymmyd jeh goan fardalagh ayns dty phadjeryn.
Ny cur dwoaie da obbyr ghoccaragh, chamoo da farrysthie yn eirrinagh, ta’n er smoo syrjey er n’oardaghey.
Ny jean oo hene dty heshey ayns earroo ny drogh-yantee, agh cooinee nagh vel yn kerraghey oc foddey jeh.
Jean uss dty annym y injillaghey dy mooar, son ta briwnys ny mee-chrauee aile as beishteigyn.
Ny caghlaa dty charrey son leagh ’sy theihll, er coontey erbee: chamoo braar firrinagh son airh Ophir.
Ny scarr rish ben chreeney as vie, son ta’n foays eck erskyn airh.
Choud’s ta dty harvaant gobbraghey dy firrinagh, ny cur drogh-ghellal da, chamoo da’n jiulean, ta slane jeidjagh ayns dty hirveish.
Lhig da dty annym ve dooie rish fer-mooinjerey mie, as ny freill reamys voish.
Vel maase ayd? freill sooill vie orroo: as my t’ad son dty vondeish, freill ad mayrt.
Vel cloan ayd? ynsee ad, as croym sheese nyn mwannal veih nyn aegid.
Vel inneenyn ayd? gow kiarail jeh nyn girp, as ny lhig daue goaill rouyr reamys ayns dty enish.
Jean uss dty inneen y phoosey, as nee oo cooilleeney cooish ta lane lhie er; agh cur da dooinney tushtagh ee.
Vel ben-heshey ayd lurg dty aigney? ny treig ee, agh ny jean oo hene y lhiantyn rish ben eddrym.
Cur arrym da dty ayr lesh ooilley dty chree, as ny jarrood trimshey dty voir.
Cooinee dy row er ny yientyn jeu, as kys oddys oo lhiasaghey dauesyn son ny t’ad er n’yannoo er dty hon?
Gow aggle roish y Chiarn lesh ooilley dty annym, as cur arrym da e haggyrtyn.
Cur graih dasyn ren oo y chroo, lesh ooilley dty niart, as ny treig e hirveishee.

Gow aggle roish y Chiarn, as cur arrym da’n saggyrt, as cur e chair da, myr t’ou er dty harey; ny chied-vessyn, yn oural-loght, gioot ny geiltyn, as yn oural dy chasherickys, as ny chied-vessyn jeh ny nheeghyn casherick.
As sheeyn magh dty laue gys y voght, dy chur mullagh er dty yiastyllys.
Ta feoiltys graysoil ayns shilley dy chooilley ghooinney bio, as son ny merriu jean shen ny ta lowal as feudagh.
Ny shaghyn dy ve mâroosyn ta keayney, as dy ghobberan mâroosyn ta dobberan.
Ny bee liastey dy gholl dy yeeaghyn y vooinjer chingey, son myr shen nee oo aigney-mie y chosney.
Cre erbee t’ou goaill ayns laue, cooinee er y jerrey, as cha jean oo dy bragh ass y raad.
Ny streeu rish dooinney ayns pooar, er-aggle dy duitt oo ayns ny laueyn echey.
Ny bee ec noidys rish dooinney berchagh, er-aggle dy gow e hrimmid niart oc: son ta airh er stroie ymmodee, as er chur shaghrynys er cree reeaghyn.
Ny streeu rish beealerey dy ghooinney, as ny shirveish stoo gys yn aile echey.
Ny jean glare sportoilagh rish dooinney gyn-nearey, nagh dayrn oo drogh-ghoo er dty chynney.
Ny jean goltooaney yn arryssagh, ta treigeil e pheccah, agh cooinee dy vel shin ooilley toilchin kerraghey.
Ny jean beg y hoiaghey jeh dooinney ayns e henn eash: son ta paart j’in hene gaase shenn.
Ny jean boggyssagh harrish dty noid smoo as eh marroo, agh cooinee dy vow mayd ooilley baase.
Ny jean beg y hoiaghey jeh goan y vooinjer chreeney, agh fow ynsaghey mie ayns nyn raaghyn-creeney; son vouesyn nee oo ynsagh y gheddyn, as kys dy hirveish ard-gheiney dy aghtal.
Ny shaghyn goan y chanstyr: son dynsee adsyn myrgeddin veih nyn ayraghyn, as vouesyn nee oo tushtey y ynsaghey, as dy reggyrt myr te cooie.
