Ny cur aile ayns smarageyn y drogh-yantagh, er-aggle dy bee oo losht ’syn aile t’ou hene er n’oaddey.
Ny gow ort dy chur eddin da’n olkyssagh ayns dty ghlare, er-aggle dy lhie eh cooyl-chlea dy ghoaill oo ayns ribbey dty ghoan.
Ny eeassee da fer stroshey na oo hene, son my t’ou geeasaght da, foddee oo jeeaghyn er myr caillit.
Ny bee raane erskyn dty fort: son my t’ou goll raane, gow kiarail dy eeck eh.
Ny gow gys y leigh rish briw, son nee ad briwnys er e hon, cordail rish e vriwnys hene.
Ny jean sheshaght er y raad marish dooinney daaney, nagh bee eh seaghnagh dhyt: son nee eshyn lurg e aigney hene, as nee oo cherraghtyn mârish trooid e ommijys.
Ny streeu rish dooinney fargagh, as ny gow mârish magh gys yn eaynee: son cha vel eh soiaghey floag jeh fuill, as raad nagh vel cooney er-gerrey, bee oo ayns gaue dty vaaish.
Ny gow coyrle marish ommydan, son cha vod eh coonceil y reayll.
Ny treisht joarree lesh dty chooishyn follit, er-aggle dy jean eh dty vrah.
Ny foshil dty chree gys dy chooilley ghooinney, er aggle dy gooilleenee eh oo lesh drogh-hurn ennagh.
Ny bee geadaghey harrish ben-heshey dty oghrish; er-aggle dy n’ynsee oo jee drogh-ourys dt’oï hene.
Ny lhig da’n ven reill harrish dty chree, myr shen dy vod ee e cass y chur er dty chooid.
Ny tar er-gerrey da strumpag, er-aggle dy duitt oo ayns e ribbaghyn.
Ny jean cliaghtaghey sheshaght ben rouanagh, er-aggle dy bee oo goit ayns ny ribbaghyn eck.
Ny shass blâkey er moidyn, nagh duitt oo liorish yn aalid eck.
Ny cur dty yeearreeyn er streebee, nagh gaill oo dty eiraght.
Ny shass jeeaghyn mygeayrt-y-mood er e son ayns straidyn yn ard-valley, chamoo jean rouail mygeayrt mâree ayns folliaghtyn ny drogh-hieyn.
Chyndaa dty hooill dy lhiattee veih ben aalin, as ny jeeagh er aalid ben erbee; son shimmey t’er ny ve cleaynit lesh aalid ben; son liorish shen ta graih er ve er ny oaddey myr aile.

Ny soie eddyr marish ben dooinney elley, chamoo gow ee ayns dty roihaghyn, as ny baare dty argid urree ec y feeyn; er-aggle dy lhiannee dty chree huic, as myr shen trooid yeearree dty chree dy duitt oo ayns toyrt-mow.
Ny treig dty henn charrey, son cha vel fer noa dy ve soylit huggey: ta carrey noa myr feeyn noa, tra te er n’aase shenn, nee oo giu eh dy blaystal.
Ny troo mysh maynrys y drogh-yantagh: son s’beg fys t’ayd cre vees e yerrey.
Ny gow boggey ayns y red shen ta ny mee-chrauee goaill taitnys ayn; agh cooinee nagh jed ad gyn kerraghey gys nyn oaie.

Freill oo hene foddey veih’n dooinney shen ta pooar echey dy varroo; myr shen cha bee oo ayns imnea roish aggle y vaaish; as my hig oo er-gerrey da, bee er dty hwoaie, er aggle dy gow eh dty vioys doaltattym: cooinee dy vel oo gimmeeaght mastey ribbaghyn, as dy vel oo shooyl er voallaghyn yn ard valley.
Cha faggys as oddys oo gow baght jeh dty naboo, as shir coyrle veih’n vooinjer chreeney.
Lhig da dty haggloo ve rish y vooinjer chreeney, as ooilley dty imraa ayns leigh yn er smoo syrjey.
As lhig da deiney cairal gee as giu mayrt, as lhig da dty ghloyraghey ve ayns aggle y Chiarn.
Cordail rish laue yn obbree, bee yn obbyr er ny voylley: as fer-reill creeney yn phobble, son e ghoan.
Ta dooinney jeh drogh-hengey dangeragh ayns e ard valley, as eshyn ta siyragh ayns e haggloo, bee dwoaie er ny chur da.
Nee briw creeney gynsaghey e phobble, as ta reiltys dooinney tushtagh er ny ordrail dy mie.
Myr ta briw yn phobble eh hene, lheid cheddin ta e ir-oik; as cre-erbee yn cheint dy ghooinney ta reiltagh yn ard-valley, lheid cheddin t’adsyn ooilley ta cummal ayn.
Ta ree mee-hushtagh toyrt-mow e phobble, agh liorish yn tushtey ocsyn t’ayns pooar, bee yn ard-valley lane cummaltee.
Ta reiltys y theihll ayns laue yn Chiarn, as ayns traa cooie soie-ee eh harrish fer-reill fondagh.
Ayns laue Yee ta maynrys sheelnaue: as y scrudeyr nee eh coamrey lesh ooashley.
Ny cur dwoaie da dty naboo son dy chooilley assee, as ny jean nhee erbee liorish saaseyn olkyssagh.
Ta moyrn red dwoaiagh roish Jee as dooinney; as kiongoyrt roo ny-neesht te foiljagh.
Kyndagh rish dellal neu-chairagh, asseeyn, as berchys cosnit liorish molteyrys, ta’n reeriaght er ny chaghlaa veih un ashoon gys ashoon elley.
Cre’n-fa ta ooir as joan moyrnagh? cha vel red s’eajee na dooinney sondagh: son ta e lheid creck eer yn annym echey hene, er-y-fa dy vel eh creoghey e chree noi e vioys hene.
Ta’n fer-lhee scughey doghan deinagh, as eshyn ta jiu ny ree mairagh vees eh ny chorp.
Son tra ta dooinney marroo, ta e chronney marish reddyn snauee, beishteigyn, as dhianeyn.
Tra ta moyrn goaill toshiaght, ta dooinney scarrey rish Jee, as ta e chree er ny hyndaa veih e er-croo.
Son ta moyrn toshiaght peccah, as nee e lheid bishaghey ayns eajeeys e pheccaghyn: as shen-y-fa hug y Chiarn lesh orroo arkys atchimagh, as ren eh ad dy bollagh y stroie.
Ta’n Chiarn er cheau harrish stuill reeoil princeyn moyrnagh, as er hoiaghey seose ny imlee ayns nyn ynnyd.
Ta’n Chiarn er astyrt ass ny fraueyn ashoonyn mooaralagh, as er hoiaghey seose ny imlee ayns yn ynnyd oc.
Ta’n Chiarn er choyrt mow cheeraghyn ny ashoonee, as er stroie ad gys undinyn yn ooir.
Paart jeu yiare eh jeh, as hug eh mow, as t’eh er n’eebyrt yn imraa jeu veih yn ooir.
Cha row moyrn kiarit son dooinney, ny jymmoose eulyssagh er y honsyn ta ruggit jeh ben.

Adsyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn t’ad sluight shickyr: as adsyn ta graihagh er, t’ad fraue onnoroil; adsyn nagh vel geill oc da’n leigh, t’ad sluight naareydagh; adsyn ta brishey ny annaghyn, t’ad sluight molteyragh.
Mastey braaraghyn, ta’n ard-er onnoroil, myr shen t’adsyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn ayns y chilley echey.
Ta adsyn, ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, ayns raad ooashley: agh ta raghtaneys as moyrn coyrt uail er.
Lhig da dooinney ve berchagh, onnoroil, ny boght, ta’n ghloyr echey ayns aggle y Chiarn.
Cha vel eh cooie dy hoiaghey beg jeh’n dooinney boght tushtagh; chamoo te jesh dy hoiaghey mooar jeh’n drogh-yantagh.
Bee ooashley er ny choyrt da ard-gheiney, as briwnyn, as sleih pooaral; ny-yeih cha vel fer jeu ny s’ooasle na eshyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn.
Er y charvaant ta creeney nee adsyn ta seyr shirveish: as eshyn ta tushtagh, cha gow eh dy olk rish e oiljyn dy ve inshit da.
Ny gow ort rouyr boggyssagh jeh dty schleï, ayns dty aght beaghee; as ny bee storneishagh ayns dty voghtynid.
Ny share ta’n labbree lesh kuse ymmyrchagh dy chooid seihlt na’n litcher boasteilagh nagh vel greme echey dy ghoaill.
My vac, cosne goo-mie da dty annym lesh meenid, as jean soiaghey jeed hene myr te cooie dhyt.
Quoi nee seyrey eshyn ta jannoo peccah noi yn annym echey hene? as quoi nee soiaghey jehsyn, ta soiaghey beg jeh’n goo-mie echey hene?
Ta’n dooinney boght as soiaghey jeant jeh son e ynsaghey; as jeh’n dooinney berchagh son e verchys.
Eshyn ta soiaghey jeant jeh ayns boghtynid, cre-woad smoo ayns berchys? as eshyn ta beg er ny hoiaghey jeh ayns berchys, cre-woad sloo ayns boghtynid?
Ta creenaght troggal seose yn kione echeysyn ta imlee, as soiaghey eh mastey ard-gheiney.
Ny cur moylley da dooinney son e aalid; chamoo jean beg y hoiaghey jeh dooinney son neu-stoamid e phersoon.
Ta’n shellan beg mastey ny skianee; agh ta’n mess eck yn reih jeh dy chooilley viljid.
Ny jean boggyssagh ass dty choamraghyn aalin, as ny bee mooaralagh ayns laa dty ooashley: son ta obbraghyn y Chiarn yindyssagh, as t’ad erskyn roshtyn dooinney.
Ta ymmodee tranlaasee er ve êginit dy hoie er yn ooir; as ta fer nagh row rieau smooinaghtyn jeh, er cheau yn attey reeoil.
Shimmey dooinney pooaral t’er ve currit sheese dy injil; as adsyn v’ayns stayd ard er nyn livrey gys laueyn joarree.
Ny fow foill derrey t’ou er ronsaghey magh yn irriney: gow toiggal hoshiaght, as eisht cur oghsan.
Ny cur ansoor derrey t’ou er chlashtyn yn chooish; chamoo gow dooinney giare ayns mean e ghlare.
Ny streeu ayns cooish nagh vel bentyn rhyt: as ny soie ayns briwnys marish drogh-yantee.
My vac, ny gow ayrn ayns ymmodee cooishyn: son my t’ou seiy oo hene ayndoo dy mooar, cha bee oo gyn loght; as my t’ou geiyrt daue, cha vow cosney erbee lioroo, chamoo nee oo shaghney coayl as assee.
Ta fer ayn ta laboragh as tarroogh, as dy bragh ayns siyr, agh t’eh wheesh shen smoo ergooyl.
Reesht, ta fer ayn ta moal gys obbyr, as ta feme cooney, laccal fort, as lane dy voghtynid: foast, ta sooill y Chiarn er yeeaghyn er son foays, as er droggal seose eh voish e stayd injil,
As er droggal seose e chione veih treihys, myr shen dy row eh lane yindys dauesyn honnick eh.
Ta maynrys as seaghyn, bea as baase, boghtynid as berchys, cheet voish y Chiarn.
Veih’n Chiarn ta creenaght, tushtey, as toiggal jeh’n leigh: as veihsyn ta graih as y cliaghtey dy obbraghyn mie.
Marranys as dorraghys ghow ad toshiaght marish peccee; as adsyn ta boggyssagh ayns olk, aasee ad shenn ayn.
Ta gioot y Chiarn tannaghtyn marish y vooinjer chrauee, as ta’n foayr echeysyn cur lesh maynrys son dy bragh.
Ta fer ayn ta gaase berchagh liorish imnea as gortys; as shoh leagh e chronney,

Ayns wheesh as dy vel eh gra, Ta mee er gheddyn fea, as nish nee’m soylley y ghoaill jeh my chooid, as foast s’beg fys t’echey cre cha gerrit hig y traa, dy nhegin da faagail ny reddyn shen da feallagh elley, as geddyn baase.
Bee shickyr ayns dty chonaant, as ainjyssagh er, as freill eh choud s’bio oo.

Ny gow yindys jeh obbraghyn drogh-yantee, agh cur dty varrant er y Chiarn, as bee jeidjagh ayns dty obbyr hene; son te red aashagh ayns shilley yn Chiarn, ayns traa gerrit dy yannoo berchagh jeh dooinney boght.
Ta bannaght y Chiarn dy leah cooilleeney yn dooinney crauee, as ayns traa gerrit t’eh coyrt er e vannaght dy vishaghey.
Ny gow ort dy ghra, Cre’n vondeish t’aym liorish my hirveish? as cre ny reddyn mie yioym ny lurg shoh?
Reesht, ny gow ort dy ghra, Ta my haie cooid-seihlt aym, as mooarane ayns my chummal; as cre’n olk oddys cheet my raad ny lurg shoh?
Ayns traa nyn maynrys ta shin jarrood seaghyn; as ayns earish nyn seaghyn cha vel shin arragh cooinaghtyn er maynrys.
Son s’aashagh te da’n Chiarn ayns oor y vaaish, dy chooilleeney dooinney cordail rish e raaidyn.
Ta oor dy phian cur er dooinney jarrood eunys e vea; as ec y jerrey bee ny obbraghyn echey er nyn gronnaghey.
Ny jean dooinney erbee y vriwnys maynrey roish e vaase: son foddee oo baght y ghoaill jeh dooinney ayns e chloan.
Ny jean dy chooilley ghooinney y chuirrey gys dty hie: son ymmodee ta croutyn y volteyr.
Myr eean freilt ayns cage dy volley eeanlee elley, myr shen ta cree yn vooinjer chluicagh; as myr peeikear t’eh lhie cooyl-chlea son dty lhieggey.
Son t’eh lhie farkiaght, as chyndaa mie gys olk, as ayns reddyn toilchin moylley ver eh cômys hood.
Jeh druillin beg ta aile mooar er ny oaddey: as ta’n dooinney foalsey lhie cooyl-chlea er-chee fuill.
Bee er dty hwoaie jeh’n dooinney olkyssagh (son t’eh soit er olkys) er-aggle dy der eh lesh ort drogh-ghoo, nagh bee dy leah jarroodit.
Bee er dty hwoaie kys t’ou goaill stiagh joarree fo dty chlea, er-aggle dy dayrn eh seaghyn ort, as chyndaa oo ass dty chooid hene.
Tra t’ou jannoo thurn mie, cur tastey quoi da t’ou dy yannoo eh: myr shen yiow booise son dty chenjallys.
Bee dooie da’n dooinney mie, as nee oo cooilleeney y gheddyn er y hon; as mannagh vow voishyn eh, ny-yeih son shickyrys voish yn er smoo syrjey.
Cha vod red mie cheet ersyn ta dy kinjagh cur-rish olk: ny ersyn nagh vel cur jeirk.
Cur toyrtys da’n dooinney crauee, as son y drogh yantagh ny cur kemmyrk da.

Jean thurn mie er yn imlee, agh ny coon lesh y vee-chrauee: cum hood hene dty arran, as ny cur dasyn eh, er-aggle dy vow eh laue yn eaghtyr ort liorish: er-nonney dy jean eh dty chooilleeney lesh ghaa wheesh dy olk as t’ou er n’yannoo thurnyn mie da.
Son ta’n Jee smoo syrjey as dwoaie echey er drogh-yantee, as nee eh kerraghey y ghoaill er ny mee chrauee, as t’eh lhiggey lhieu derrey laa yn chooilleeney mooar.
Cur da’n dooinney mie, as ny cooin lesh y drogh-ghooinney.
S’doillee enn y choyrt er carrey choud’s t’ou dy souyr, chamoo oddys noid ve keillit ayns earish dy arkys.
Choud’s ta dooinney jannoo dy mie bee e noidyn seaghnit: agh ayns seaghyn nee e eer charrey jiooldey rish.
Ny jean dy bragh treishteil er dty noid: son myr ta’n yiarn mergaghey, myr shen ta’n olkys echeysyn.

Ga dy vel eh ginjillaghey eh hene, as croymmey sheese kiongoyrt rhyt, ny-yeih gow tastey vie, as bee er dty hwoaie jeh, as bee uss da myr dy beagh oo er ghlenney plate prashey, as ver oo my-ner nagh vod yn mergey echey ve dy slane bollagh er ny ghlenney.

Ny soie liort eh, er-aggle dy bee eh oyr dty lhieggey, as shassoo seose ayns dty ynnyd; chamoo lhig da soie ec dty laue yesh, er-aggle dy gow eh dty stoyl, as oo myr shen, fy-yerrey, dy chooinaghtyn er my ghoan’s, as dy ve guint gys y chree lhieu.
Quoi ghoys chymmey jeh fer-obbee ta lhottit lesh cretooryn nieunagh, ny jeh fer erbee ta cheet coair beishtyn keoie?
Myr shen dy chooilley unnane ta jannoo sheshaght rish y drogh-yantagh, as ta goit ayns ribbey marish ayns e pheccah, quoi ghoys chymmey jeh?
Son tammylt nee eh sheshaght rhyt, agh my ta caslys jeed tuittym, cha vuirree eh veg sodjey.
Ta noid loayrt dy brynnagh lesh e veillyn, agh ayns e chree t’eh shêgin er dty cheau ’sy jeeig: bee eer ny jeir er e ghruaie, agh my oddys eh caa y gheddyn, s’coan hig oo jeh lesh fuill dty vioys.
My hig arkys dty raad, eshyn hoshiaght hig ort; as ga dy lhig eh er dy chooney lhiat, ny-yeih nee eh cleiy foyd.
Nee eh craa e chione, as bwoalley e vassyn, as goaill lane sonsheraght, as caghlaa e eddin.
Eshyn ta loaghtey pick, bee eh sollit lesh; as eshyn ta freayll sheshaght rish dooinney moyrnagh bee eh goll-rishyn.

Choud s’bio oo, ny gow ort errey erskyn dty niart; as ny jean sheshaght rish fer ta ny s’pooaral, as ny s’berchee na oo hene. Son kys ta’n pot as y phash coardail cooidjagh? my ta’n derrey yeh bwoalley noi yn jeh elley, bee yn phash er ny vrishey.
Ta’n dooinney berchagh er n’yannoo assee, as foast t’eh baggyrt: ta’n boght spooillit jeh e chair, as foast shegin da caayney.
My t’ou gys e vondeish nee eh ymmyd y yannoo jeed: agh mannagh vel monney ayd nee eh dty hreigeil.
Choud’s ta cooid ayd, nee eh commee rhyt; nee eh eer dty roostey gyn erreeish ’sy chree.
My ta feme echey ort, nee eh dty volley; as brynneraght rhyt, nee eh dty chleayney lesh goan aalin, as gra, Cre ta dty eme?

As nee eh dty naaraghey lesh e chuirraghyn costal, derrey t’eh er striggey oo chirrym, ayns traa gerrit; as ec y jerrey cha jean eh agh gamman jeed: fy-yerrey tra hee-ys eh oo, nee eh treigeil oo, as craa e chione ort.
Gow kiarail nagh bee oo mollit, as er dty leodaghey liorish lheid y rouanys costal.
My t’ou er dty chuirrey liorish dooinney mooar, fow royd ayns traa; as wheesh shen smoo nee eh dty chuirrey.
Ny jean garrail oo hene ro-hion er, er-aggle dy bee oo obbit; ny shass foddey jeh, er-aggle dy bee oo jarroodit.
Ny gow ort dy ve corrym rish ayns glare, as ny cred ooilley ny t’eh dy ghra: son lesh mooarane glare nee eh dty violaghey, as lesh eddin ghennal ronsee eh magh ny folliaghtyn ayd:
Agh dy goanlyssagh nee eh tashtey seose dty ghoan, as bee eh shickyr dy yannoo assee dhyt, as dy ghoaill oo ayns ribbey.
Gow tastey, as kiarail vie, son t’ou shooyl ayns gaue dy huittym: tra chlinnys oo lheid ny reddyn shoh, bee myr fer lhiggys er dy ve ny chadley.
Cur graih da’n Chiarn choud as t’ou bio, as eïe er son dty haualtys.
Shynney lesh dy chooilley vaagh e ghooie hene, as shynney lesh dy chooilley ghooinney e naboo dooie.
Ta dy chooilley chretoor reih sheshey lurg e ghooie, as nee dy chooilley ghooinney taaghey e lheid hene.
Cre’n sheshaght nee yn moddey-oaldey rish yn eayn? lheid cheddin nee’n drogh-yantagh rish y dooinney crauee.
Cre’n choardail ta eddyr yn hyena as y moddey? as cre’n shee ta eddyr ny berchee as ny boghtyn?
Myr ta’n assyl-oaldey cragh da’n lion ’syn aasagh; myr shen ta ny berchee cur mow ny boghtyn.
Myr ta ny mooaralee as dwoaie oc er injillid-aigney; myr shen ta ny berchee as dwoaie oc er ny boghtyn.
Tra ta dooinney berchagh ayns gaue tuittym, t’eh cummit seose liorish e chaarjyn; agh tra ta dooinney boght er duittym, t’eh jiooldit liorish e chaarjyn.

Tra ta dooinney berchagh er duittym ta ymmodee fir-choonee echey: t’eh loayrt reddyn nagh lhisagh ve raait, as foast nee sleih seyrey eh: va’n dooinney boght mollit, agh ny-yeih hug ad oghsan da; ren eh loayrt dy creeney, agh cha dug ad geill da.

Tra ta’n berchagh loayrt, ta dy chooilley ghooinney ny-host; as jeeagh, cre-erbee t’eh dy ghra, t’ad dy voylley eh gys ny bodjallyn: agh my ta’n boght fosley e veeal, t’ad gra, Quoi eh shoh? as my t’eh marran, ver ad nyn gooney dy cheilley dy choyrt fo-chosh eh.
Ta berchys bannaght dasyn ta er chosney eh fegooish peccah, as ta boghtynid mollaght ayns beeal ny mee-chrauee.
Ta cree dooinney caghlaa e eddin, edyr eh ve son mie ny sie: as ta cree boggoil jannoo eddin ghennal.
Ta eddin ghennal cowrey jeh cree maynrey, as ta ronsaghey magh raaghyn dorraghey obbyr gheinagh da’n aigney.
Bannit ta’n dooinney nagh vel er skyrraghtyn lesh e veeal, as nagh vel guint lesh earroo e pheccaghyn.
Bannit ta eshyn nagh vel e chooinsheanse er gheyrey, as nagh vel er duittym veih e hreishteil ayns y Chiarn.
Cre sheeagh berchys da’n dooinney nagh lhig e chree da ymmyd y yannoo jeh; as cre baillish yn dooinney sondagh jeh argid?
Eshyn ta chaglym liorish molley e chorp hene, t’eh chaglym son feallagh elley, nee baarail e chooid dy rouanagh.
Eshyn ta olk rish hene, quoi rish vees eh mie? cha gow eh soylley jeh e chooid.
Cha vel fer ayn ny smessey na eshyn ta mooaraghey da hene, as ta shoh cooilleeney er e olkys.
As my t’eh jannoo dy mie, t’eh jannoo eh marran as fy-yerrey t’eh coyrt e olkys er-ash.
Ta’n dooinney trooagh, as sooill sondagh echey, t’eh chyndaa ersooyl e eddin, as soiaghey beg jeh ny boghtyn.
Cha vel sooill yn dooinney sondagh bwooiagh lesh e chooid hene, as ta olkys yn vee-chrauee shirgaghey seose e annym.
Ta sooill sondagh mooaraghey yn arran t’eh dy ee, as t’eh ny phiteog ec e voayrd hene.
My vac, jean mooar jeed hene, rere dty fort, as cur da’n Chiarn yn cheesh ta cair da.
Cooinee nagh vuirree yn baase foddey, as nagh vel conaant yn oaie soilshit dhyt.
Jeeagh kenjallys da dty charrey roish my vow baase, as lurg rere dty phooar sheeyn magh dty laue, as cur da’n voght.
Jean mooar jeed hene er laa mie feailley, as ny jean shaghney dy ghoaill ayrn ayns dy chooilley yeearree mie.
Nagh n’aag oo cooid dty hooilleil da feallagh elley? as dty chosney deinagh son cooid ronney?
Cur as gow, as jean mooar jeh dty annym, son jeh dty chooid seihlt cha vod oo goaill soylley ’syn oaie.
Ta dy chooilley eill gaase shenn myr garmad: son ta’n conaant veih’n toshiaght, Dy vow son shickyrys baase.
Goll-rish duillagyn glassey er billey banglaneagh, ta paart tuittym, as paart gaase; shen myr ta sheelogheyn feill as fuill ta fer geddyn baase, as fer elley er ny ruggey.
Ta dy chooilley obbyr loau as shymley ersooyl, as hed yn obbree hene mow myr-chaagh.
S’maynrey yn dooinney ta dy dowin smooinaghtyn er reddyn mie ayns creenaght, as ta resooney mychione nheeghyn casherick liorish e hushtey:
Ta goaill gys e chree ny raaidyn eck, as toiggal echey myrgeddin ayns ny folliaghtyn eck.
Ta goll er e eiyrt’s myr scrialtagh geyre, as farkiaght ayns ny raaidyn eck:
Ta jeeaghyn dy aggindagh gys ny uinniagyn eck, as geaishtagh ec ny dorryssyn eck:
Ta goaill aaght er-gerrey da’n thie eck, as myrgeddin kibbin shickyr echey ayns ny voallaghyn eck.
Nee eh soiaghey e chabbane er-gerrey jee, as nee eh aaght y ghoaill fo clea raad ta reddyn mie ry gheddyn.
Nee eh e chloan y hoiaghey fo’n fastee ecksh, as aaght y ghoaill fo e banglaneyn.
Lioreeish bee eh er ny choadey veih yn fowan-loshtee, as fo yn ghloyr ecksh nee eh beaghey.
Nee eshyn ta ayns aggle y Chiarn jannoo dy mie, as eshyn ta tushtagh ’sy leigh, nee ish y chosney.
As myr moir ver ee quaaltys da, as goaill-rish myr ben-aeg noa-poost.
Lesh yn arran dy hushtey nee ish eshyn y veaghey, as ver ee da yn ushtey dy chreenaght dy iu.
Ver eh e varrant urree, as cha bee eh er ny scughey; nee eh treishteil urree, as cha bee eh ny haart.
Nee ish eshyn y hroggal erskyn e naboonyn, as ayns mean y cho-chruinnaght, nee ish fosley e veeal.
Yiow eshyn boggey as attey dy varriaght, as ver ee da ayns eiraght goo as ennym foddey beayn.
Agh son deiney ommijagh, cha jean ad ee y chosney, as cha jean drogh-gheiney cur-my-ner ee.
Son t’ee foddey veih moyrn, as son breagyryn cha vel ad smooinaghtyn urree.
Cha vel raaghyn-creeney cooie ayns beeal drogh-ghooinney, son cha row eh curmit er veih’n Chiarn.
Son bee raaghyn-creeney er n’ockley magh lesh tushtey, as nee yn Chiarn jannoo mie jeh.
Ny abbyr uss, She kyndagh rish y Chiarn huitt mee ayns peccah: son cha lhisagh oo jannoo ny reddyn ta dwoaie echey orroo.
Ny abbyr uss, T’eh er choyrt orrym goll er-shaghryn: son cha vel feme echey er dooinney peccoil.
Ta dwoaie ec y Chiarn er dy chooilley ghrogh-obbyr, as adsyn ta ayns aggle Yee cha nhynney lhieu eh.
Eshyn eh chroo dooinney ’sy toshiaght, as daag eh eh ayns laue e choyrle hene:
My sailt; dy reayll ny annaghyn, as dy chooilleeney yn ynrickys taitnyssagh,
T’eh er hoiaghey aile as ushtey kiongoyrt rhyt; sheeyn magh dty laue, as gow dty reih.
Kiongoyrt rish dooinney ta bioys as baase, as bee e reih hene er ny choyrt da.
Son s’mooar ta creenaght y Chiarn, t’eh niartal ayns pooar, as cur-my-ner dy chooilley nhee.
As ta e hooillyn orroosyn ta goaill aggle roish, as shione da ooilley obbraghyn dooinney.
Cha vel eh er n’êginaghey dooinney erbee dy yannoo dy olk, chamoo t’eh er choyrt da dooinney erbee kied dy chur-rish peccah.
Ny jean geearree dy ve ayd earroo dy ghrogh-chloan; chamoo gow taitnys ayns mec mee chrauee.
Ga dy vel ad bishaghey, ny gow boggey ayndoo mannagh bee aggle y Chiarn mâroo.
Ny treisht uss gys y vioys oc, chamoo cur dty varrant ’syn earroo oc; son ta un er mie ny share na thousane, as te ny share dhyt baase y gheddyn gyn cloan, na drogh chloan ’ve ayd.
Son liorish fer ta tushtagh bee yn ard-valley er ny vishaghey: agh kynney ny mee-chrauee vees dy leah nyn draartys.
Shimmey lheid shoh ta my hooillyn er vakin, as ta my chleaysh er chlashtyn reddyn s’yindyssagh n’ad shoh.
Ayns chaglym-cooidjagh ny mee-chrauee vees aile er ny oaddey, as ayns ashoon mee-viallagh ta jymmoose soit er aile.
Cha lhig eh lesh ny shenn tranlaasee, ren tuittym ersooyl ayns treishteil ommijagh nyn niart hene.
Chamoo ren eh sparail yn ynnyd raad va Lot cummal, agh hug eh dwoaie daue son nyn moyrn.
Cha row eh erreeishagh er y pobble dy hoyrt-mow, va giarit jeh ayns nyn beccaghyn:
N’yn shey cheead thousane
As my vees fer creoi-wannallagh mastey yn pobble, te yindys my scapys eh gyn kerraghey: son mârishyn ta myghin as jymmoose; t’eh niartal dy leih, as dy gheayrtey magh e yymmoose.
Myr ta e vyghin mooar, ta e smaght myrgeddin: t’eh briwnys dooinney cordail rish e obbraghyn.
Cha jean y tranlaasagh scapail lesh e spooilley, as cha bee meenid y dooinney ynrick ayns fardail.
Cur raad da dy chooilley obbyr vyghinagh: son yiow dy chooilley ghooinney cordail rish e obbraghyn.
Lhig y Chiarn da Pharaoh v’er ny chreoghey, nagh dug eh geill da: dy voddagh e obbraghyn yindyssagh ve soilshit da’n theihll.
Ta e vyghin er ny hoilshaghey er dy chooilley chretoor, as t’eh er scarrey yn soilshey veih yn dorraghys lesh cagliagh adamant.

Ny abbyr uss, Nee’m mee hene y cheiltyn veih’n Chiarn; quoi ver geill dooys veih’n yrjid? cha bee cooinaghtyn jee’m mastey whilleen pobble: son cre ta’n annym aym’s mastey lheid yn earroo erskyn-earroo dy chretooryn?
Cur-my-ner, bee niau, as niau ny niaughyn, yn diunid, as y thalloo, as ooilley ny t’ayndoo er creau, tra hig eshyn dy ghoaill kerraghey.
Bee ny sleityn myrgeddin as undinyn y thallooin er nyn graa lesh atchim, tra yeeaghys y Chiarn orroo.
Cha vod cree erbee smooinaghtyn dy feeu er ny reddyn shoh: as quoi oddys toiggal e raaidyn?
Te dullyr dowin nagh vod dooinney erbee cur-my-ner; son ta’n chooid smoo jeh e obbraghyn keillit.
Quoi oddys soilshaghey obbraghyn e chairys; ny quoi oddys shassoo rhymboo? son ta e chonaant erskyn nyn roshtyn, as ta prowal dy chooilley nhee ’sy jerrey.
Eshyn ta gyn tushtey smooinys er reddyn fardalagh: as ta dooinney ommijagh fo shaghrynys, as e chree soit er ommijys:
Eaisht rhym, my vac, as ynsee tushtey, as cur tastey da my ghoan lesh dty chree.
Neem’s soilshaghey dhyt ynsaghey dowin, as nee’m fockley magh e hushtey dy kiart.
Ta’n Chiarn er hoiaghey ooilley e obbraghyn ayns ard-order er-dyn toshiaght: as dy chooilley nhee ’syn ynnyd echey hene, tra ren eh ad y chroo.
T’eh dy aalin er choamrey e obbraghyn son dy bragh, as ayns e laue ta’n ard-reill oc gys dy chooilley heeloghe; cha vel ad tooillit, ny deinagh, ny scuirr veih nyn obbraghyn.
Cha vel y derrey yeh lhiettal y jeh elley, as cha bee ad dy bragh mee-viallagh da e ghoo.
Lurg shoh yeeagh y Chiarn er y thalloo, as lhieen eh eh lesh e vannaghtyn.
Lesh dy chooilley cheint dy chretooryn bio, t’eh er choodaghey yn eaghtyr echey, as gys shen nee ad reesht chyndaa.
Ren y Chiarn dooinney y chroo ass yn ooir, as gys shen t’eh dy hyndaa eh reesht.
Hug eh daue beggan dy laghyn, as traa giare, as pooar myrgeddin harrish dy chooilley nhee seihltagh.
Ren eh ad y choamrey lesh pooaraghyn cooie daue, as chroo eh [dooinney] ayns e chaslys hene,
As hug eh aggle dooinney er dy chooilley chretoor, as hug eh reill da harrish maase as eeanlee.
[Hooar ad veih’n Chiarn ymmyd ny queig pooaraghyn, as ayns y cheyoo ynnyd hug eh daue tushtey, as ’sy chiaghtoo, glare, dy hoilshaghey ny smooinaghtyn echey.]
Hug eh daue coyrle, as chengey, as sooillyn, cleayshyn, as cree dy hoiggal.
Marish shoh ren eh magh ad lesh keeayll as tushtey, as hoilshee eh daue mie as sie.
T’eh er hoiaghey sooill ayns ny creeaghyn oc, dy hoilshaghey daue mooadys e obbraghyn.
Hug eh orroo dy ghoaill boggey ayns e obbraghyn yindyssagh son dy bragh, dy hoilshaghey e obbraghyn lesh tushtey.
As y vooinjer reiht ver moylley da’n ennym casherick echey.
Marish shoh, hug eh daue tushtey, as leigh yn vea, son eiraght.
Ren eh conaant dy bragh beayn roo, as hoilshee eh daue e vriwnyssyn.
Honnick ny sooillyn oc ard-ooashley e ghloyr, as cheayll ny cleayshyn oc e choraa gloyroil.
As dooyrt eh roo, Bee-jee er nyn dwoaie jeh dy chooilley neu-ynrickys, as hug eh sarey da dagh dooinney mychione e naboo.
Ta ny raaidyn oc kinjagh kiongoyrt rish, as cha bee ad keillit veih e hooillyn.
Ta dagh dooinney veih e aegid lhiantyn gys olk, chamoo oddagh ad meiyghey nyn greeaghyn cloaie gys creeaghyn foalley.
Son ayns rheynn ashoonyn y slane seihll, hoie eh fer-reill harrish dagh pobble: agh ta Israel cronney yn Chiarn:
As myr v’eshyn e vac shinney, t’eh dy hroggal eh lesh ynsagh, as coyrt da soilshey e ghraih, cha vel eh treigeil eh.
Shen-y-fa ta ooilley nyn obbraghyn myr y ghrian kiongoyrt rish, as ta ny sooillyn echey kinjagh er ny raaidyn oc.
Cha vel veg jeh nyn ghrogh obbraghyn keillit voishyn, agh ta ooilley nyn beccaghyn kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn.
Agh myr va’n Chiarn graysoil, as sooill echey gys e obbraghyn hene, cha daag eh, ny cha hreig eh ad, agh dymmyrk eh lhieu.
Ta giastyllys dooinney myr fo seal kiongoyrt rish, as t’eh freayll obbraghyn mie dooinney myr clagh y thooill, as ver eh yn grayse dy arrys da e vec as e inneenyn.
Fy-yerrey nee eh troggal er, as cooilleeney ad, as coyrt nyn leagh er nyn ghing.
Agh dauesyn ghow arrys, hug eh yn grayse dy hyndaa, as ren eh dy meen gerjaghey ny annoonee.
Chyndaa gys y Chiarn, as treig dty pheccaghyn, as gow padjer kiongoyrt rish, as ny cur-rish peccah ny smoo.
Chyndaa reesht gys yn er smoo syrjey, as treig dty vee-chraueeaght: son ver eh lesh oo ass dorraghys gys soilshey slayntoil; as cur dwoaie erskyn-towse da dy chooilley ghrogh-obbyr.
Quoi ver moylley da’n er smoo syrjey ’syn oaie, ynnyd ocsyn ta bio, as coyrt booise?
Ta toyrt booise cherraghtyn veih ny merriu, myr veih fer nagh vel ayn; ny bioee, ta firrinagh ayns cree, ver moylley da’n Chiarn.
Cre wheesh as ta kenjallys ghraihagh y Chiarn nyn Yee, as e erreeish dauesyn ta chyndaa huggey ayns casherickys!
Son cha vod dy chooilley nhee mie ve ayns dooinney, er-yn-oyr nagh vel eh agh cretoor marvaanagh.
Cre ta ny sollys na’n ghrian? ny-yeih ta e hoilshey failleil: as nee feill as fuill smooinaghtyn er olk.
T’eh cur-my-ner pooar yrjid niau, as cha vel dy chooilley ghooinney agh ooir as leoie.
Yn Jee ta dy bragh beayn ta er chroo dy chooilley nhee ’sy theihll.
Ta’n Chiarn ny-lomarcan cairal, chamoo ta [Chiarn] erbee agh eshyn:

Ta reill yn seihll lesh bass e laue, as ta dy chooilley nhee coyrt biallys da’n aigney echey: son t’eh ny ree harrish ooilley liorish e phooar; scarrey reddyn casherick ny mast’ oc veih neu-chasherick.
Quoi oddys dy feeu soilshaghey e obbraghyn? ny dy feeu fockley-magh e obbraghyn ooasle?
Quoi nee coontey niart e ard-ooashley: as quoi nee e vyghinyn y ockley magh?
Er son obbraghyn yindyssagh y Chiarn, cha vod veg ve goit voue, ny veg er ny choyrt huc, chamoo oddys yn bun oc v’er ny gheddyn magh.
Erreish da dooinney v’er n’yannoo jerrey, cha vel eh eisht agh goaill toshiaght: as tra t’eh scuirr, t’eh foast imneagh.
Cre ta dooinney, as cre’n ymmyd t’ayn? cre ta’n foays, as cre ta’n olk echey?
Ta earroo laghyn dooinney ec y chooid smoo queig-feed bleïn.
Myr ta bine dy ushtey gys y faarkey, as clagh-ghravel ayns co-soylagh jeh’n gheinnagh, myr shen ta thousane bleïn gys ny laghyn dy bragh farraghtyn.
Shen-y-fa ta Jee gymmyrkey lhieu, as deayrtey magh e vyghin orroo.
Honnick eh, as hug eh my-ner yn jerrey oc dy ve olk; shen-y-fa vishee eh yn erreeish echey.
Ta myghin dooinney gys e naboo; agh ta myghin y Chiarn er dy chooilley chretoor: t’eh coyrt oghsan, as dy reirey, as gynsaghey, as leeideil, myr ta bochil e hioltane.
T’eh myghinagh dauesyn ta goaill ynsaghey, as ta shirrey dy imneagh lurg e vriwnyssyn.
My vac, ny tayrn drogh-ghoo er dty obbraghyn mie, chamoo cur goan oltooanagh lesh dty yiastyllys.
Nagh jean y druight meenagh yn chiass? myr shen ta ansoor gerjoilagh ny share na gioot.
Cur-my-ner, nagh vel lheid yn ansoor ny share na gioot? agh t’ad ny-neesht marish dooinney graysoil.
Ta ommydan goltooan dy fargagh, as ta gioot y dooinney trooagh cur mow ny sooillyn.
Fow ynsaghey roish my ghoys oo ort dy loayrt, as gow saaseyn cooie cour chingys.
Roish briwnys feysht oo hene, as ayns laa yn cherraghey yiow myghin.
Jean oo hene y injillaghey roish my vees oo ching, as son dty vea pheccoil soilshee arrys.
Ny lhig da nhee erbee dty lhiettal veih cooilleeney dty vreearrey ayns traa cooie, as ny lhig shaghey derrey’n baase dy lhiasaghey dty vea.
Roish my ghoys oo padjer, smooinee ort hene; as ny bee myr fer ta jannoo craid er y Chiarn.
Smooinee er y jymmoose vees ec y jerrey, as earish y chooilleeney tra hyndaa-ys eh ersooyl e eddin.
Tra t’ou jeant magh, cooinee er traa yn accyrys: as tra t’ou berchagh, smooinee er boghtynid as ymmyrch.
Veih moghrey derrey’n astyr ta’n traa caghlaa, as ta dagh nhee dy leah jeant roish y Chiarn.
Bee dooinney creeney twoaiagh ayns dy chooilley nhee, as ’syn earish pheccoil freillee eh eh-hene gyn-loght: agh cha der yn ommydan geill da traa erbee.
Ta dy chooilley ghooinney tushtagh as ainjys echey er creenaght, as ver eh moylley dasyn t’er gheddyn ee.
Adsyn va tushtagh ayns raaghyn-creeney, haink ad dy ve creeney ad hene, as dy ockley-magh ymmodee raaghyn-creeney.
Ny cur raad da dty hayntyn foalley, agh smaghtee oo hene veih dty yeearreeyn.
My ver uss da dty annym ny eunyssyn t’ee dy yeearree, ver ee ort dy ve son faghid ec dty noidyn ta craidey mood.
Ny gow rouyr taitnys ayns gien mie, chamoo bee kianlt gys y chost echey.
Ny jean boght jeed hene liorish beaghey dy seyr er eeasaght, tra nagh vel monney ayd ayns dty sporran: son nee oo lhie cooyl-chlea son dty vioys hene, as bee oo oc son an-ghoo.
Yn labbree ta geiyrt er meshtallys cha bee eh berchagh: as eshyn ta soiaghey beg jeh reddyn fardalagh, nee tuittym ny veggan as ny veggan.
Ver feeyn as mraane er eer deiney creeney dy huittym ersooyl; as eshyn ta lhiantyn gys streebee hig eh dy ve gyn-nearey.
Yiow ny lhemeenyn as beishteigyn eshyn son eiraght, as bee dooinney gyn-nearey goit ersooyl.
Eshyn ta cur geill da nyn lheid, t’eh jeh kione eddrym, as eshyn ta cur-rish lheid ny peccaghyn t’eh jannoo aggair er e annym hene.
Eshyn ta e haitnys ayns peccaghyn foalley vees er ny gheyrey: agh eshyn ta dooney e hooillyn nyn ’oï, t’eh coamrey e vea lesh yn attey dy laynt.
Eshyn oddys reill e hengey nee beaghey fegooish anvea, as eshyn ta shaghney branlaadeeys t’eh shaghney mooarane seaghyn.
Ny soilshee da fer elley shen ny ta inshit dhyt’s, as cha jean oo farrail veg smessey.
Edyr eh ve rish carrey ny noid, ny tar harrish ymmyrkey-bea deiney elley, as my oddys oo gyn-loght, ny jean ad y vrah.
Son cheayll eh, as hug eh tastey dhyt, as hig y traa dy der eh dwoaie dhyt.
My t’ou er chlashtyn an-ghoo freill ayd hene eh, as dy firrinagh focklagh cha jean eh dty scoltey.
Ta ommydan er-yn-eayn lesh skeeal, myr ta ben er troailt er lhiannoo.
Goll-rish side ayns slheeasid dooinney, shen myr ta skeeal ayns cree yn ommydan.
Gow coyrle rish dty charrey, foddee nagh vel eh er n’yannoo eh: as my t’eh er n’yannoo eh; nagh jean eh arragh eh.
Gow coyrle rish dty charrey, foddee nagh vel eh er ghra eh; as my t’eh, nagh loayr eh arragh jeh.
Gow coyrle rish dty charrey; son foddee eh ve goo scammyltagh, as ny cred dy chooilley skeeal.
Ta fer ta skyrraghtyn lesh e hengey, agh cha nee jeh e yoïn; as quoi eh hene nagh vel er n’yannoo cômys lesh e hengey?
Jean dty naboo y choyrlaghey roish my jean oo baggyrt er, as smaghtaghey dty chorree, cur ammys da leigh yn er smoo syrjey.
Ta aggle y Chiarn yn chied chesmad dy ve goit gys foayr liorish, as ta creenaght cosney e ghraih.
Ta tushtey jeh annaghyn y Chiarn, ynsagh y vea: as yiow adsyn ta dy wooiys eh, mess billey yn vea dy bragh farraghtyn.
Ta aggle y Chiarn slane creenaght, as ayns siane creenaght ta cooilleeney yn leigh, as tushtey jeh e phooar ooilley-niartal.
My jir sharvaant rish e vainshtyr, Cha jean-yms myr sailt, ga ny-yeih t’eh dy yannoo eh, t’eh brasnaghey eshyn ta dy veaghey eh.
Dy ve keeayllagh ayns drogh-yannoo cha nee creenaght shen; chamoo ec traa erbee ta coyrle drogh-leih, tushtey.
Ta mee-chraueeaght ayn, as y chooid cheddin feohdoil, as ta’n ommydan giare ayns tushtey.
Ta eer eshyn ta moal ayns tushtey, as goaill aggle roish Jee, ny share na fer lesh ny smoo dy cheeayll, ta brishey leigh yn er smoo syrjey.
Ta kialgeyrys dowin ayns cooishyn, as shen neu-chairal, as ta fer ta cassey cairys dy hoilshaghey briwnys: agh ta’n dooinney creeney jannoo briwnys cairal.
Ta drogh-ghooinney ayn ta croymmey sheese e chione dy groamagh; agh ta e chree lane dy volteyrys.
Croymmey sheese e eddin, as lhiggey er myr nagh vel eh clashtyn: raad nagh vel enney er ny choyrt er, nee eh skielley dhyt roish my vees oo er dty hwoaie.
As mannagh vel y fort ayn foast dy yannoo aggair, ny-yeih tra yiow eh caa nee eh yn olk.
Foddee enney v’er ny choyrt er dooinney liorish e hilley, as er y dooinney keeayllagh liorish e eddin, tra hig eh dty raad.
Ta coamrey yn dooinney, as garaghtee grindyragh, as shooyl staydoilagh soilshaghey cre te.
Ta oghsan, nagh vel currit ayns traa cooie: reesht, ta dooinney, ta cummal e hengey, as t’eh creeney.
Ta coyrle foshlit ny share na corree keillit: as nee eshyn ta goaill-rish e oiljyn shaghney dagh olk.
Cre cha mie te tra ta oghsan er ny choyrt dhyt, dy hoilshaghey arrys! son myr shen nee oo shaghney peccah jeh dty yoïn.
Myr ta saynt dooinney gennish dy ghoaill moidyn er-êgin; myrgeddin t’eshyn ta cassey briwnys er-niart.
Ta fer tostagh ayn, as t’eh er ny gheddyn dy ve creeney: as ta fer elley liorish lane beealeraght cheet dy ve dwoaiagh.
Ta dooinney ny ghaa cummal e hengey, er-yn-oyr nagh vel veg echey dy ghra; as fer elley ny-host, toiggal e hraa.
Nee dooinney creeney cummal e hengey, derrey heeys eh caa; agh cha der y pleadeyr beealeragh, ny ommydan, geill da traa erbee.
Ver sleih feoh da’n perkin: as bee dwoaie oc ersyn ta goaill rouyr taggloo er.
Ta drogh-ghooinney ayn ta raahoil ayns e ghrogh-yannoo; as ta cosney ayn ta chyndaa gys coayl.
Ta toyrtys ayn nagh jean veg dy vie dhyt: as ta toyrtys ayn, ta’n cooilleeney echey dooble.
Ta fer dy injillaghey eh hene ayns treishteil dy ve ny share; as fer elley troggal seose e chione veih stayd injil.
Ta fer ayn ta kionnaghey mooarane son red fardalagh, as geeck er shiaght-filley.
Ta dooinney creeney liorish e ghoan geddyn graih da hene; agh ta feoiltys ny ommydanyn gys beggan ymmyd.
Cha jean gioot yn ommydan foays dhyt lurg da ve ayd; ny toyrtys y trooagh, son dy row eh êginit veih: son t’eh jerkal rish mooarane cosney veih red fardalagh.
Son y veggan t’eh dy choyrt, t’eh mooaraghey dy creoi, t’eh fosley e veeal myr kiaullaneyder: t’eh geeasagh jiu, as shirrey reesht mairagh: ta lheid y fer dwoaiagh fenish Jee as dooinney.
Ta’n ommydan gra, Cha vel carrey ’sy theihll aym, cha vel booise aym son ooilley my obbyr vie as t’adsyn ta beaghey orrym loayrt dy olk jee’m.
Cre cha mennick, as cre whilleen nee craidey mysh! son cha vel tushtey echey dy yannoo ymmyd mie jeh shen ny t’echey: as te un chooid da dy ve n’egooish.
Te ny sauchey dy skirraghtyn er pavement na lesh y chengey: myr shen hig lhieggey ny mee-chrauee doaltattym orroo.
Ta skeeal ommijagh dy kinjagh ayns beeal y vlebbin.
Bee eer raa creeney as beggan soit jeh veih beeal yn ommydan: son cha jig eh magh lesh ayns imbagh cooie.
Ta fer ayn t’er ny lhiettal veih peccah er arkys: as tra t’eh goaill fea, cha bee eh seaghnit.
Ta fer ayn ta stroie e annym liorish nearey, as liorish soiaghey jeh persoonyn jannoo aggair da hene.
Ta fer ayn, nagh lhig e nearey da gobbal e charrey, as t’eh jannoo eh e noid son veg.
Ta breg ny lheamys graney ayns dooinney, foast te kinjagh ayns beeal fer y drogh-ynsagh.
Ta marliagh hene ny share na’n breagerey kinjagh: as toyrt-mow vees y cronney oc ny-neesht.
Ta ymmyrkey-bea breagerey scammyltagh, as ta nearey kinjagh mârish.
Nee dooinney creeney eh hene y hroggal gys ooashley lesh e ghoan; as nee eshyn ta tushtagh ny ard-gheiney y vooiys.
Eshyn ta dy jeidjagh laboraght e halloo, nee eh bishaghey e chooid: as yiow eshyn ta ayns foayr ard-gheiney leih son e oiljyn.
Ta toyrtyssyn as giootyn dolley sooillyn y dooinney creeney, as dooney e veeal nagh vod eh coyrt oghsan.
Creenaght ta keillit, as tashtaghyn y phrughag, cre’n vondeish t’ayndoo ny-neesht?
Ny share t’eshyn ta keiltyn e ommijys na dooinney ta keiltyn e chreenaght.
Ta meenid ymmyrchagh ayns shirrey yn Chiarn, ny share na eshyn ta gymmyrkey e vea fegooish leeideilagh.
My vac, vel oo er n’yannoo peccah? ny jean y lheid arragh, agh shir leih son ny peccaghyn t’ou er n’yannoo.
Chea veih peccah, myr veih eddin yn ard-nieu: son my hig oo ro aggys da, lhottee eh oo: ta ny feeacklyn echey myr feeacklyn lion, stroie anmeenyn deiney.
Ta dy chooilley pheccah goll-rish cliwe dy ghaa-foyr, cha vod ny lhottyn echey v’er ny lheihys.
Dy vaggyrt, as dy yannoo aggair, nee stroie berchys: myr shoh vees thie deiney mooaralagh jeant ny hraartys.
Ta padjer ass beeal dooinney boght roshtyn gys cleayshyn Yee, as ta e vriwnys cheet dy tappee.
Eshyn nagh gow rish oghsan v’er ny choyrt da, t’eh ayns raad drogh leih; agh eshyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, ghoys arrys veih e chree.
Ta dooinney tagglooagh as eh cronnit foddey as gerrit, agh ta dooinney tastagh toiggal tra t’eh skirraghtyn.
Eshyn ta troggal e hie lesh argid eeasit, ta goll-rish fer ta chaglym claghyn da hene, son e lhiaght-oanluckee.
Ta co-chruinnaght ny mee-chrauee myr kionnan dy lieen-barree: dy ve stroit fy-yerrey ayns blaze dy aile.
Ta raad peccee jeant rea lesh claghyn, agh te goaill jerrey ayns ooig niurin.
T’eshyn ta freayll leigh yn Chiarn geddyn tushtey jeh: as ta aggle y Chiarn bun creenaght.
Eshyn nagh vel creeney, cha gow eh ynsagh: agh ta creenaght ayn ta bishaghey sneih-aigney.
Nee tushtey dooinney creeney bishaghey myr thooilley: as ta’n choyrle echey goll-rish farrane glen dy vea.
Ta cree yn ommydan myr saagh brisht, as cha gum eh tushtey choud as t’eh bio.
My chlinnys dooinney tushtagh raa-creeney, ver eh moylley da, as goaill huggey hene eh; agh tra chlinnys yn ommydan y lheid, te jannoo corree jeh, as t’eh cur cooyl rish.
Ta taggloo yn ommydan myr errey-lhiettal ’sy raad; agh bee grayse ry-gheddyn ayns meillyn y dooinney creeney.
T’ad goaill coyrle ec beeal y dooinney creeney ayns y whaiyl, as nee ad smooinaghtyn er e ghoan ayns nyn gree.
Ta creenaght yn ommydan goll naardey myr tholtan; as ta tushtey yn vee-cheeayllagh goll-rish glare branlaadee.
Ta ynsagh da ommydanyn myr lankeid er e chassyn, as geulaghyn er e laue yesh.
Ta’n ommydan troggal seose e choraa lesh ard-gharraghtee, agh son y dooinney creeney s’coan t’eh er ny chlashtyn.
Ta ynsagh myr jewel airh da dooinney creeney, as myr bracelet costal er e roih yesh.
Ta cass yn ommydan ro-vennick taaghey thie e naboo: agh raad ta dooinney mie-ynsit bee nearey er jannoo y lheid.
Nee ommydan peeikearagh stiagh er dorrys; agh nee eshyn ta mie-ynsit shaghney shen.
Te drogh-ynsagh ayns dooinney dy eaishtagh ec y dorrys: agh nee dooinney creeney shaghney lheid yn oltooan.
Bee meillyn ny beealeree loayrt jeh cooishyn nagh vel bentyn daue: agh ta goan deiney tushtagh er nyn dhowse ayns ny meihaghyn.
Ta cree ny mee-hushtee ayns nyn meeal, agh ta beeal y vooinjer chreeney ayns nyn gree.
Tra ta’n vee-chrauee gwee mollaght da Satan, t’eh gwee mollaght da’n annym echey hene.
Ta tutler tayrn loght er e annym hene, as t’eh dwoaiagh cre theihll t’eh cummal.
Ta dooinney litcheragh er ny hoylaghey gys clagh ’sy laagh, as nee dagh unnane craidey mysh gys e nearey.
Ta dooinney litcheragh er ny hoylaghey gys trustyr: nee dy chooilley unnane ta bentyn rish craa ass e laue eh.
Ta mac dy ghrogh-ynsagh mee-ooashley e ayr hooar eh: as ta inneen [ommijagh] ruggit gys e assee.
Ver inneen chreeney lh’ee eiraght gys e sheshey; agh t’eeish ta beaghey neu-onneragh trimshey da e ayr.
Nee yn unnane ghaaney tayrn scammylt chammah er e ayr as e sheshey, agh nee ad ny-neesht beg y hoiaghey j’eeish.
Ta naight ass imbagh cooie myr ronneeaght ec farrarey: agh ta oghsan as smaght dy chreenaght cooie ec dy chooilley hraa.
Quoi-erbee ta gynsaghey ommydan, t’eh casley rishyn ta thah yn shlig, as casley rishyn ta doostey fer ass cadley trome.
Ta eshyn, ta ginsh skeeal da ommydan, loayrt rish fer ta ayns saveenys: lurg da v’er n’insh e skeeal, jir eh, Cre ta’n chooish?
My ta cloan beaghey dy onneragh, as fort oc, nee ad coodaghey ymmyrch nyn ayraghyn.
Agh adsyn ta gymmyrkey ad hene dy moyrnagh, as dy mooaralagh, trooid drogh-ynsagh, nee tayrn scammylt er ooashley nyn gynney.

Jean dobberan son y varroo, son t’eh er choayl y toilshey; as jean dobberan son ommydan, son t’eh gyn tushtey: ny jean agh beggan dobberan son y varroo, son t’eh ec fea: agh ta bea yn ommydan ny smessey na baase.
Slane shiaghtin ta deiney dobberan son y varroo; agh son ommydan as dooinney mee-chrauee, ooilley laghyn e vea.

Ny jean cooid vooar dy haggloo rish ommydan, as ny jean sheshaght rish fer mee-hushtagh: bee er dty hwoaie jeh er-aggle dy vow seaghyn, as cha bee oo dy bragh mollit lesh e ommijys: shaghyn eh, as yiow fea, as cha bee oo boirit lesh e vee-cheïlid.
Cre ta ny s’trimmey na leoaie? as cre ta’n ennym echey, agh ommydan?
Ta genniagh, as sollan, as errey dy yiarn, ny s’assey dy v’er ny ymmyrkey, na dooinney gyn tushtey.
Myr nagh vod fuygh ta kianlt as juntit dy cheilley ayns buildal, v’er ny lhaggaghey lesh craa: myrgeddin yn cree t’er ny hickyraghey lesh coyrle vie, cha gow eh aggle ec traa erbee.
Ta cree t’er ny hickyraghey er smooinaghtyn creeney, goll-rish plaistyral aalin er voalley galleree.
Myr nagh vod radling troggit er yn yrjey shassoo noi niart ny geayee: myr shen cha vod cree agglagh, ayns smooinaghtyn ommydan, shassoo noi aggle erbee.
Eshyn ta coyrt gah ’sy thooill, ver er jeir tuittym; as eshyn, ta coyrt guin ’sy chree, ver er soilshaghey e hushtey.
Quoi-erbee hilgys clagh er eeanlee, scaa-ee eh ad ersooyl: as t’eshyn, ta goltooaney e charrey, brishey caardys.
Ga dy hayrn oo cliwe er dty charrey, foast ny jean mee-hreishteil: son foddee foast coardail y ve eddyr shiu.

My t’ou er n’osley dty veeal noi dty charrey, ny gow aggle: son foddee shee ve jeant: er-lhimmey son oltooan, ny moyrn, ny brah folliaghtyn, ny builley follit: son ver ny reddyn shoh scarrey eddyr eer caarjyn.

Bee firrinagh gys dty naboo ayns e voghtynid, dy vod oo boggey ’ghoaill mârish ayns e vaynrys: shass liorish dy shickyr ayns earish e heaghyn, dy vod cronney ’ve ayd mârish ayns e eiraght: son cha vel stayd injil dy kinjagh as beg dy v’er ny hoiaghey jeh: chamoo yn berchagh ta ommijagh, as ard-soiagh dy ve jeant jehsyn.
Myr ta bree as jaagh y choirrey goll roish yn aile: myrgeddin ta oltooan roish fuill.
Cha goym nearey dy endeil carrey: chamoo nee’m keiltyn mee-hene veih.
As my haghyrys olk erbee dou liorish, bee dy chooilley unnane chlinnys jeh er nyn dwoaie jeh.
Quoi hoieys arrey roish my veeal, as seal dy chreenaght er my veillyn, nagh duittym doaltattym lioroo, as nagh jean my hengey my stroie?
O Hiarn, ayr as fer-reill ooilley my vea, ny faag mee gys y choyrle
Quoi reillys smaght harrish my smooinaghtyn, as ynsaghey creenaght harrish my chree, nagh jean ad my sparail son my vee-hushtey, as nagh lhig ad lhiam son my pheccaghyn?

Er aggle dy bee my vee-hushtey ny smoo, as dy jean my pheccaghyn bishaghey gys my hoyrt-mow, as dy jean my hranlaasagh boggyssagh harrym, as dy duittym roish my noidyn, yn treishteil oc ta foddey veih dty vyghin.
O Hiarn, ayr as Jee my vea, ny cur dou shilley moyrnagh; agh chyndaa ersooyl veih dty harvaantyn dy kinjagh aigney mooaralagh.
Chyndaa ersooyl voym treishteil fardalagh, as saynt, as nee oo eshyn y niartaghey ta dy kinjagh aggindagh gys dty hirveish.
Ny lhig da jollys y volg, ny saynt ny foalley, greme y ghoaill orrym, as ny livrey dty harvaant gys cree daaney.
Clasht-jee, O shiuish chloan, smaght y veeal: eshyn ta dy reayll eh, cha bee eh dy bragh goit ayns loght e veillyn.
Bee yn drogh-yantagh faagit ayns e ommijys: nee chammah yn oltooanagh as y dooinney moyrnagh tuittym lioroo.
Ny cliaghtee dty veeal gys loo: chamoo jean imraa cadjin jeh ennym yn er casherick.
Son myr nagh bee sharvaant, ta kinjagh er ny gheealey, fegooish lhottyn doo-gorrym: myr shen, eshyn ta loo as genmys Jee kinjagh, cha bee eh gyn-loght.

Bee yn dooinney ta jannoo lane loo er ny laadey lesh mee-chraueeaght, as cha bee e hie dy bragh seyr veih seaghyn: my t’eh loo dy foalsey jeh e yoïn, bee e pheccah er: as mannagh gow eh rish e pheccah, t’eh jannoo peccah dooble: as my t’eh loo ayns fardail, cha bee eh gyn loght, agh bee yn thie echey lane dy heaghyn.
Ta
Ny cliaghtee dty veeal gys loo cadjin, son ayns shen ta’n goo dy pheccah.

Cooinee er dty ayr as dty voir, tra t’ou soie mastey ard-gheiney. Ny jarrood oo hene kiongoyrt roo, as myr shen hig oo liorish lheid yn ymmyrkey dy ve dty ommydan, ayns bwooishal nagh r’ou rieau ruggit jeh lheid y chynney, as ayns gwee mollaght da’n laa ruggyr oo.
Yn dooinney ta cliaghtey drogh-ghlare, cha vaag eh jeh ooilley laghyn e vea.

Ta daa cheint dy gheiney ta bishaghey peccah, as ver y trass lesh toyrt-mow: ta aigney siyragh goll-rish lossey dy aile, cha bee eh dy bragh mooghit, derrey vees eh dy bollagh er ny stroie: cha jean y maarderagh scuirr derrey t’eh er n’oaddey aile ayns y chorp echey hene.
Ta dy chooilley arran millish da maarderagh, cha vaag eh jeh derrey laa e vaaish.

Dooinney ta brishey poosey, gra myr shoh ayns e chree, Quoi ta dy my akin? ta mee combaasit mygeayrt lesh dorraghys, ta ny voallaghyn dy my ollaghey, as cha vel peccagh erbee fakin mee; cre’n aggle t’orrym? cha gooinee yn er smoo syrjey er my pheccaghyn.

Cha vel lheid y dooinney goaill aggle, agh ynrycan roish sooillyn deiney, gyn toiggal dy vel sooillyn y Chiarn jeih thousaneyn keayrt ny sollys na’n ghrian, cur-my-ner ooilley raaidyn deiney, as goaill baght jeh eer smooinaghtyn y chree.
(Bione da dy chooilley nhee roish my row ad er nyn groo; myrgeddin lurg daue ve jeant, yeeagh eh orroo ooilley.)
Bee yn dooinney shoh er ny cherraghey ayns straidyn yn ard-valley, as bee eh goit raad nagh vel eh gowrys.
Myr shoh myrgeddin vees y ven ta faagail e sheshey, as cur lh’ee sluight joarree ’syn eiraght.

Son hoshiaght t’ee er vrishey leigh yn er smoo syrjey; as ’syn nah ynnyd, t’ee er n’yannoo peccah noi e sheshey; as ’sy trass ynnyd, t’ee er choyrt rish maarderys ayns brishey poosey, as er n’ymmyrkey cloan liorish dooinney elley.
Bee ish er ny choyrt lh’ee magh fenish y whaiyl, as bee briaght jeant jeh e cloan.
Cha gow yn chloan eck fraue, as cha jean ny banglaneyn eck gymmyrkey mess.
Nee ee faagail ennym custey ny-jeï, as cha bee yn oltooan eck er ny ghoaill ersooyl.
As liorish shoh nee sleih toiggal nagh vel nhee erbee share na aggle y Chiarn, as nagh vel nhee erbee s’miljey na dy chur tastey da annaghyn y Chiarn.
Te ard ghloyr dy eiyrt er y Chiarn, as te yn vea veayn dy ve ayns foayr rishyn.
Nee creenaght ee hene y voylley, as gloyraghey ayns mean e pobble.
Ayns agglish yn er smoo syrjey nee ee fockley magh e goan, as goaill ard-voggey ayns e phooar.
Haink mee ass beeal yn er smoo syrjey, as ren mee yn thalloo y choodaghey myr bodjal.
Va my chummal ayns ynnydyn ard, as va my stoyl-reeoil ayns pillar bodjallagh.
Mish my lomarcan hoilshee combaase ny niaughyn, as ren shooyl er grunt ny marrey.
Ayns tonnyn ny marrey, as ayns ooilley yn seihll, as mastey dy chooilley phobble as ashoon hooar mee eiraght.
Mâroo shoh ooilley hir mee son fea, as marish quoi jeu shoh goym seose my ynnyd-vaghee?
Myr shen hug fer-croo dy chooilley nhee sarey dooys, as ren my er-croo my chabbane y hoiaghey seose, as dooyrt eh, Lhig da dty chummal ve ayns Jacob, as dty eiraght ayns Israel.
Ren eh my chroo er-dy-rieau, roish y theihll, as cha jeanym dy bragh failleil.
’Sy chabbane-agglish casherick ren mee shirveish da, as myr shen va mee er my hickyraghey ayns Sion.
Myrgeddin ayns yn ard-valley casherick hug eh dou fea, as ayns Jerusalem va my phooar.
As ghow mee fraue ayns pobble onnoroil, eer ayns cronney eiraght y Chiarn.
Ren mee gaase seose myr cedar ayns Libanus, as myr billey-cypress er sleityn Hermon.
Ren mee bishaghey myr billey-palm ayns En-gaddi, as myr drine-rose ayns Jericho; as myr billey-olive messoil ayns magher aalin, as daase mee myr billey-plane rish oirr yn ushtey.
Hug mee soar millish myr cinnamon, as aspalathus, as yn myrrh share, as galbanum, as onyx, as storax millish, as myr bree yn frankincense ’sy chabbane-agglish.
Myr y billey-turpentine heeyn mee magh my vanglaneyn, as ta my vanganyn banganyn onnoroil, as graysoil.
Myr y billey-feeyney hug mee magh soar millish, as ta my vlaa gymmyrkey yn mess dy ooashley as berchys.
Mish moir graih dooie, as arrym, as tushtey, as credjue casherick: myr ta mish er-y-fa shen er-dy-rieau, ta mee er my yiootal er ooilley my chloan ta enmyssit ersyn.
Tar-jee hym’s, ooilley shiuish ta aggindagh orryms, as jean-jee shiu hene y yannoo magh lesh my vessyn.
Son ta my imraa ny smiljey na mill, as my eiraght na’n chere-volley.
Bee adsyn t’er vlaystyn orrym accryssagh my-yeï, as bee adsyn t’er n’iu jee’m paagh my-yeï.
Cha bee eshyn ta fo my rere dy bragh er ny chur naardey, as adsyn ta ayns my ammys cha jean ad ass y raad.
Ta ooilley ny reddyn shoh ayns lioar conaant y Jee smoo syrjey, eer yn leigh hug Moses lesh sarey son eiraght da cloan Yacob.
Bee-jee dunnal as lajer ’sy Chiarn; dy vod eh shiu y hickyraghey, lhian-jee huggey: son ta’n Chiarn ooilley niartal Jee ny-lomarcan, as mârishyn cha vel saualtagh erbee elley.
T’eh lhieeney dy chooilley nhee lesh e chreenaght, myr ta Phison as Tigris thooillaghey ayns imbagh yn ouyr.
T’eh cur er y tushtey ain bishaghey goll-rish Euphrates, as myr Jordan ayns imbagh yn ouyr.
T’eh cur er ynsaghey ve cha cronnal as y toilshey, as myr Geon ayns traa yn ouyr-feeyney.
Cha ghow yn chied dooinney slane baght j’ee: chamoo yiow yn fer s’jerree slane toiggal j’ee.
Son ta ny smooinaghtyn eck ny s’diuney na yn cheayn, as ny coyrleyn eck na’n vooir vooar.
Haink mee magh myr strooan veih awin, as myr farrane-geill trooid garey.
Dooyrt mee, Nee’m ushtaghey my gharey share, as ushtaghey dy palchey imraghyn my gharey: as cur-my-ner haink my strooan dy ve ny awin, as my awin dy ve ny cheayn.
Ver-ym foast er ynsaghey soilshean myr y voghrey, as nee’m ee y hoilshaghey feaï-ny-cruinney.
Ver-ym magh ynsaghey myr phadeyrys, as faag-ym ee da sheelogheyn er son dy bragh.
Cur-jee my-ner, cha vel mee er laboragh er my hon hene my-lomarcan, agh er y hon ocsyn ooilley ta shirrey lurg creenaght.
Ayns three reddyn ghow mee taitnys, as v’ad ooasle fenish Jee as dooinney: Coardail mie eddyr braaraghyn, naboonys dooie, as graih as shee eddyr dooinney as e ven-heshey.
Ta three keintyn dy leih, as feoh ec my annym orroo: Dooinney boght as eh moyrnagh, dooinney berchagh ta ny vreagerey, as shenn vaarderagh, ta coayl e chooinaghtyn er.
Mannagh vel oo er ve frioosagh ayns dty aegid, cha vooar vees ayd ayns dty henn laghyn.
O cre cha stoamey ta briwnys ayns kione lheeah, as coyrle vie ayns shenn gheiney!
S’aalin y red ta creenaght y chenndeeaght, as tushtey as coyrle ayns deiney ooasle!
Ta mooarane creenaght ny attey da shenn gheiney, as aggle Yee nyn ard-ghloyr.
Ta my chree cur roym dy vel nuy reddyn maynrey, as focklym magh yn jeihoo lesh my hengey: Dooinney ta e chloan jannoo boggey da, as eshyn ta ceau seihll dy akin lhieggey e noid.
S’maynrey yn dooinney ta cummal marish ben heshey lowal, as nagh vel er ve foiljagh lesh e hengey, ny fo ammys dooinney smessey na eh hene.
S’maynrey eshyn ta er gheddyn carrey dooie, as t’er choyrt coyrle vie dauesyn ver clashtyn da.
S’ooasle y dooinney t’er gheddyn creenaght, ny-yeih, cha vel ny s’ooasle ayn na eshyn ta ayns aggle y Chiarn.
Agh ta graih y Chiarn erskyn dy chooilley nhee son soilshey da’n annym; quoi ta dy ve soylit rishyn ta shickyr ayn?
Ta aggle y Chiarn leeideil gys e ghraih, as she toshiaght credjue dy lhiantyn huggey.
Cur orrym seaghyn erbee agh seaghney cree, as olkys erbee, agh olkys y drogh-ven:
As tranlaase erbee, agh tranlaase veih my noidyn: [
Cha vel kione erbee ny s’nieunagh na kione yn ard-nieu, ny eulys erbee erskyn eulys ben fargagh.
Bare lhiam my chummal ve marish lion as dragon, na dy reayll thie marish drogh-ven.
Ta kione-lajerys ben coyrt grooid ’syn eddin eck, as neeal groymagh myr aanrit-sack.
Hig fou jeh shoh gys e dooinney, tra t’eh soie marish e naboonyn, as ver eh osnaghyn tromey er e chree.
Cha vel treihys erbee dy ve soylit rish olkys drogh-ven; lhig da cronney yn drogh-yantagh ve nauyn jee.
Myr ta’n ughtagh gennee lhiebeidjagh da’n chenndeeaght, myr shen ta ben anveagh da dooinney fea-fastagh.
Ny lhig da aalid ben tayrn shaghrynys ort, as ny shir ee son saynt foalley.
My ta ben meansal e dooinney, t’ee fargagh, daaney, as oltooanagh.
Ta drogh-ven castey dunnallys e dooinney, jannoo eddin hrimshagh as cree ching; ta ben nagh jean gerjagh e dooinney ayns e heaghyn, jannoo laueyn moal as glioonyn faase.
She ben va moir yn olk: ish hayrn y baase orrin ooilley.
Ny cur raad da’n thooilley: ny da’n drogh-ven reamys rouail mygeayrt.
Mannagh vel e ymmyrkey-bea gys dty aigney, giare voïd ee, cur screeuyn-scarree, as y dorrys jee.
S’maynrey yn dooinney t’er gheddyn ben-heshey vie; son bee earroo e laghyn er ny ghoobley.
S’mooar y gerjagh ta ben-heshey vie da e dooinney; son nee eh ceau laghyn e heihll ayns shee.
Ta ben vie ny reih toghyr, kiarit son leagh dauesyn t’ayns aggle y Chiarn.
Scummey boght ny berchagh, my ta dooinney jeidjagh gys y Chiarn, bee eh dy kinjagh as gien mie er e eddin.
Ta aggle my chree orrym roish three reddyn; as roish y chiarroo va mee er-creau: drogh-ghoo yn sleih, irree-magh y theay mee-reiltagh, as cassid foalsey: t’ad shoh [nyn droor] ny smessey na’n baase.
Agh treihys er treihys, ben gheadagh, as gah yn chengey gyn-tort.
Te ny s’doillee dellal rish y drogh-ven heshey, na rish cubbyl dy ghew ta gobbal tayrn: t’ee myr scorpion ny laue echeysyn ta lhiantyn r’ee.
Ta ben veshtal, as cartage ny dhieyn doostey lane boirey, as cha jean ee keiltyn y nearey eck hene.
Yiow baght er streebagh liorish e shilley daaney, as sooill rouanagh.
My ta dty inneen gyn-nearey, freill ee fo smaght geyre, er-aggle dy der ee naardey ee hene lesh rouyr reamys.
Bee er dty hwoaie roish sooill ghaaney, cha n’yrrys jee tayrn scammylt ort.

Bee ee cha jollyssagh as y troailtagh paagh, ta er daghyrt er ushtey: iuys ee ass dy chooilley phoyll ta ’sy roshtyn; hed ee er e cosaayl fo dy chooilley hammag, as shin-y-mea da dy chooilley vaarderagh.
Agh ta ben ghraysoil boggey da e sheshey: ta e ymmyrkey feudagh myr smuir ayns e chraueyn.
Ta ben sheeoil as dooie gioot veih yn Chiarn: as s’mooar sheeagh yn aigney bwaagh-beasagh!
Ta ben feudagh as beasagh ny ard-vannaght, as ta’n aigney sheelt ecksh erskyn dy chooilley leagh.
Myr y ghrian tra te er droggal gys yrjid y vunlaa: shen myr ta aalid y ven frioosagh ayns gordrail e thie.
Myr y soilshey aalin er y chainlere casherick [’sy chiamble:] shen myr ta aalid yn eddin ayns niart yn aegid.
Myr ny pillaryn airhey er socketyn argid: shen myr ta gymmyrkey-bea feudagh lesh cree ynrick.
My vac, freill follan blaa dty aegid; as ny baare dty niart er mraane joarree.
My ta dty chronney ayns magher messoil, cuirr eh lesh dty rass hene, treishteil gys sluight follan dty ghooghys.
Myr shoh faagys oo goo-mie da dty luight, as bee boggey oc jeh nyn gynney ooasle.
Cha vel ’sy theihll cretoor s’eajee na beisht dy ghrogh-ven; agh ta ben vie myr toor noi yn baase da e sheshey.
Ta drogh-ven cronney yn drogh-ghooinney: agh ta ben vie currit dasyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn.
Ver drogh-ven nearey cooyl e coshey: agh ver ben vie ammys da e sheshey.
Cha bee scansh y voddee soit jeh ben gyn-nearey: agh bee ben feudagh ayns aggle y Chiarn.
Yiow ish, ta ammyssagh da e sheshey, slane goo yn ven chreeney: agh hig faghid as drogh-imraa yn theihll urreeish ta craa e moyrn er.
Bee briaght foddey as gerrit jeant son postyr dy ven veeallagh, ee hene ver scaalhean er nyn noidyn.

Ta daa red ta cur sneih er my chree, as ta’n trass greinnaghey my chorree: Dooinney-caggee surranse boghtynid, deiney creeney fo faghid, as y dooinney ta chyndaa veih cairys gys peccah, lheid y fer ta’n Chiarn faagail magh son y chliwe.
S’coan oddys marchan ve seyr veih aggair, ny pedlar veih dellal volteyragh.
Shimmey t’er ny ve kyndagh son cooid fardalagh: as ta cree sondagh tilgey dellid er e hooillyn.
Myr y greme t’ec treiney ayns voalley cloaie, shen myr ta molteyrys lhiantyn eddyr creck as kionnagh.
Mannagh vel dooinney gymmyrkey eh hene dy imneagh ayns aggle y Chiarn, s’leah hig y vaare er e hie.
Yiow yn ghiare-veinn ’sy chreear, as smooinaghtyn y drogh-ghooinney ayns e ghlaare.
Myr ta’n aile prowal siyn-craie, ta dooinney er ny phrowal liorish e cheeayll.
Ta’n mess soilshaghey kys va’n billey lhiassit: myr shen ta raa cooishagh veih cree yn dooinney.
Ny moyll dooinney erbee derrey t’ou er chlashtyn e raa; son shoh prowal y dooinney.
My t’ou geiyrt da’n ynrickys, eiyree yn ynrickys dhyt, as ver oo mood ee myr garmad stoamey reeoil.
Myr ta ny eeanlee taaghey nyn ghooie hene: ta’n ynrickys bentyn roosyn ta ’syn oayll eck.
Myr ta lion lhie ayns farkiaght son e spooilley, shen myr ta peccah son y drogh-yantagh.
Ta goan creeney kinjagh ayns beeal y dooinney mie; agh ta’n ommydan caghlaa myr yn eayst.
My haghyrys oo fud gannidee, jeeagh royd: agh jean taaghey sheshaght deiney lowal.
Ta branlaadeeys ommydanyn boiragh, as ta nyn moggey ayns rouanys peccah.
Ver glare yn looder cadjin er y folt shassoo er dty chione: as ver nyn meealleraght er fer dooney e chleayshyn.
Liorish anvea ny mooaralee ta fuill er ny gheayrtey: as ta’n oltooan oc piandagh dy chlashtyn.
Caillee eshyn e ghoo mie ta brah folliaghtyn, as cha vow eh laghyn e heihll carrey gys e aigney.
Bee dooie as firrinagh da dty charrey: agh my t’ou brah ny folliaghtyn echey t’ou rey rish.
Son myr dooinney ta er stroie e noid: eer myrgeddin t’ou er choayl aigney-mie dty naboo.
Myr fer ta er lhiggey ushag ass e laue, myr shen t’ou uss er lhiggey yn raad da dty naboo, as cha gossyn oo eh arragh.
Ny shir huggey maghey shen, ta’n oddiaght eddyr shiu: t’eh myr feeaih t’er vrishey yn ribbey.
Foddee lhott v’er ny lheihys lesh shelliu, as lurg trodjey hig coardail: agh ta brahder folliaghtyn faagit mooie.
Eshyn ta meekey lesh e hooillyn, t’eh shêgin er yn olk: as ver ooilley e ainjyssee cooyl rish.
Choud as t’ou kionfenish loayree eh dy brynnagh rhyt, as moyllee eh dty ghoan: agh jeih shen cassee eh e ghob ort, as lûnee eh dty ghlare.
Shimmey yn red t’er ve dwoaiagh dou: agh cha nhimmey goll-rishyn, son t’eh dwoaiagh da’n Chiarn.
Foddee yn chlagh ta fer dy hilgey tuittym er e chione hene, as builley follit ve lhott baaish.
Foddee eshyn ta cleiy yn ooig eh hene tuittym ayn: as eshyn ta soiaghey ribbey ve goit ayn.
Hig e vaare hene er yn olkyssagh, gyn-yss da.
Voish ny mooaralee yiow faghid as craid: agh hig y drogh-yerrey cheddin myr lion orroo hene.
Bee adsyn, ta boggyssagh ayns seaghyn ny ynrickee, er ny ghoaill ayns y ribbey ad hene; as nee sou-aigney lhieeney orroo my vow ad baase.
Ta goanlys as farg, eajee as feohdoil: bee ad ny-neesht cour y drogh-ghooinney.
Gowee yn Chiarn cooilleen ersyn ta goaill cooilleen [er e naboo:] son shickyrys cha bee e loghtyn er ny yarrood da.
Leih da dty naboo yn assee t’eh er n’yannoo dhyt, as yiow hene leih dty loghtyn ayns dty phadjer.
Ta dooinney ayns noidys rish dooinney: as vel e lheid shirrey leih er Jee?
Cha vel myghin echey er dooinney jeh e ghooie hene: as vel eshyn shirrey leih son e loghtyn hene?
My ta eshyn, ta eh hene ny pheccagh, freayll roon ayns e chree; quoi nee loayrt ass e lieh, son pardoon e ghrogh-yannoo?
Cooinee er dty yerrey, faag void noidys; as smooinee er marvaanys as y baase, as freill ny annaghyn.
Cooinee er ny annaghyn, as ny freill goanlys noi dty naboo: cooinee er conaant yn er smoo syrjey, as gow leshtal son ny mee-hushtee.
Cur cooyl da streeu, as nee oo leodaghey dty loghtyn: son nee dooinney eulyssagh greesey seose streeu.
Ta dooinney streeuagh doostey anvea eddyr caarjyn, as jannoo boirey mastey ny sheeoil.

Myr ta stoo yn aile lheid shen ta e lossey: as myr ta niart y dooinney, myr shen ta e yymmoose; as rere myr ta e verchys, ta e chorree troggal; as myr stroshey ta ny streeualtee wheesh shen s’dewil vees nyn streeu.
Ta streeu siyragh foaddey yn aile; as buillaghyn siyragh tayrn fuill.
My heidys oo er y smarage, nee eh lossey; ceau shelley er, as bee eh er ny vooghey: as t’ad shoh ny-neesht cheet magh ass dty veeal.
Cur dty vollaght er y chooyl-chassidagh, as y chengey lhiam as lhiat: son ta nyn lheid er stroie ymmodee va ayns shee.
Ta chengey chooyl-chassidagh er heaghney ymmodee, as er nyn imman veih ashoon gy-ashoon; te er lhieggal ard-valjyn lajer, as er scaalheaney thieyn deiney mooarey gys y thalloo.
Ta chengey chooyl-chassidagh er n’eebyrt magh eer mraane mie voish nyn gummallyn, as er hayrn orroo uail nyn gooid.
Quoi-erbee eaishtys rish, cha vow eh fea, as cha gum eh dy bragh ayns shee.
Ta builley yn chip faagail cronnyn ’syn eill: agh ta builley yn chengey brishey ny craueyn.
Shimmey t’er duittym liorish foyr y chliwe; agh ta ny shlee er duittym liorish y chengey.
S’maynrey eshyn t’er ny choadey voish, as nagh vel er n’ennaghtyn yn ghuin echey; nagh vel er hayrn fo’n whing echey, ny er ve kianlt lesh ny geulaghyn echey.
Son ta’n whing echey ny whing dy yiarn, as ny boandaghyn nyn moandaghyn prashey.
Ta’n baase echey ny vaase dewil, ta’n oaie ny share na eh.
Cha bee reill echey harrystoosyn ta ayns aggle Yee, chamoo vees ad losht lesh yn lossey echey:
Nee adsyn ta treigeil y Chiarn tuittym fo, as nee eh lostey ayndoo, as cha bee eh er ny vooghey, bee eh lhiggit orroo myr lion, as myr leopard nee eh stroie ad.
Jeeagh dy der oo cleiy drineagh mysh dty chummal, as dy dasht oo dy kiaralagh dty argid as dty airh:
As jean dty ghoan y howse ayns meih, as dooin seose dty veeal lesh dorryssyn as boltyn.
Jeeagh royd nagh jean oo skirraghtyn liorish; er-aggle dy vow lhieggey kiongoyrt rishyn ta lhie cooyl-chlea er dty hon.
Nee dooinney chymmoil geeasagh da e naboo, as t’eshyn ta niartaghey e laue freayll ny annaghyn.
Eeasee da dty naboo ayns traa e eme, as eeck dty eeasaght ayns traa cooie.
Bee er dty ockle, as dell dy firrinagh rish, as yiow dy kinjagh cooid dty ymmyrch.
Shimmey t’ayn, ta coontey ny va eeasit daue dy ve muir-cherraghtyn, as coyrt adsyn gys seaghyn t’er chooney lhieu.
Derrey t’eh er gheddyn, nee eh paagey dty laue, as son argid e naboo nee eh loayrt dy ammyssagh: agh tra lhisagh eh geeck, lhiggee eh shaghey, as ver eh jeh oo lesh gaccan as plaiynt er y traa.

My nee eh geeck, s’coan yiow yn derrey lieh, as nee oo jeeaghyn er myr cooid chosnit: mannagh jean, t’ou er hayrn ort hene coayl dty argid, as er gheddyn noid gyn oyr: t’eh geeck lesh mollaghtyn as oltooan: as son goo-mie ver eh drogh-ennym dhyt.
Ta ymmodee, er-y-fa shen, t’er n’obbal geeasaght son drogh-ghellal sleih elley, er-aggle dy bee ad mollit.
Ny-yeih cur uss dayll da’n voght, as ny bee lhiastey dy ve chymmoil da.
Cooin lesh y voght er graih yn sarey, as ny cur cooyl rish er coontey e voghtynid.
Cur magh dty argid son dty vraar, as dty charrey, as ny lhig da lhie mergagh, as gyn-ymmyd fo-chlagh.
Stoyr seose dty verchys cordail rish saraghyn y Smoo-syrjey, as yiow use jeh ny share na airh.
Cur jeirk seose ayns dty hieyn tashtee; as nee eh dty livrey veih dy chooilley heaghyn:
Nee eh caggey er dty hon noi dty noidyn ny share na scape-caggee, ny shleiy lajer.
Ta dooinney coayr goll raane roish e naboo: agh nee fer gyn-nearey treigeil eh.
Ny jarrood turn mooinjerey dty raantagh, son t’eh er n’ghialtaghey e vioys er dty hon.
Ver y drogh-ghooinney naardey stayd vie e raantagh:
As nee eshyn, ta jeh aigney neu-wooisal, faagail ayns gaue eshyn ren livrey eh.
Shimmey’n fer souyr ta raanteenys er stroie, as er n’eebyrt eh noon as noal myr tonn ny marrey: ard-gheiney te er n’imman veih nyn dhieyn, dy ve wagaantee mastey ashoonyn joarree.
Nee drogh-ghooinney, ta brishey annaghyn y Chiarn, tuittym ayns raanteenys: as nee eshyn ta goaill ayns laue, as geiyrt da cooishyn sleih elley, son faill, tuittym fo seaghyn leighderys.
Cooin lesh dty naboo rere dty phooar, as bee er dty hwoaie nagh duitt oo hene fo yn chooid cheddin.
Ta ny ard-reddyn son beaghey, ushtey, as arran, as coamrey, as thie dy choodaghey nearey.
Ta beaghey yn dooinney boght ayns eer bwaag, ny share na farrail vie ayns thie dooinney elley.
Lhig da ve mooar ny beg, bee booiagh lesh, nagh glin oo oltooan dty hie.
Son s’treih yn seihll eh, dy gholl veih thie dy thie: son raad t’ou dty yoarree cha by-loys dhyt fosley dty veeal.
Ver oo cuirraghyn, as jannoo gien, gyn veg y vooise: ny-sodjey na shoh, nee oo clashtyn goan fargagh: [lheid as]
Tar, uss yoarree, as soie magh dty voayrd, as jean magh mee lesh ny t’ayd aarlit;
Jean room, uss yoarree, da dooinney ooasle, ta my vraar cheet dy ghoaill aaght mârym, faag dou my hie.
Ta ny reddyn shoh seaghnagh da dooinney keeayllagh: oltooan dy aaght, as cassid yn eeasyder.
Eshyn shynney lesh e vac, t’eh smaghtagh eh dy mennick, dy vod eh ve son boggey da fy-yerrey.
Yiow eshyn ta smaghtaghey e vac boggey jeh, as bee eh son gerjagh da mastey e ainjyssee.
Eshyn ta gynsaghey e vac, t’eh coyrt sneih er e noid: as fenish e chaarjyn bee boggey echey jeh.
Ga dy vow e ayr baase, t’eh myr fer nagh vel foast er n’immeeaght: son t’eh er n’aagail fer ny-yeï ta goll-rish hene.
Choud as va seihll echey, honnick eh as ghow eh boggey ayn: as tra hooar eh baase, cha row trimshey er.
Daag eh ny-yeï cooilleeneyder noi e noidyn, as fer yeeaghys kenjallys da e chaarjyn.
Eshyn ta dy ro vettey troggal e vac, ver eh e chione-lajerys er y hoshiaght, as seaghyn er e chree hene dy chooilley hraa t’eh geam.
Bee cabbyl nagh row rieau fo laue creoi-veeallagh; as hed lhiannoo, lesh rouyr jeh e raad hene, gour e vullee.
Jean babban jeh dty vac, as ver eh sou er dty aigney: cur drogh-ynsagh da, as ver eh chingys er dty chree.
Ny jean ommydan jeed hene mârish, er-aggle dy bee oo trimshagh mârish, as dy nee snaggeraght feeacklyn vees y jerrey.
Ny cur rouyr jeh e raad hene da ayns e aegid, as ny jeigh dty hooillyn er e ommijys.
Freill eh fo smaght choud as t’eh aeg, as cur e chustym da choud’s t’eh ny lhiannoo; er aggle dy bee eh kione lajeragh, as mee-viallagh dhyt, as myr shen tayrn seaghyn er dty chree.
Smaghtee dty vac, as bee jeidjagh dy chur ynsagh da, er aggle dy dayrn e ghrogh-ymmyrkey scammylt ort hene.
Ta’n boght ta slane follan ny share na’n berchagh goarley-ching.
Ta slaynt as corp follan ny reih er airh erbee, as callin ghastey erskyn ymmodee berchys.
Cha vel berchys ’sy theihll ny share na slaynt y challin, ny gerjagh erbee erskyn boggey yn chree.
Ta’n baase ny share na bea seaghnagh, ny chingys kinjagh.
Ta bee blaystal da beeal gyn blass, myr mooarane gien er beeal yn oaie.
Cre’n scansh t’ec y jalloo er chebballyn? son cha vod eh edyr gee ny soaral: lheid cheddin ta eshyn ta’n Chiarn seaghney.
T’eh blakey lesh e hooillyn, as piantaanagh, as osnaghey myr eunuch as moidyn ny oghrish.
Ny lhig da trimshey lhieeney harrish dty chree, as ny seaghnee oo hene, mannagh jig dty yeearree lhiat.
Ta cree bannee-boggoil medshin y vea, as saase dy choyrt seihll liauyr.
Bee dooie da dty annym hene, as gerjee dty chree, scugh trimshey foddey voïd; son ta trimshey er ve baase ymmodee, as cha vel foays erbee ayn.
Ta troo as farg giarey seihll dooinney, as ta imnea tayrn shenndeeaght roish y traa.
Nee cree ooasle as mie goaill soylley jeh e vee as e veaghey.
Ta kiarail son berchys shymley yn eill, as ta’n imnea mysh nyn dashtey castey cadley.
Myr ta doghan dowil brishey’n cadley, shen myr ta kiarail imneagh freayll dooinney veih saveenys.
S’mooar y tooilleil t’er y verchagh ayns coyrt seose berchys, as tra t’eh er gheddyn e haie, t’eh goaill soylley jeh e chooid.
Ta’n boght tooilleil dy deinagh ayns e voghtynid, as lurg ooilley t’eh dy kinjagh ayns feme.
Cha bee eshyn gyn loght ta sayntoilagh er airh, as eshyn ta coyrt rish drogh-ghellal yiow eh e haie jeh.
Shimmey ta airh er stroie, as va nyn doyrt-mow er-gerrey daue.
Te ny ribbey dauesyn ta jannoo nyn yee jeh, as bee dy chooilley vee-hushtagh er ny ghoaill ayn.
Bannit ta’n berchagh ta er ny gheddyn gyn-loght, as nagh vel er choyrt e hreishteil ayns airh.
Quoi eh hene? as nee mayd genmys eh bannit: son reddyn yindyssagh t’eh er n’yannoo mastey e phobble.
Quoi t’er ve prowit liorish, as er ny gheddyn ynrick? eisht lhig da boggyssagh. Quoi oddagh jannoo aggair, as nagh vel er n’yannoo eh? ny, jannoo olk, as nagh vel er n’yannoo eh?
Bee e chooid er ny vishaghey, as nee’n pobble soilshaghey magh e yiastyllys.
My t’ou soie ec boayrd sonney, ny foshil dty yollys er, as ny abbyr, S’mooar dy vee t’er!
Cooinee dy vel drogh-hooill ny red eajee: as cre er feaï-ny-cruinney ta ny smessey na’n thooill? shen-y-fa te mooaraghey er dy chooilley hyndaa.
Ny sheeyn magh dty laue dy ghoaill cre-erbee dy naïlt hene, as ny jean daanys mârish ayns y chlaare.
Smooinee jeh dty naboo myr jeed hene: as bee feudagh er dy chooilley aght.
Ee dy feudagh myr dooinney, lheid as t’er dty veealloo, as ny ee dy jollyssagh, nagh der sleih feoh dhyt.
Scuirr hoshiaght er graih feudys; as ny bee jollyssagh er-aggle dy der oo corree.
Tra t’ou soie ayns sheshaght, ny bee yn chied er dy heeyney magh dty laue.
Ta kuse fardalagh jannoo magh dooinney feudagh, as cha vel eh pantoogh er e lhiabbee.
Ta cadley kiune cheet voish sheeltys, t’eh girree dy moghey, as ta e cheeayll mârish; agh ta coayl cadley, goarley-gailley, as pianyn y volg, marish y dooinney jollyssagh.
As my t’ad er ghairrail bee ort trog ort, immee magh, tilg, as yiow fea.
My vac, eaisht rhym, as ny soie beg jee’m, as ec y jerrey yiow my raa’s firrinagh: ayns ooilley dty obbraghyn bee gastey, myr shen cha jig chingys erbee dty choair.
Quoi-erbee ta feoilt mysh e vee, loayree sleih dy mie jeh, as bee goo sonnys e hie er ny chredjal.
Agh bee drogh-ghoo sleih ec y phiddeog as boiddagh: as bee imraa e phiddeogys er ny phrowal.
Ny treisht gys dty hroshid ayns iu: son shimmey ta feeyn er stroie.
Myr ta’n foyr er ny phrowal liorish thummey ’syn ushtey: myr shen ta jough prowal yn cree mooaralagh.
Ta jough coyrt cree ayns dooinney, my te iu’t dy feudagh: cre’n cree eisht t’ec dooinney ta fegooish bine dy yough? son ve jeant dy ooraghey dooinney.
Ta jough, my te iu’t dy sheelt, as ayns traa feme, coyrt gennallys ’sy chree, as aash gys yn aigney.
Agh ta neu-heeltys ayns jough tayrn marish sherriuid-aigney, beealeraght, as fuilliaghtee.
Ta meshtallys doostey eulys yn ommydan dy yannoo olk: te leodaghey yn niart, as jannoo lhottyn.
Ny jean goltooan dty naboo ec y jough, as ny soie beg jeh ayns e yennallys: ny cur glare brasnee da, as ny chion y cappan er.
My t’ou jeant mainshtyr ny cuirraghyn, ny gow rouyr stayd ort, agh ymmyrk oo hene myr fer jeh’n cheshaght: jeeagh nagh bee laccal erbee orroo, as eisht soie sheese mâroo.
As erreish dhyt v’er n’yannoo ooilley dty churrym, gow kione y vuird, as jean gien mie mâroo, dy vod oo moylley y gheddyn son rere jesh ny cuirraghyn.
Loayr uss ta by-hinney, son te cheet jesh dhyt, agh loayr dy keeayllagh, as ny jean y kiaulleeaght y lhiettal.
Ny gow lane taggloo ort raad ta’n kiaulleyder, as ny soilshee dty cheeayll ayns traa neu-chooie.
Ta kiaulleeaght vingys ec gien-feeyney, myr seal carbuncle soit ayns airh.
Myr seal emerald ta soit ayns obbyr airh, lheid cheddin ta kiaull vingys lesh gien-feeyney.
Loayr, ghooinney aeg, my vees feme ort: agh loayr dy twoaiagh imlee.
Abbyr ny t’ayd dy ghra ayns beggan goan lesh lane bree: bee myr fer ta toiggal, agh ny-yeih ta smaghtaghey e hengey.
My t’ou ayns sheshaght deiney mooarey, ny jean oo hene corrym roo; as tra t’ou fenish y chenndeeaght, bee sparailagh jeh dty ghoan.
Ta’n tendreil goll roish y taarnagh, as foayr er-eiyrts y dooinney naaragh.
Trog ort ayns traa mie, as ny bee yn er s’jerree, agh fow thie fegooish lhiggey shaghey.
Ayns shen smooinee ort hene, as jean myr s’jesh dhyt: agh ny jean peccah liorish goan mooaralagh.
As son ny reddyn shoh bannee dty er-croo, t’er lhieeney oo lesh e vannaghtyn.
Nee quoi-erbee, ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, jannoo soiagh jeh’n ynsagh echey, as nee adsyn ta shirrey eh dy leah foayr y gheddyn.
Bee eshyn ta shirrey leigh Yee er ny lhieeney lesh, agh bee eh oyr peccah da’n chrauee-oalsey.
Nee adsyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn briwnys y gheddyn, as nee ad cairys y oaddey myr soilshey.
Cha gow drogh-ghooinney rish e oiljyn; agh yiow eh leshtal rere e aigney hene.
Nee dooinney keeayllagh smooinaghtyn er hene; agh cha bee yn dooinney quaagh mooaralagh dauntit lesh aggle, eer tra t’eh er n’yannoo er e yoïn hene.
Ny jean nhee erbee fegooish coyrle vie, as tra t’ou er n’yannoo shen, cha bee oyr arrys ort.
Ny immee er raad dangeragh tuittym, er-aggle dhyt snapperal er ny claghyn.
Jeeagh royd, eer ayns raad rea:
As bee er dty hwoaie jeh dty chloan hene.
Ayns dy chooilley obbyr vie treisht gys Jee veih dty annym; son myr shoh t’ou freayll ny annaghyn.
Eshyn ta credjal ayns y Chiarn t’eh beasagh gys yn anney, as cha jean eshyn farrail veg smessey ta coyrt e varrant er.
Cha bee olk yn cronney echeysyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, agh eer ayns seaghyn er seaghyn ver eh livrey-ys da.
Ta’n dooinney creeney shassoo lesh y leigh; agh ta’n crauee-oalsey myr lhong mastey ny tonnyn.
Ta dooinney keeayllagh treishteil ayns y leigh, as ta’n leigh firrinagh da, myr beeal Yee.
Smooinee ro-laue cre t’ayd dy ghra, as myr shen yiow clashtyn; fow toiggal vie, as eisht jean ansoor.
Ta cree yn ommydan myr queeyl-chart; as e smooinaghtyn myr rhollian yn essyl-tree.
Ta collagh-cabbyl myr carrey gannidagh: t’eh shytternee fo dy chooilley unnane ta er e vooin.
Kys ta un laa ny s’ooasle na laa elley, fakin dy vel slane soilshey dy chooilley laa ’sy vleïn veih’n ghrian?
Liorish sarey’n Chiarn v’ad soit er-lheh, as eshyn doardee caghlaa imbaghyn as feaillaghyn.
Paart jeu t’eh er chasherickey gys ard-feaillaghyn, as paart jeu t’eh er n’yannoo myr eer laghyn cadjin.
As ta dy chooilley ghooinney veih’n thalloo, as va Adam er ny chroo jeh’n ooir.
Lesh slane ard-tushtey ta’n Chiarn er scarrey ad, as er n’yannoo lhiettrymys ’syn ymmyd oc.
Paart jeu t’eh er vannaghey, as er n’yannoo ooasle, as paart jeu t’eh er chasherickey, as er choyrt ny chour hene: agh jeh paart jeu t’eh er hoiaghey beg, as er injillaghey, as er leodaghey.
Myr ta’n chray ayns laue yn phasheyder, dy ve cummit myr saillish hene: myr shen ta dooinney ayns laue e er-croo, dy yannoo rish myr s’taittin lesh hene.
Ta mie as sie, bea as baase, er nyn goyrt noi-ry-hoï: myr shen ta’n crauee noi yn vee-chrauee, as y drogh-ghooinney noi yn dooinney mie.
Myr shen jeeagh er ooilley obbraghyn y Smoo-syrjey, as t’ad jees as jees noi-ry-hoï.
Ghooisht mish s’jerree ooilley, myr fer ta teiy lurg teiyderyn ny smeïr-feeyney; liorish bannaght y Chiarn ren mee vondeish, as lhieen mee my ghoagh-feeyney myr teiyder smeïr-feeyney.
Smooinee ort, nagh nee ynrycan er my hon hene ta mee er hooilleil, agh son adsyn ooilley ta aggindagh er cosney ynsagh.
Eaisht-jee rhym, shiuish ard-gheiney yn phobble, as eaisht-jee dy geyre, shiuish reiltee yn theay.
Freill dty chooid fo dty reill hene; as choud s’bio oo, ny bee fo ammys da dty vac, ny dty ven, ny da dty charrey; er-aggle dy gow arrys, as dy bee oo guee as geearree er y hon reesht.
Choud as ta bioys as ennal aynyd, ny cur oo hene fo pooar peccagh erbee.
Son te ny s’jeshey dty chloan dy ve fo yn ammys ayd’s, na uss dy ve fo yn rere ocsyn.
Ayns ooilley dty yannoo ny scarr rish cooid yn ammys: as ny faag lheamys erbee er dty ghoo-mie.
Agh ec kione dty laghyn, as jerrey dty vea, rheynn dty chooid seihlt.
Ta foddyr, kip, as poagey, cour yn assyl; as beaghey, smaght, as obbyr reih yn charvaant.
My reillys oo dty harvaant gys obbyr, bee fea ayd hene: agh mannagh gum oo gys e hurn eh, bee e raad hene echey.
Ta quing as colliar freayll yn mwannal fo smaght, shen myr ta torchaghyn as greddyn yn drogh-harvaant.
Cum gys obbyr eh, nagh bee eh litcheragh; son ta’n litcheraght moir ymmodee olk.
Freill gys obbyr eh, myr te cooie: my t’eh mee-viallagh lhie erraghyn s’trimmey er.
Ny bee ro-hrome er unnane erbee; agh jean dy chooilley nhee dy keeayllagh.
My ta sharvaant jeidjagh ayd, bee dooie rish, son s’deyr t’ou er chosney eh.
My ta lheid yn er-mooinjerey ayd, cur dellal vraarey da; son t’eh ymmyrchagh gys dty vea: my ver oo drogh-ghellal da, as eh dy roie ersooyl voïd, cre raad hed oo er e eiyrts?
Ta jerkal yn ommydan feayn as fardalagh: as ta dreamallyn boirey ny mee-cheeayllee.
Quoi-erbee ta cur geill da dreamallyn, t’eh goll-rish fer ta shirrey tayrtyn scadoo, as greimmey yn gheay.
Cha vel ashlish dreamallyn agh myr caslys tuarystal; eer myr scaa yn eddin ’syn ushtey.
Jeh red neu-ghlen cha vod glennid cheet; ny’n irriney veih shen ta foalsey.
Cha vel oalyssyn, as faishnaghyn, as dreamallyn, agh fardail, as ta’n cree rouail myr cree yn ven er-troailt.
Mannagh nee veih yn Smoo-syrjey t’ad cheet myr raaue, ny cur geill daue.
Son ta dreamallyn er volley ymmodee, as cha daink lhieusyn hug barrant orroo.
Bee yn leigh er ny gheddyn ynrick as firrinagh; as bee creenaght ayns beeal yn ynrickys.
Eshyn t’er hroailt ayns cheeraghyn foddey, ta tushtey echey ayns ymmodee reddyn, as eshyn ta er chosney lheid yn ynsagh, bee e chreenaght baghtal.
Smooar ta gyn-yss da’n fer gyn ynsagh; agh ta’n troailtagh cosney mooarane keeayll.
Tra hie mee veih cheer dy cheer, honnick mee shilley ny ghaa, as ta my vaght erskyn roshtyn my ghlare.
Shimmey keayrt va mee ayns gaue my vaaish; ny-yeih haink mee trooid liorish y cheeayll va mee er chosney.
Bee yn cree ocsyn ta ayns aggle y Chiarn er ny choadey liorish, son ta nyn marrant er nyn ver-coadee.
Cha bee imnea ny aggle ersyn ta shirveish y Chiarn, son ersyn ta e varrant.
S’maynrey ta’n cree echeysyn ta fo aggle y Chiarn: quoi gys t’eh jeeaghyn? as quoi e niart?

Son ta sooillyn y Chiarn orroosyn ta graihagh er, dauesyn t’eh ny ard-endeilys as barrant niartal, ny scaa veih fowan-loshtee, as ny choodagh veih niart grian y vunlaa, kemmyrk noi snapperal, as cooney noi tuittym.
T’eh coyrt mioyr ’sy chree, as gennallys ayns ny sooillyn: t’eh coyrt slaynt, bea, as bannaght.
