Eajee as feohdoil vees yn oural echeysyn, ta chebbal cooid cosnit dy aggairagh: son cha jean Jee soiaghey jeh gannidys ny mee-chairee.
Cha vel taitnys erbee ec y Smoo-syrjey ayns ourallyn drogh-yantee; chamoo ta e chorree noi peccah er ny veiyghey liorish ny ymmodee ourallyn.
Eshyn ta jannoo e oural ass cooid y voght, t’eh myr fer ta dunverys lhiannoo fenish e ayr.
Ta nyn meaghey bioys ny ymmyrchee: dooinney foalley eshyn ta jannoo molteyrys er.
Eshyn ta goaill beaghey e naboo voish, t’eh dy chraghey eh: as eshyn nagh vel geeck e aill da’n labbree, t’eh ny ghunver.
Tra ta fer troggal, as fer elley lhieggal, cre ta nyn gosney, agh deinys as tooilleil?
Tra ta fer guee bannaght as fer gwee mollaght, da quoi jeu shoh ver y Chiarn clashtyn?
Eshyn ta niee eh hene lurg bentyn rish corp marroo, my vennys eh rish reesht, cre sheeagh e niee?
Myrgeddin ta’n dooinney t’er hrostey son e pheccaghyn, as er chur roo reesht. Quoi eaishtys rish e aghin? ny cre sheeagh e arrys?
Eshyn ta freayll leigh Yee, t’eh chebbal oural slane-fondagh: as eshyn ta biallagh gys yn anney, t’eh chebbal oural-shee.
Eshyn ta dy booisal jannoo cooilleeney son thurn mie, t’eh dy ouralley flooyr meein: as eshyn ta cur jeirk, t’eh jannoo oural taitnyssagh.
Ta Jee er ny wooiys tra ta cooyl er ny choyrt da’n olk, as liorish treigeil neu-ynrickys ta fer jannoo lhiasaghey.
Cha jig oo fenish y Chiarn lesh laue follym.
As t’ad shoh ooilley kianlt ort liorish anney Yee.
S’mea ta ourallyn ny ynrickee jannoo yn altar, as s’eunyssagh te troggal seose fenish yn er smoo syrjey!
Bee soiagh jeant jeh oural y dooinney ynrick, cha bee yn imraa jeh dy bragh jarroodit.
Eeck e cheesh da’n Chiarn lesh feoiltys dty hooill vie; as ny jean leodaghey chied-vessyn dty laue.
Eeck ooilley dty cheeshyn lesh eddin arryltagh, as jean casherickey dty yagheenyn lesh cree feoiltagh.
Cur da’n er smoo syrjey, myr t’eh er dty vannaghey, as rere dty chosney cur voïd lesh sooill ghennal.
Son ta’n Chiarn cooilleeney, as nee eh dty vishaghey shiaght-filley.
Agh ny smooinee liorish shoh dy chosney foayr; son cha vel Jee soiaghey jeh lheid; as ny cur dty varrant er ourallyn neu-ynrick, son ta’n Chiarn ny vriw, as cha vel eh jannoo soiagh jeh persoonyn.
Cha jean eh soiaghey jeh persoon erbee noi dooinney boght: agh ver eh clashtyn da’n accan ocsyn ta tranlaasit.
Cha jean eh soiaghey beg jeh aghin y chloan gyn-ayr; ny jeh’n ven-treoghe, tra t’ee gaccan huggey.
Nagh vel ny jeïr roie sheese er keeillyn y ven-treoghe? as nagh vel yn eam eck noi-syn ta oyr nyn duittym?
Bee soiagh foayroil ny chour-syn ta shirveish y Chiarn, as nee e phadjer roshtyn gys ny bodjallyn.

Ta padjer ny imlee goll trooid ny bodjallyn; as derrey yiow ad clashtyn, cha bee ad er nyn gherjaghey: cha jean ad scuirr, derrey s’gooidsave lesh y Chiarn dy choyrt feaysley dauesyn, as briwnys er nyn dranlaasee.

Son cha bee yn Chiarn lhag-lauee, chamoo nee yn Ooilley-niartal lhiggey lhieu, derrey t’eh dy bollagh er stroie niart ny tranlaasee, as er ghoaill cooilleeney er ny ashoonee, as er chur naardey earroo ny mooaralee, as er vrishey giare lorg-reill ny mee chairal.
Derrey t’eh er chooilleeney dy chooilley ghooinney rere e yannoo, as obbraghyn deiney lurg nyn doilchin: derrey t’eh er vriwnys cooish e phobble, as ad dy ghoaill boggey ayns e vyghin:
Myghin, ta gerjoil ayns earish seaghyn, myr bodjallyn fliaghee ayns emshyr fowanagh.
Jean myghin orrin, O Hiarn Yee ain ooilley: as jeeagh orrin:
As tayrn hood hene dy chooilley ashoon, nagh vel foast er jeet stiagh hood.
Trog seose dty laue gys ny ashoonyn-quaagh, as soilshee dty phooar orroo.
Myr v’ou er dty chasherickey aynin ’syn eanish ocsyn, myr shen bee er dty ghloyraghey ayndoosyn ’sy chilley ainyn.
As lhig dauesyn tushtey y gheddyn jeed’s, myr hooar shinyn tushtey, nagh vel Jee erbee, agh ynrycan uss, O Yee.
Soilshee cowraghyn noa, as jean mirrillyn yindyssagh elley: jean dty laue, as dty roih yesh y ghloyraghey, dy hoiaghey magh dty obbraghyn mirrillagh.
Soilshee dty yymmoose, as lhig magh dty chorree: jean yn tranlaasagh y chastey, as y noid y stroie.
Jean obbyr yiare roo, cooinee er dty chonaant, as lhig eer daue hene dty obbraghyn yindyssagh y hoilshaghey magh.
Lhig da dewillys yn aile berraghtyn er ny scapailtee oc, as lhig da tranlaasee dty phobble cherraghtyn.
Jean broo dy myn king ard-reiltee ny ashoonee, ta gra, Quoi agh shin hene?
Chaggle dy cheilley ooilley kynneeyn Yacob, as lhig daue ve dty eiraght’s, myr er-dyn toshiaght.
O Hiarn, jean myghin er y pobble, ta enmyssit ort’s; as er Israel, t’ou uss er n’enmys dty vac shinney.
O jean myghin er Jerusalem, dty ard-valley casherick, dty ynnyd-vaghee hene.
Lhieen Sion lesh dty ghoo flaunyssagh, as dty phobble lesh dty ghloyr.
Jean feanish y ymmyrkey lhieusyn, ta er ve dty eiraght er-dyn toshiaght, as cooilleen ny phadeyryssyn t’er ve jeant ayns dty ennym’s.
Jean adsyn y chooilleeney ta farkiagh er dty hon, as lhig da ny phadeyryn ayd’s v’er ny gheddyn firrinagh.
O Hiarn, eaisht rish padjer dty harvaantyn, cordail rish bannaght Aaron er dty phobble, dy vod fys ve ec ooilley cummaltee yn theihll, dy nee uss y Chiarn, yn Jee er-dy-rieau as son dy bragh.
Ta’n corp goaill stiagh dy chooilley veaghey, ny-yeih ta keint dy veaghey ny share na keint elley.
Myr ta blass y vee-feïeys soilshaghey yn keint, myr shen ta cree tastagh goaill baght jeh raaghyn foalsey.
Ta cree condaagagh coyrt oyr trimshey: agh hig dooinney keeayllagh seose rish.
Ta ben ayn cour dy chooilley ghooinney; ny-yeih ta reih eddyr ben as ben.
Ta aalid ben dy wooiys eddin dooinney, as cha vel nhee erbee t’eh goaill taitnys smoo ayn.
My ta e ymmyrkey, dooie, meen, as bannee, ’smaynrey e sheshey erskyn deiney elley.
Eshyn ta geddyn ben-heshey vie, t’eh ayns raad dy vishaghey, cooney cooie er e hon, as kemmyrk e vea.
Raad nagh vel cleiy ny cagliagh, ta’n magher goll naardey: as shaghrynys as sou-aigney hig ersyn ta fegooish ben-heshey.
Quoi hreishtys gys maarliagh shliawn, wagaantagh veih boayl dy boayl? myrgeddin, quoi hreishtys fer, echey nagh vel fastee lesh hene, agh goaill aaght raad erbee verrys yn oie er?
Jir dy chooilley charrey, Ta mish neesht e charrey: agh ta fer ayn, nagh vel agh carrey myr-yien.
Nagh nee trimshey baaish eh, tra ta dty heshey as dty charrey chyndaït dty noid?
O spyrryd chustey! cre veih haink oo stiagh dy lhieeney yn seihll lesh molteyrys?
Ta sheshey ayn vees er cheu e charrey, choud as ta’n seihll cheet lesh: agh tra hig seaghyn er, bee eh n’oï.
Ta sheshey ayn nee shassoo lesh e charrey, er graih e volg, as troggal y scape noi e noidyn.
Ny lhig da cooinaghtyn dty charrey goll ass dty aigney, as ny jarrood eh ayns mean dty chooid seihlt.
Jir dy chooilley choyrlagh, S’mie my choyrle; agh ta nyn lheid ayn, ver coyrle son nyn gosney hene.
Bee er dty hwoaie jeh fer-coyrlee, as smooinee ro laue cre er t’eh shêgin (son ver eh coyrle ass e lieh hene) er-aggle dy der eh yn errey ort’s:
As dy jir eh rhyt, ’Smie ta dty chooish: as lurg shen, dy gow eh yn cheu elley, dy chur-my-ner cre’n erree hig ort.
Ny gow coyrle rishyn ta fo mee-ourys jeed: as ny soilshee dty aigney huggeysyn ta troo mood.

Chamoo gow coyrle jeh ben, mychione ecksh t’ee geadagh mo-ee: chamoo jeh’n fer faittagh, ayns cooishyn caggee: ny jeh marchan, mychione marchantys; ny jeh kionneyder, mychione creck: ny jeh trooagh, mychione thurn-mie; ny jeh yn neu-vyghinagh, mychione kenjallys; ny jeh litcher, son monney erbee dy obbyr; ny jeh labbree-laa, son obbyr bleeaney; ny jeh litcher dy harvaant, mychione tarrooghys: da nyn lheid shoh ny cur geill ayns monney erbee dy choyrle.
Agh bee dy kinjagh marish dooinney ynrick, eshyn ta fys ayd dy vel eh freayll annaghyn y Chiarn, ta e chree lesh dty chree hene, as bee eh trimshagh mayrt, mannagh jig dty chooishyn lhiat.
As shass gys coyrle dty chree hene: son cha vel fer ’sy theihll ny s’firrinagh hood na ta shen.
Son s’mennick lesh cree dooinney hene toiggal share y choyrt da, na shiaght arreyderyn heose er toor ard.
As erskyn ooilley jean dty phadjer gys yn er smoo syrjey, dy jean eh dty immeeaght y leeideil gys raad yn ynrickys.
Lhig da resoon goaill raad ayns dy chooilley chooish, as coyrle vie ayns dy chooilley obbyr.
Ta’n caghlaa t’ayns y chree cowrit er yn eddin:
As t’ad shoh nyn giare cronnit er: mie as sie, bea as baase: agh t’ad dy kinjagh fo reill y chengey.
Ta fer ayn ta creeney, as gynsaghey ymmodee: agh ny-yeih er beggan foaynoo da hene.
Ta fer ayn ta soilshaghey keeayll ayns e ghoan; agh ta foddey voish aigney-mie: cha bee eh shoh dy bragh creeney.
Son cha vel grayse Yee mârish: agh coayl e cheïley er.
Ta fer elley creeney da hene, as ta messyn e chreenaght ny vannaght ayns e veeal.
Ta dooinney creeney gynsaghey e phobble, as s’beayn vees mess e chreenaght!
Nee bannaghtyn lhieeney stiagh er y dooinney creeney, as bee goo bannee echey veih ooilley e ainjyssee.
Foddee seihll dooinney ve er ny choontey: agh ta bleeantyn Israel erskyn earroo.
Yiow dooinney creeney goo-mie mastey e phobble, as bee e ennym beayn.
My vac, prow dty stayd anmey, liorish dty ymmyrkey-bea, as chea voish shen, ny ennys oo dy ve olk er dty hon.
Son cha vel dy chooilley nhee vondeishagh da dy chooilley ghooinney, chamoo ta taitnys ec dagh annym ayns dy chooilley nhee.
Ny bee jollyssagh gys gien mie, ny ro yoogh gys beeaghyn miljey.
Son ta caghlaaghyn bee bun chingys, as bee jooghid er ny hyndaa gys goarley-gailley.
Liorish jooghid ta ymmodee er yiarey nyn laghyn; agh bee yn dooinney sheelt bannit lesh lhiurid bea.
Cur e ooashley cooie da’n er-lhee, son y feme foddee ’ve ayd er: son ta’n Chiarn er n’ordrail eh.
Son veih yn er smoo syrjey ta lheihys cheet, as yiow eh ooashley veih’n ree.
Nee schleï yn er-lhee troggal eh gys ooashley: as bee eh ayns goo-mie mastey ny ard-gheiney.
Ta’n Chiarn er chroo medshinyn ass y thalloo; as cha jean dooinney creeney soiaghey-beg jeu.
Nagh row yn ushtey jeant oor lesh fuygh, dy voddagh pooar Yee ve er ny hoilshaghey.
As t’eh er choyrt schleï da deiney, dy vod ooashley ve echey ayns e obbraghyn mirrillagh.
Lesh nyn lheid t’eh coyrt lheihys, as leodaghey nyn bianyn.
Jeh nyn lheid ta’n potecaree jannoo seose e haaseyn lheihys; gyn jerrey ta e obbraghyn, as voishyn ta aash feaï-ny-cruinney.
My vac, ny bee almoragh ayns dty hingys; agh jean dty phadjer gys y Chiarn, as ver eh dty laynt dhyt.
Cur cooyl rish peccah, lhiassee dty vea, as glen dty chree veih dy chooilley ghrogh smooinaghtyn.
Cheb oural dy hoar millish, as imraa dy flooyr meein, as oural sonney cour dty vaaish:
Eisht cur fys er yn er-lhee, son ta’n Chiarn er n’ordrail eh: ny lhig da goll voïd, son ta feme ayd er.
Son ta traa ayn, dy vel bannaght Yee goll marish ny laueyn oc.
Son gowee adsyn neesht nyn badjer gys y Chiarn, dy vannaghey shen ny t’ad dy choyrt son aash, as foays, as bea liauyr.
Eshyn ta jeh e yoïn jannoo peccah noi e er-croo, lhig da tuittym fo laue yn er-lhee.

My vac, lhig da dty yeir tuittym sheese harrish ny merriu; as gow lesh dty ghobberan, myr dy beagh assee trome er daghyrt dhyt hene: eisht cur fo yn ashlish eh, lurg y chliaghtey, as cur oanluckey feudagh da.
Jean keayney sharroo, as trimshey trome, as dobberan er e hon, myr s’feeu da, as shen son laa ny jees, nagh bee oo er dty oltooaney: as eisht jean oo hene y gherjaghey son dty hrimshey.
Son veih dobberan ta baase cheet, as ta dobberan y chree brishey slaynt.
Ayns lheid y seaghyn ta trimshey tannaghtyn: as s’treih yn vea ta lesh sproght yn chree.
Ny gow trimshey gys dty chree, eiyr voïd eh, as cooinee er dty yerrey hene.
Ny jean shen y yarrood, son cha jig adsyn reesht: cha jean oo foays erbee dasyn, agh skielley dhyt hene.
Cooinee er y vriwnys aym’s: son bee yn vriwnys ayd’s y lheid cheddin: Jea er my hon’s, as jiu er dty hon’s.
Tra ta’n marroo ec fea, lhig da’n imraa jeh ve ec fea mârish, as bee er dty gherjaghey er e hon, tra ta’n annym er n’immeeaght.
Ta creenaght yn dooinney ynsit cheet liorish caa as traa, as hig eshyn dy ve creeney nagh vel seiyt ayns boiraghyn seihltagh.
Kys yiow eshyn mooarane ynsagh ta cummal y cheeagh, as ta boggyssagh jeh’n sleean; ta gimman y chesheraght, ta cur-rish obbyr vagheragh, as e haggloo mysh ny dew.
Ta e aigney ’sy traaue, as e imnea son foddyr da’n maase.

Myrgeddin dy chooilley seiyr as mainshtyr-obbree, ta laboraght oie as laa, as adsyn ta giarey as grainney sealyn, as ta jeidjagh dy yannoo ymmodee sorchyn, as baarail nyn schleï dy chummey jallooyn, as soie dy anmagh, dy chur kione er nyn obbyr.

Ta’n gaaue myrgeddin soie gys yn ingan, as e hooill er yn obbyr-yiarn, ta bree yn aile shymley ersooyl e eill, as t’eh strepey rish chiass y choirrey: ta feiyr yn hammar as yn ingan dy kinjagh ayns e chleayshyn, as e hooill dy geyre soit er cummey yn obbyr ta fo e laue; t’eh soiaghey e aigney dy chur kione er e obbyr, as t’eh aggindagh dy yannoo e obbyr glen sollys.
Myrgeddin ta’n pasheyder ny hoie ec e obbyr, as chyndaa yn whueeyl mygeayrt lesh e chassyn, eh ta dy jeidjagh soie kinjagh ec e obbyr, as earroo ooilley e obbyr ayns sorchyn:
T’eh cummey yn chray lesh e roih, as croymmey sheese e niart gys y thalloo; t’eh kiaralagh dy stainney harrish eh, as t’eh imneagh dy ghlenney yn coirrey.
T’ad shoh ooilley treishteil gys nyn laueyn, as ta dagh unnane schleïoil ayns e obbyr.
Fegooish lheid ny cummaltee cha vod ard-valley ve er ny choamrey, ny sleih cummal raad sailliu, ayns cheer ny balley.

Cha nhegin jeeaghyn son e lheid ayns sheshaght ny fir-choyrlee, ny soie ayns ard-oik mastey’n pobble: cha jean ad soie er stoyl y vriwnys, ny toiggal ’ve oc ayns cooishyn quaallagh: cha nee adsyn nee fockley magh cairys as briwnys, ny cur bun er raaghyn-dorraghey.
Agh nee ad stayd y theihll y choamrey, as ta ooilley nyn yeearree ayns nyn obbyr-cheirdey.
Agh eshyn ta soie e aigney er leigh yn er smoo syrjey, as ta smooinaghtyn er dy dowin, nee eh ronsaghey magh creenaght ooilley yn chenndeeaght, as ver eh bun er phadeyrys.
Freillee eh raaghyn deiney ooasle, as raad ta coraaghyn-dorraghey dowiney, shen y raad vees eshyn ry-gheddyn.
Shirree eh magh folliaghtyn raaghyn-creeney, as bee eh ullee ayns coraaghyn-dorraghey.
Nee eh reill mastey ard-gheiney, as shassoo fenish princeyn, nee eh troailt trooid cheeraghyn joarree; son t’eh er phrowal yn mie as yn sie mastey deiney.
Nee eh soiaghey e chree dy heet dy moghey gys y Chiarn e er-croo, as gowee eh padjer, gys yn er smoo syrjey, as foshlee eh e veeal ayns padjer, as nee eh accan y yannoo son e pheccaghyn.
Tra saillish yn Chiarn smoo syrjey, bee eh er ny lhieeney lesh yn spyrryd dy hushtey; nee eh raaghyn-creeney y ockley magh, as ver eh booise da’n Chiarn ayns e phadjer.
Nee eh leeideil e choyrle, as e hushtey, as er e olliaghtyn nee eh dy dowin smooinaghtyn.
Nee eh soilshaghey magh shen ny t’eh er n’ynsaghey, as bee e voggey ayns leigh conaant y Chiarn.
Nee ymmodee e hushtey y voylley, as choud as vees yn seihll er-mayrn, cha bee eh er ny yarrood, cha jed e chooinaghtyn naardey, as bee e ennym ayns imraa veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe.
Nee ashoonyn soilshaghey magh e chreenaght, as nee yn pobble fockley magh e voylley.
My yiow eh baase, faagee eh ennym share na thousane; as my vees eh bio, nee eh eh y vishaghey.
Ny-yeih, ta ny smoo aym foast dy ghra mychione shen ta mee er smooinaghtyn er; son ta mee er my lhieeney myr yn eayst ec y vullagh.
Eaisht-jee rhym, shiuish chloan chrauee, as jean-jee blaaghey magh, myr rose ta gaase liorish strooan y vagheragh.
As cur-jee magh bree eunyssagh myr yn frankincense, as blaaghey myr y lilee, cur-jee magh soar millish, as gow jee arrane-moyllee, bannee-jee yn Chiarn ayns ooilley e obbraghyn.
Cur-jee ard-voylley da’n ennym echey, as jean-jee soilshaghey magh e voylley lesh arraneyn nyn meillyn, as lesh claasaghyn, as ayns coyrt moylley da, nee shiu loayrt er yn aght shoh:
Ta ooilley obbraghyn y Chiarn erskyn-towse mie, as cre-erbee t’eh dy harey bee eh er ny chooilleeney ’syn imbagh cooie.

As cha vod unnane erbee gra, Cre shoh? cre hon ta shen? son ec traa cooie bee ad ooilley er ny ronsaghey magh: ec y sarey echeysyn hass ny ushtaghyn myr creaghyn, as ec goan e veeal ny lhiabbaghyn ushtey.
Ec y sarey echeysyn t’er ny yannoo cre-erbee saillish, as cha vod unnane erbee lhiettal eh, tra saillish sauail.
Ta obbraghyn dy chooilley eill kiongoyrt rish, as cha vod nhee erbee ve keillit veih ny sooillyn echeysyn.
T’eh fakin er-dy-rieau, as seihll gyn jerrey, as cha vel nhee erbee yindyssagh ayns e hilley.
Cha lhiass da dooinney erbee gra, Cre ta shoh? cre hon ta shen? er-yn-oyr dy vel eh er chroo dy chooilley nhee son nyn ymmyd cooie.
E vannaght ren yn thalloo chirrym y choodaghey myr awin, as gushtaghey eh myr thooilley.
Myr t’eh er hyndaa ny ushtaghyn ayns sailjys, myr shen hig e yymmoose kinjagh er ny ashoonyn.
Myr ta ny raaidyn echey rea da’n vooinjer chrauee, myr shen t’ad oyr-tuittym da ny mee-chrauee.
Cour yn vooinjer vie ta reddyn mie er ny chroo veih’n toshiaght: myrgeddin ta reddyn olk cour ny drogh-yantee.
Ta ny ard-reddyn son slane ymmyd bea dooinney, Ushtey, aile, yiarn, sollan, flooyr-curnaght, mill, bainney, as fuill yn smeyr-feeyney, as ooil, as coamrey.
Ta ooilley ny reddyn shoh son foays da’n vooinjer chrauee: myrgeddin da peccee t’ad er ny hyndaa gys olk.
Ta spyrrydyn ayn t’er ny chroo son kerraghey, t’ayns nyn eulys bwoalley dy dewil, ayns traa yn toyrt-mow t’ad deayrtey magh nyn niart, as meeinaghey yn jymmoose echeysyn ren ad y chroo.
Aile, as sniaghtey-garroo, as genney, as baase, v’ad shoh ooilley kiarit son kerraghey.
Ta feeacklyn beishtyn oaldey, as scorpionyn, ard-nieughyn, as yn cliwe, kerraghey ny mee-chrauee gys toyrt-mow.
Nee ad boggey y ghoaill ayns y sarey echey, as bee ad aarloo er y thalloo, tra vees feme roo, as ’sy traa cooie cha jed ad noi e ghoo.
Shen-y-fa veih’n toshiaght va mee kiarit, as smooinee mee er ny reddyn shoh, as daag mee ad ayns scrieu.
Ta ooilley obbraghyn y Chiarn mie, as ver eh dooin dy chooilley nhee ymmyrchagh ’syn imbagh cooie.
Myr shen nagh vod dooinney gra, Ta shoh ny smessey na shen, son ayns traa bee ad ooilley er ny phrowal dy ve mie.
As shen-y-fa, cur-jee moylley da’n Chiarn lesh nyn slane cree as goo, as bannee-jee ennym y Chiarn.
S’mooar y tooilleil ta cour dy chooilley ghooinney, as ta quing hrome er mec Adam, veih’n laa t’ad goll magh ass breïn nyn mayrey, derrey’n laa t’ad chyndaa gys moir dy chooilley nhee.
Ta nyn smooinaghtyn dowin er ny ta ry-heet, as laa yn vaaish seaghney nyn aignaghyn, as jannoo cree agglagh.
Chammah veihsyn ta ny hoie er stoyl dy ghloyr, huggeysyn t’er ny injillaghey ayns ooir as leoie.
Chammah veihsyn ta coamrit lesh purple as crown, huggeysyn ta ceau lheiney varree.
Jymmoose as troo, seaghyn as anvea, aggle y vaaish, as corree, as streeu, as ayns traa ny fea er e lhiabbee, ta e chadley-oie cur shaghrynys er e cheeayll.
Cha vel eh goaill agh beggan, ny gyn veg y fea, as ny lurg shen t’eh ayns e chadley, myr fer ’syn arrey-laa, e chree seaghnit lesh ashlishyn agglagh, myr fer chea veih’n eiyrtys caggee.
Tra ta ooilley sauchey t’eh doostey as goaill yindys, nagh row yn aggle monney.
Ta lheid ny reddyn bentyn gys dy chooilley chretoor, chammah dooinney as baagh, as ta shen shiaght-filley smoo er peccee.
Baase as deayrtey-folley, streeu as cliwe, treihys, gortey, seaghyn, as yn phaitt.
Ta ny reddyn shoh kiarit cour ny mee chrauee, as kyndagh roosyn haink y thooilley.
Ta cooid yn ooir chyndaa gys yn ooir reesht; as cooid yn ushtey gys ny ushtaghyn.
Bee dy chooilley slaa-laueeys as mee-chairys er ny chastey: agh nee dellal yeeragh farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Bee cooid yn vooinjer vee-chairagh er ny hyrmaghey seose myr strooan, as er ny lheïe ersooyl lesh feiyr, casley rish taarnagh atchimagh lesh fliaghey.
Choud as ta e laue foshlit dy ghoaill, ta boggey er: agh hig y drogh-yerrey er ny drogh-yantee.
Cha bee cloan ny drogh-yantee banglaneagh; agh t’ad myr fraueyn neu-chooie er y chreg chreoï.
Myr weed ta gaase er dagh poyll-ushtey as broogh awin, bee ad astyrit roish faiyr erbee.
Ta feoiltys myr garey feer vessoil, as ta myghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
S’maynrey bea yn labbree ta booiagh lesh y stayd t’eh ayn: as t’eh myr fer t’er n’gheddyn tashtaghyn follit.
Ta cloan, as dy hroggal ard-valley, freayll ennym dooinney ayns cooinaghtyn: agh ta ben dyn loght ny share na ad ny-neesht.
Ta feeyn as kiaulleeaght cur boggey ’sy chree; agh ta graih er creenaght erskyn oc ny-neesht.
Ta’n feddan as y psalteree jannoo bingys villish; agh ta chengey villish goaill raad jeu ny-neesht.
Ta dty hooill geearree stoamid as aalid; agh roue ny-neesht arroo ’sy ghlassyrid.
Cha vel traa erbee neu-chooie son carrey as sheshey dy heet dy cheilley; agh ny s’dooie na ad ny-neesht, ta ben rish e sheshey.
Ta braaraghyn as cooney cour traa dy heaghyn: agh ta giastyllys jannoo feaysley smoo na ad ny neesht.
Ta airh as argid cur shickyrys da’n chass: agh ta coyrle vie ny share na ad ny-neesht.
Ta berchys as niart troggal seose yn cree; agh ta aggle y Chiarn erskyn oc ny-neesht: cha vel nhee dy laccal ayns aggle y Chiarn, as cha vel feme echey cooney y hirrey.
Ta aggle y Chiarn garey messoil, dy choadey eh erskyn dy chooilley ghloyr.
My vac ny leeid bea chercheenagh, son ta’n baase ny share na lheid y vea.

Cha vel yn vioys echeysyn dy ve coontit son bioys, ta e yerkal er boayrd ghooinney elley; son t’eh tayrn scammylt er hene lesh beaghey deiney elley: agh nee dooinney creeney as mie-ynsit shaghney shoh.
Ta jeirk millish ayns beeal yn er gyn-nearey: agh ayns e volg nee aile lostey.

O vaase, cre cha sharroo as ta’n chooinaghtyn jeed’s da’n dooinney ta beaghey ec e aash ayns e chummallyn, da’n dooinney nagh vel nhee erbee echey dy heaghney eh, as ta bishaghey ayns dy chooilley nhee, dy jarroo, dasyn ta foast son beaghey y ghoaill.
O vaase, s’mie ta dty vriwnys da’n ymmyrchagh, as dasyn ta e niart failleil, ta nish ayns e henn eash, as seaghnit lesh dy chooilley nhee, as dasyn t’ayns mee-hreishteil, as er choayll e chree.
Ny gow aggle roish briwnys y vaaish, cooinee orroosyn t’er ve royd, as hig dty yeï, son shoh briwnys y Chiarn er dy chooilley chretoor.
As cre’n-fa t’ou uss noi aigney yn er smoo syrjey? cha bee veg y vriaght ’syn oaie, nee jeih, ny keead, ny thousane bleïn, ta dty heihll er ve.
Ta cloan ny drogh-yantee cloan dwoaiagh, as t’ad taaghey sheshaght ny mee-chrauee.
Nee eiraght cloan ny drogh-yantee goll naardey, as bee scammylt foddey beayn er nyn sluight.
Nee’n chloan plaiynt er ayr mee-chrauee, er-yn-oyr dy bee ad er ny oltooan kyndagh rishyn.
Smerg diuish, gheiney mee-chrauee, t’er hreigeil leigh yn Jee smoo syrjey; son my ta shiu bishaghey, bee eh gys nyn doyrt-mow.
As my vees shiu er nyn ruggey, bee shiu er ny ruggey gys mollaght: as tra yiow shiu baase, mollaght vees nyn gronney.
Nee ooilley ny ta jeh’n ooir chyndaa gys ooir reesht: myrgeddin nee ny mee-chrauee goll veih mollaght gys toyrt-mow.
Ta trimshey deiney mychione nyn gallin: agh bee drogh-ennym ny drogh-yantee er ny yarrood.
Gow kiarail jeh dty ghoo-mie, son nee shen tannaghtyn mayrt ny-sodjey na thousane dy hashtaghyn mooar airhey.
Cha nee seihll liauyr ta jannoo bea vie, agh ta goo-mie farraghtyn son dy bragh.
My chloan, freill-jee ynsaghey ayns shee: son creenaght ta keillit, as stoyr nagh vel ry-akin, cre’n ymmyd t’ayndoo nyn-neesht?
Ta’n dooinney ta keiltyn e ommijys, ny s’keeayllagh na eshyn ta keiltyn e chreenaght.
Shen-y-fa, bee jeh eddin naareydagh ôney, cordail rish my ghoo; son cha vel eh mie dy ve naareydagh ayns dy chooilley nhee, chamoo te dy slane er ny lowal er dy chooilley oyr.
Gow nearey jeh maarderys er coontey dty ayr as dty voir; as jeh breg fenish prince as dooinney pooaral:
Jeh loght fenish briw as fer-reill: jeh mee-chairys fenish quaiyl as theay: jeh dellal volteyragh fenish dty cho-heshey as dty charrey:
As jeh maarlys raad t’ou cummal, as jeh brishey cairys, noi ynrickys Yee as e chonaant; as dy ve myr brout ec y voayrd; as jeh molteyrys ayns creck as kionnagh:
As jeh dy ve tostagh roosyn ta bannaghey dhyt; as dy yeeaghyn er streebagh:
As dy hyndaa ersooyl dty eddin veih dty ghooinney-mooinjerey, ny dy cheiltyn gioot ny legad, ny dy vlakey er ben dty naboo:
Ny dy violaghey e inney-veyl, as nagh jig oo coair e lhiabbee; ny jeh raaghyn scammyltagh fenish caarjyn: as tra nee oo thurn mie, nagh der oo flout lesh:
As nagh jig oo harrish ny cooyl-chassey shen ny t’ou er chlashtyn; as nagh jean oo folliaghtyn y vrah.
As shoh myr vees dty nearey lowal as feudagh, as bee oo ayns foayr rish dy chooilley ghooinney.
Jeh ny reddyn shoh ny bee nearey ort, as son ammys dooinney erbee, ny bee foiljagh ayndoo:
Jeh leigh yn er smoo syrjey, as e chonaant, as jeh briwnys, dy gheyrey ny mee-chrauee:
Jeh coontey kiart rish dty cho-heshaghyn as troailtee, ny jeh gioot eiraght eddyr caarjyn:
Jeh corrymid meihaghyn as weightyn, ny jeh cosney mooarane ny beggan.
As dy ve geyre mysh cooid varchan, dy chur smaght as ynsaghey da cloan, as dy hayrn fuill er lhiatteeyn drogh-harvaant.
Te mie dy ve cummyr raad ta drogh-ven, as dy yeigh seose raad ta ymmodee laueyn mygeayrt.
Shirveish magh dy chooilley nhee ayns coontey as towse, as scrieu sheese ooilley ny t’ou cur magh, ny goaill stiagh.

Ny bee nearey ort dy choyrlaghey yn vee-cheeayllagh as ommijagh, as dy ve ass lieh yn chenndeeaght noi yn aegid: myr shoh nee oo soilshaghey dty ynsaghey vie, as bee oo ayns goo-mie ec dy chooilley ghooinney.

Ta’n ayr doostey son e inneen gyn-yss da dooinney erbee, as ta’n chiarail j’ee cur coayl e chadley er: tra t’ee aeg, er-aggle dy jed ee shaghey blaa e eash: as lurg j’ee ve poost, er-aggle dy beagh dwoaie currit j’ee.

Ayns traa e moidynys, er-aggle dy voghe ee scammylt, as ee dy ve torragh ayns thie e ayrey: as tra ta dooinney eck, er-aggle dy jean ee gymmyrkey ee hene dy olk; as erreish j’ee ve poost, dy beagh ee gennish.
Freill arrey gyere er inneen gyn-nearey, er-aggle dy der ee ort dy ve craid da dty noidyn, as an-ghoo ’syn ard-valley, as oltooan mastey’n pobble, as dy bee oo er dty naaragh fud y theay.
Ny jean soiagh jeh aalid dy chooilley unnane, as ny jean sheshaght rish drogh vraane.
Son veih coamraghyn ta’n lhemeen cheet, as veih drogh-vraane olkys.
Ta coyrle vie yn dooinney raghtagh ny share na brynneraght y ven oalsey, ben, er-lhiam, ta cur lh’ee nearey as oltooan.
Nee’m nish gimraa er obbraghyn y Chiarn, as fockley magh shen ny ta mee er n’akin: Ayns goo yn Chiarn ta e obbraghyn.
Myr ta soilshey yn ghrian cur-my-ner dy chooilley nhee, shen myr ta gloyr y Chiarn ry-akin ayns ooilley e obbraghyn.

Cha vel y Chiarn er choyrt pooar da eer e nooghyn dy ghoaill slane baght jeh ooilley e obbraghyn mirrillagh, ta’n Chiarn ooilley-niartal ayns e phooar er hickyraghey, dy vod cre-erbee t’ayn, ve er ny oardaghey son e ghloyr.
T’eh dy baghtal cur-my-ner yn diunid, as yn cree, as cur tastey da kialgyn croutagh deiney: son da’n Chiarn cha vel nhee erbee gyn-yss, as t’eh cur-my-ner cowraghyn y theihll.
T’eh soilshaghey ny reddyn t’er n’gholl shaghey, as ta ry-heet, as cur briaght er kesmadyn nheeghyn follit.
Cha vel smooinaghtyn erbee gyn-yss dasyn, chamoo ta fockle hene keillit voish.
T’eh er hoiaghey magh dy stoamey obbraghyn ooasle e chreenaght, as t’eh er-dy-rieau as seihll gyn jerrey; ny sloo, ny ny smoo cha vod ve jeant jehsyn; chamoo t’eh feme fer-coyrlee erbee.
O cre wheesh dy v’er ny yeearree ta ooilley e obbraghyn! as shen foddee dooinney fakin eer ayns smayl.
Ta dy chooilley nhee jeu shoh beayn, as tannaghtyn son dy bragh, cour dy chooilley ymmyd, as t’ad ooilley biallagh.
Ta dy chooilley nhee dooble noi ry-hoi, as cha vel eh er n’aagail nhee erbee giare.
Ta’n derrey yeh niartaghey gys foays y jeh elley: as quoi oddys ve jeant magh lesh cur-my-ner e ghloyr?
Yn yrjid erskyn towse, yn aer sollys, aalid niau, marish e hilley gloyroil.
Yn ghrian tra te cheet rish, soilshaghey ec eirree greïe yindyssagh, obbyr yn er smoo syrjey.
Mysh y vunlaa ta’n cheer sponkit fo, as quoi oddys surranse yn chiass loshtee echey?
Ta dooinney ta sheidey fo coirrey ayns obbraghyn dy hiass, agh ta’n ghrian lostey ny sleityn three keayrtyn s’breeoil; sheidey magh gollyn aileagh, as cur magh tendreilyn, te dolley ny sooillyn.
S’mooar ta’n Chiarn ren croo eh, as ec e harey te goll dy kinjagh.
Ren eh yn eayst myrgeddin dy hirveish ayns e imbagh, dy hoilshaghey ny earishyn, as son cowrey jeh’n theihll.
Veih’n eayst ta cowrey ny feaillaghyn, yn soilshey eck ta goll ny veggan as ny veggan veih’n vullagh.
Ta’n vee er ny enmys urree, bishaghey dy yindyssagh ayns e caghlaa, leeideilagh armeeyn yn yrjid, soilshean ayns aer niau;
Aalid niau, gloyr ny rollageyn, seihll dy hoilshey ayns ynnydyn syrjey yn Chiarn.
Ec sarey yn er casherick nee ad shassoo ayns nyn goorse, as gyn dy bragh gannooinaghey er nyn arrey.
Jeeagh er y goll twoaie, as cur moylley dasyn ren cummey eh, feer aalin te ayns y sollyssid echey.
Te combaasal yn aer mygeayrt lesh bow gloyroil, as ta laueyn yn er smoo syrjey er lhoobey eh.
Liorish e harey t’eh coyrt er y fliaghey dy huittym dy trome, as dy tappee lhiggey magh tendreilyn e vriwnys.
Liorish shoh ta ny tashtaghyn er ny osley, as ta ny bodjallyn getlagh magh myr eeanlee.
Liorish e ard phooar t’eh shickyraghey ny bodjallyn, as ta ny claghyn-sniaghtee er ny vrishey myn.
Kiongoyrt rishyn ta ny sleityn er-creau, as ec e aigney ta’n gheay-jiass sheidey.

Ta feiyr y taarnagh coyrt er y thalloo craa, ta’n sterrym my-hwoaie as y gheay-chassee jannoo myrgeddin: myr eeanlee ta getlagh t’eh skeayley yn sniaghtey as ta’n tuittym sheese echey casley rish tuittym lheimyderyn faiyr.
Ta’n sooill goaill yindys jeh aalid yn yillid echey, as ta’n cree ayns atchim myr te ceau.
Yn lheeah-rio neesht myr sollan t’eh deayrtey er y thalloo, as tra te riojit, te lhie er baare ny stakyn birragh.
Tra ta’n gheay sheidey feayr veih yn twoaie, ta’n ushtey er ny chreoghey ayns rio, te tannaghtyn er dy chooilley loghan ushtey, as coodaghey ny ushtaghyn mooarey myr lesh eilley-broghil.
Te cur mow ny sleityn, as lostey yn aasagh, as stroie yn faiyr myr aile.
Saase leah son shoh ooilley kay ta cheet dy gerrit; ta druight, cheet lurg chiass, dy ooraghey.
Liorish e ghoo t’eh kiunaghey yn diunid, as soiaghey ellanyn ayn.
Adsyn ta shiaulley er y cheayn, t’ad ginsh jeh’n gaue echey; as tra ta shin clashtyn eh lesh nyn gleayshyn, ta shin goaill yindys jeh.
Son ayns shen ta obbraghyn atchimagh as yindyssagh ry-akin, earrooyn jeh dy chooilley cheint dy chretooryn, as whaleyn er ny chroo.
Liorishyn vees aïgh vie er nyn obbraghyn, as liorish e ghoo ta dy chooilley nhee er nyn gummal seose.
Foddee mayd loayrt lane, as ny-yeih cheet giare; shen-y-fa, ayns fockle, Eshyn ooilley.
Kys oddys mayd ard-voylley feeu ’choyrt da? son t’eh ard erskyn ooilley e obbraghyn.
Ta’n Chiarn atchimagh as feer ard, as s’yindyssagh ta e phooar!

Tra ta shiu gloyraghey’n Chiarn, cur-jee ard-voylley da gys y chooid sodjey jeh nyn niart; son dy jarroo foast bee eh foddey er-y-skyn; as tra ta shiu cur ard-voylley da, cur-jee magh ooilley nyn booar, as ny bee-jee liastey, son cha vod shiu dy bragh goll foddey dy liooar.
Quoi t’er n’akin eh, dy voddagh eh ginsh dooin? as quoi oddys ard-voylley corrym y choyrt da?
Ta foast reddyn s’yindyssagh na ad shoh keillit voïn, son cha vel shin er vakin agh beggan jeh e obbraghyn.
Son ta’n Chiarn er chiaddey dy chooilley nhee, as er y vooinjer chrauee t’eh er yiootal creenaght.
Lhig dooin nish soiaghey magh moylley deiney ooasle, as nyn shenn-ayryn ayns nyn sheelogheyn.
Lioroosyn ta’n Chiarn er hoilshaghey mooarane gloyr, trooid e phooar niartal veih’n toshiaght.
Lheid as ren gymmyrkey reill ayns nyn reeriaghtyn, deiney ooasle son nyn booar, fir-choyrlee tushtagh as fockley magh phadeyrys.
Leeideilee yn theay liorish nyn goyrle as liorish nyn dushtey ayns ynsagh cooie son y pobble, creeney as floaoil ayns nyn ynsaghey.
Lheid as hooar magh bingys kiaullee, as ren fockley magh arraneyn scruit.
Deiney berchagh ayns slane fort, beaghey dy sheeoil ayns nyn gummallyn.
V’ad shoh ooilley ayns ooashley rish nyn lhing, as v’ad gloyr nyn sheelogheyn.
Ta paart jeu shoh t’er n’aagail ennym mie nyn yeï, as ard-ghoo gys earishyn foddey.
As ta paart elley nagh vel veg yn imraa jeu, t’er herraghtyn myr nagh beagh rieau nyn lheid er ve, ny ad hene ruggit, ny nyn gloan nyn yeï.
Agh v’ad shoh deiney myghinagh, as ta’n ynrickys oc ayns cooinaghtyn kinjagh.
Ec y sluight oc nee eiraght vie dy kinjagh tannaghtyn, as ta’n chloan oc cheu-sthie jeh’n chonaant.
Ta’n sluight oc shassoo dy shickyr, as nyn gloan er y choontey oc.
Nee’n sluight oc tannaghtyn gys earishyn foddey beayn, as cha bee yn ghloyr oc er ny leodaghey.
Ta ny kirp oc oanluckit ayns shee, agh ta’n ennym oc bio er son dy bragh.
Nee yn pobble ginsh jeh nyn greenaght, as nee yn theay soilshaghey magh nyn moylley.
Ren Enoch yn Chiarn y wooiys, as v’eh goit seose gys niau, preachoor dy arrys gys ny sheelogheyn.
Va Noah er ny gheddyn ynrick as cairagh ayns traa yn yymmoose, as v’eh goit myr yeearlys son y theihll; shen-y-fa v’eh faagit son fooilliagh da’n theihll, tra haink yn thooilley.
Va conaant dy bragh farraghtyn jeant rishyn; nagh beagh dy chooilley eill arragh er ny stroie liorish thooilley.
Va Abraham shenn-ayr mooar ymmodee pobble: ayns ooashley cha row unnane erbee casley rish.
Dreill eh leigh yn er smoo syrjey, as v’eh ayns conaant rish: ayns e eill ren eh yn conaant y hickyraghey, as tra v’eh er ny phrowal, v’eh er ny gheddyn firrinagh.

Shen-y-fa ren eh shickyraghey da lesh breearrey, dy jinnagh eh bannaghey ny ashoonyn ayns e luight, as dy jinnagh eh eshyn y vishaghey myr joan ny hooirey, as soiaghey seose e luight myr ny rollageyn, as cur daue eiraght veih faarkey gys faarkey, as veih’n awin gys ardjyn sodjey magh yn ooir.
Rish Isaac ren eh niartaghey myrgeddin bannaght ooilley sheelnaue, as yn conaant: [er graih e ayr Abraham],
As hug eh er lhie er kione Yacob. Ghow eh rish ayns e vannaght, as hug eh eiraght da, as rheynn eh e chronneeyn; mastey’n daa hribe jeig ren eh ad y rheynn.
As jeh’n cluight echey v’er ny ruggey dooinney myghinagh, hooar foayr ayns shilley dy chooilley ghooinney, eer Moses, va ayns graih Jee as dooinney, yn imraa echey ta bannit.
Hug eh er dy ve casley rish ny nooghyn gloyroil, as hrog eh eh gys ard-ooashley, myr shen dy row e noidyn ayns aggle roish.
Liorish e ghoan hug eh er ny
Ren eh eshyn y chasherickey ayns e ynrickys as meenid, as eh y reih erskyn dy chooilley ghooinney.

Hug eh er dy chlashtyn e choraa, as hug eh lesh eh ayns y vodjal dorraghey, as hug eh da annaghyn kiongoyrt rish e eddin, eer leigh yn vea as tushtey, ry-hoi gynsaghey e chonaantyn da Jacob, as e vriwnyssyn da Israel.
Ren eh Aaron y hroggal seose, va ny ghooinney casherick casley rish hene, eer e vraar, jeh tribe Levi.
Conaant dy bragh farraghtyn ren eh rish, as hug eh da yn ard-saggyrtys mastey’n pobble, choamree eh eh dy aalin lesh jewellyn stoamey, as lesh y gharmad liauyr gloyroil.
Ren eh magh eh lesh ard-ooashley; as soiaghey magh eh lesh garmadyn costal, lesh breechyn, lesh y choamrey liauyr, as yn ephod.
As chombaase eh eh lesh pomegranateyn, as lesh ymmodee cluig airhey ooilley mygeayrt, myr v’eh goll, son kiaull as feiyr dy v’er ny chlashtyn ayns y chiamble, as son imraa da cloan e phobble;
Lesh garmad casherick, lesh airh, as sheeidey gorrym, as purple, obbyr yn embroiderer, lesh y breast plate dy vriwnys, as lesh
Lesh scarleod cast, jeant liorish yn obbree schleïoil, lesh claghyn costal, grainnit myr sealyn, as soit ayns airh, obbyr yn jeweller, lesh scrieu grainnit son cowrey, lurg earroo tribeyn Israel.
Hoie eh attey dy airh er y vitre, er va grainnit CASHERICKYS, yn stoamid dy ooashley, obbyr chostal, yeearree ny sooillyn, gloyroil as aalin.
Roishyn cha row rieau e lheid, chamoo ren rieau joarree erbee ’choyrt er ad, agh ynrycan e chloan, as cloan e chlienney son sheelogheyn.
Bee ny ourallyn oc dy slane baarit, daa cheayrt ’sy laa kinjagh.

Ren Moses eh y chasherickey, as ooilaghey lesh yn ooil casherick: va shoh er ny phointeil da liorish conaant dy bragh farraghtyn, as da e luight, choud’s by-veayn ny niaughyn, dy jinnagh ad shirveish er, as cooilleeney oik y taggyrt, as y pobble y vannaghey ayns e ennym.
Reih eh eshyn erskyn dy chooilley ghooinney bio, dy hebbal ourallyn gys y Chiarn, incense as soar millish, son imraa, dy yannoo lhiasaghey son e phobble.
Hug eh da e haraghyn, as pooar ayns slattyssyn dy vriwnys, dy ynsaghey e lattyssyn da Jacob, as dy hoilshaghey e leighyn da Israel.
Ren joarreeyn girree-magh n’oï, as lunee ad eh ’syn aasagh, eer ny deiney va er cheu Dathan as Abiram, as sheshaght Chore, lesh farg as eulys.
Honnick y Chiarn shoh, as v’eh jymmoosagh, as ayns e chorree eulyssagh v’ad er nyn stroie: ren eh yindyssyn orroo, dy stroie ad lesh lossey aileagh.
Agh ren eh Aaron ny s’onnoroil, as hug eh eiraght da, as rheynn eh er ny messyn-toshee dy vishaght, erskyn ooilley chiare eh arran ayns palchey.
Son d’ee ad jeh ourallyn y Chiarn, hug eh dasyn as da e luight.
Foast, ayns cheer y phobble, cha row eiraght eddyr echey, chamoo va cronney erbee echey mastey’n pobble: son ta’n Chiarn hene e chronney as e eiraght.

Yn trass er ayns gloyr ta Phinehas mac Eleazar, er-yn-oyr dy row graih jeean echey ayns aggle y Chiarn, as hass eh seose lesh slane dunnallys cree tra va’n pobble er hreigeil yn Jee oc, as ren eh lhiasaghey son Israel.
Shen-y-fa va conaant dy hee jeant rishyn, dy beagh eh yn fer syrjey ’syn ynnyd casherick, as mastey e phobble, as dy beagh echeysyn, as ec e luight, ooashley yn taggyrtys trooid nyn sheelogheyn,
Cordail rish y conaant jeant rish David mac Jesse, jeh tribe Yuda, dy beagh eiraght y ree da’n cluight echeysyn ny-lomarcan: myr shen dy beagh eiraght Aaron myrgeddin da’n cluight echeysyn.
Dy der Jee diu creenaght ayns nyn gree, dy vriwnys e phobble ayns cairys, nagh bee ny reddyn mie oc er nyn leodaghey, as dy vod yn ghloyr oc farraghtyn son dy bragh.

Va Joshua, mac Nun, feer dunnal ayns caggey, as eshyn haink lurg Moses ayns spyrryd breeoil, va, cordail rish e ennym, ny haualtagh cronnal da cloan reiht Yee, son goaill kerraghey er ny noidyn dirree seose noi oc, dy hoiaghey Israel ayns nyn eiraght.
Cre’n ghloyr onnoroil ren eh ’chosney, tra hrog eh seose e laueyn, as heeyn eh magh e chliwe noi ny ard-valjyn!
Quoi roishyn hass myr shen huggey, va yn ard-leeideilagh ayns caggaghyn y Chiarn?
Nagh row yn ghrian er ny hyndaa ec yn yeearree echeysyn? as nagh row yn laa shen corrym rish jees?
Deïe eh er y Chiarn smoo syrjey, tra haink ny noidyn chion er, er dy chooilley heu, as hug y Chiarn ooilley-niartal clashtyn da.

As lesh trimmid claghyn-sniaghtee yindyssagh huitt y caggey dewil er ny ashoonee, as ayns goll sheese [lesh Beth-horon] ren eh e noidyn y stroie, dy voddagh toiggal ve ec ny ashoonee jeh ooilley nyn niart, as dy row eh caggey ayns shilley yn Chiarn, fo leeideilys yn Ooilley-niartal.
Rish lhing Voses myrgeddin ren eh obbyr vyghinagh, eh hene as Caleb mac Jephunne, ayns dy hass ad noi yn irree-magh, as lhiett ad yn pobble veih peccah, as hug ad ny-host yn trughanys mee-chrauee.
As jeh shey cheead thousane coshee, v’ad shoh ny-neesht ynrycan er-mayrn dy leeideil yn pobble gys nyn eiraght, eer gys y cheer ta taal lesh bainney as mill.
Hug y Chiarn myrgeddin bree ayns Caleb, ren tannaghtyn mârish gys e henn eash: myr shen dy jagh eh stiagh er thalloo ard-magh ny cheerey, as hooar e luight eh son eiraght.
Dy voddagh ooilley cloan Israel cur my-ner, dy vel eh mie dy eiyrt da’n Chiarn.
As mychione ny briwnyn, dagh unnane lurg nyn ennym, yn cree oc nagh jagh er-shaghryn, ny scarrey veih’n Chiarn, lhig da’n chooinaghtyn oc ve bannit.
Lhig da ny craueyn oc blaaghey ’syn oaie, as lhig da’n ennym ooasle ocsyn tannaghtyn er nyn gloan.
Ren Samuel phadeyr y Chiarn, er va e Hiarn graihagh, reeriaght y hoiaghey seose, as princeyn y ooilaghey harrish e phobble.
Liorish leigh yn Chiarn ren eh yn pobble y vriwnys, as ren y Chiarn soiaghey jeh cloan Yacob.
Liorish e ynrickys v’eh er ny phrowal dy ve ny adeyr firrinagh, as liorish e ghoo v’eh cronnit dy ve firrinagh ayns ashlish.
Tra hion e noidyn eh er dy chooilley heu, deïe eh er y Chiarn ooilley-niartal, as heb eh yn eayn-ourallagh.
As ren y Chiarn taarnaghey veih niau: as lesh tharmane feiyral hug eh er e choraa dy v’er ny chlashtyn.
As stroie eh fir-reill ny Tyrianee, as ooilley princeyn ny Philistinee.
As roish e chadley vaaish, ren eh eh-hene y heyrey ayns shilley yn Chiarn as e er-ooilit, Cha vel mee er ghoaill cooid ghooinney erbee, wheesh as braag: as cha ren dooinney erbee eshyn y gheyrey.
As lurg e vaase ren eh phadeyrys, as hoilshee eh da’n ree cre’n erree harragh er, as hrog eh seose e choraa veih’n ooir ayns phadeyrys, dy chastey mee-chraueeaght y phobble.
As ny lurg-syn hrog seose Nathan y phadeyr rish lhing Ghavid.
Myr ta’n eeh er ny ghoaill myr reih veih’n oural dy hee, myr shen va David er ny reih ass cloan Israel.
Chloie eh rish lionyn myr rish mannanyn, as rish beishtyn-feïe myr eayin.
Nagh varr eh foawr tra nagh row eh foast agh scollag? as nagh ghow eh ersooyl yn oltooan veih’n pobble, tra hrog eh seose e laue lesh clagh ’sy sling, as hug eh fo-chosh mooaralys Gholiath?
Son deïe eh er y Chiarn smoo syrjey, as hug eh da troshid ayns e laue-yesh dy varroo yn fer-caggee niartal shen, as dy hoiaghey seose ooashley e phobble.
Myr shen dy dug y pobble da yn goo dy varr eh jeih thousaneyn, as hug ad moylley da ayns bannaghtyn y Chiarn, ayns dy dug eh da attey gloyroil.
Son stroie eh ny noidyn er dy chooilley heu, as hug eh mow nyn dranlaasee ny Philistinee, as vrish eh eairk nyn booar gys y laa t’ayn jiu.
Ayns ooilley e obbraghyn hug eh ard-voylley da’n er-casherick smoo syrjey lesh goan dy ghloyr; lesh ooilley e chree ghow eh arraneyn-moyllee, as va graih echey er e er-croo.
Ren eh arranee y hoiaghey roish yn altar, lesh nyn goraaghyn dy yannoo kiaulleeaght eunyssagh, as dagh laa dy choyrt moylley ayns nyn arraneyn.
Ren eh ny feaillaghyn oc aalin as ooasle, as ny imbaghyn casherick y hoiaghey ayns order gys y jerrey, dy choyrt moylley da’n ennym smoo casherick, as son bingys dy ve ’sy chiamble fey-ny-laa.
Ghow yn Chiarn ersooyl e pheccaghyn, as hug eh da pooar foddey-beayn: hug eh da conaant reeaghyn as stoyl-reeoil gloyroil ayns Israel.
Ny lurg-syn hrog seose mac creeney, as er y choontey echeysyn ren e reill roshtyn foddey as gerrit.

Ren Solomon reill ayns traa sheeoil, as hooar eh ooashley; son hug Jee shee da er dy chooilley heu mygeayrt-y-mysh, son caa dy hroggal thie gys e ennym, as e ynnyd-casherick y hoiaghey seose dy ve foddey beayn.
Cre cha creeney as v’ou ayns dty aegid, as lhieent lesh tushtey myr [ta’n awin] lesh thooilley!
Ren dty annym’s goaill stiagh yn slane seihll, as ren oo eh y lhieeney lesh raaghyn-dorraghey.
Hie dt’ennym’s magh foddey gys ny ellanyn; as son dty hee va graih oc ort.
V’ou yindys ny cheeraghyn son dty arraneyn-moyllee, as dty raaghyn-creeney, as raaghyn-dorraghey, as son diunid dty ynsaghey.
Liorish ennym y Chiarn Jee, ta enmyssit y Chiarn Jee Israel, ren oo airh y haglym myr stainney, as ren oo argid y vishaghey myr leoaie.
Ren oo dty veeghyn y chroymmey gys mraane, as liorish dty chorp ren oo tuittym fo ammys joarree.
Hayrn oo scammylt er dty ooashley, as oltooan er dty luight: myr shen dy dug oo lhiat jymmoose er dty chloan, as v’ou seaghnit son dty ommijys.
Myr shen va’n reeriaght er ny rheynn, as ren reeriaght mee-viallagh girree-magh veih Ephraim.

Agh cha jean myghin y Chiarn dy bragh failleil, chamoo nee veg jeh e obbraghyn cherraghtyn, chamoo ver eh naardey sluight e chloan reiht, as y sluight echeysyn ta graihagh er cha der eh mow: shen-y-fa daag eh fooilliagh da Jacob, as veihsyn fraue da David.

Myr shoh chaddil Solomon marish e ayraghyn, as jeh e luight daag eh ny lurg Rehoboam, eer ommijys y phobble, as fer gyn tushtey, ren y pobble y hyndaa ersooyl lesh e choyrle. V’ayn myrgeddin Jeroboam mac Nebat, ren Israel y hayrn fo peccah, as hug Ephraim er-shaghryn ayns drogh-raad.
As va nyn beccaghyn er nyn mishaghey erskyn-towse, dy row ad er nyn eebyrt ass y cheer.
Son deiyr ad er dy chooilley vonney dy vee-chraueeaght, derrey haink y kerraghey trome orroo.
Eisht hass seose Elias yn phadeyr myr aile, as ren e ghoo lossey myr lamp.
Hug eh lesh gortey hrome orroo, as liorish e ghraih jeean ren eh yn earroo oc y leodaghey.
Liorish goo yn Chiarn yeigh eh seose ny niaughyn, as myrgeddin hug eh lesh neose aile three keayrtyn.
O Elias, kys v’ou er ny ooashlaghey ayns dty obbraghyn mirrillagh! as casley rhyt’s quoi v’er ny ghloyraghey!
Uss, ren dooinney marroo y hroggal seose veih’n baase, as e annym veih ynnyd ny merriu, liorish goo yn er smoo syrjey:
Uss, hayrn toyrt-mow er reeaghyn, as hug sheese ard-gheiney veih nyn stuill staydoil.
Uss, cheayll oghsan y Chiarn ayns Sinai, as y vriwnys dy cherraghey ayns Horeb:
Uss, ren reeaghyn y ooilaghey dy ghoaill cooilleeney, as phadeyryn dy heet ayns oik dty yeï:
Uss, v’er dty ghoaill seose ayns geay-chassee dy aile, as ayns fainagh dy chabbil aileagh:
Uss, va er ny oardrail son oghsan ny traaghyn, dy veeinaghey jymmoose briwnys y Chiarn, veih brishey magh ayns eulys, dy hyndaa cree yn ayr lesh y vac, as dy niartaghey tribeyn Yacob.
Bannit t’adsyn honnick oo, as hooar baase ayns dty ghraih, son bee mayd ayns shickyrys bio.

She Elijah v’er ny choodaghey lesh geay-chassee: as Elisha v’er ny lhieeney lesh y spyrryd echeysyn: ayns earish e vea cha row eh ayns imnea roish prince erbee, chamoo fo ammys da dooinney dy row rieau bio.
Cha row nhee ’sy theihll er-e-skyn; as lurg e vaase ren e chorp phadeyrys.
Ren eh yindyssyn ayns e vea, as ec e vaase va e obbraghyn mirrillagh.

Son ooilley shoh cha ghow yn pobble arrys, chamoo ren ad scuirr veih nyn beccaghyn, derrey v’ad er nyn spooilley as eebrit ass nyn jeer hene, as er nyn skeayley feaï-ny-cruinney: foast va er-mayrn sluight fardalagh, as fer-reill ayns thie Ghavid:
Ren paart jeu Jee y wooiys, as paart elley hie er nyn doshiaght ayns peccaghyn.
Ren Hezekiah niartaghey e ard-valley, as hug eh lesh ushtey stiagh ’sy vean echey: chleiy eh yn chreg chreoi lesh yiarn, as ren eh chibbraghyn ushtey.
’Sy lhing echeysyn haink Sennacherib seose, as hug eh Rabshakeh er chaghteraght, as hrog eh seose e laue noi Sion, as ren eh boggyssagh dy mooaralagh.
Eisht va ny creeaghyn as ny laueyn oc er creau, as eisht v’ad ayns pian myr mraane er troailt.
Agh deïe ad er y Chiarn ta myghinagh, as heeyn ad magh nyn laueyn huggey: as chelleeragh cheayll yn er-casherick ad ass niau, as livrey eh ad liorish shirveish Isaiah.
Woaill eh sheshaght-chaggee ny Assyrianee, as ren e ainle ad y stroie.
Son va Hezekiah er n’yannoo shen ny va taitnyssagh gys y Chiarn, as v’eh niartal ayns raaidyn Ghavid e ayr, myr va Isaiah, va mooar as firrinagh ayns e ashlish, er harey da.
Rish y lhing echeysyn hie yn ghrian back, as yiall eh bea sodjey da’n ree.
Honnick eh liorish spyrryd flaunyssagh cre harragh gy-kione ec y jerrey, as ren eh adsyn y gherjaghey va dobberan ayns Sion.
Hoilshee eh cre harragh gy-kione ayns earishyn ry heet, as reddyn follit roish my haghyr ad.
Ta cooinaghtyn Yosiah myr soar millish yn perfume ta jeant liorish schleï yn photecaree: te millish myr mill ayns dagh beeal, as myr kiaull villish ec gien-feeyney.
Ren eh eh-hene y ymmyrkey dy cairagh ec chyndaa yn phobble, as ghow eh ersooyl yn eajeeys dy vee-chraueeaght.
Va e chree soit jeeragh er y Chiarn, as ayns traa ny mee-chrauee ren eh ooashley Yee y hoiaghey seose.
Er-lhimmey jeh David, as Hezekiah, as Josiah, va ooilley foiljagh: son hreig ad leigh yn er smoo syrjey, ren eer reeaghyn Yuda failleil.
Shen-y-fa hug eh yn phooar oc da feallagh elley, as y ghloyr oc da ashoon joarree.
Losht ad ard-valley reiht yn chiamble casherick, as ren ad ny straidyn y yannoo fadaneagh, cordail rish phadeyrys Yeremiah.
Son hug ad drogh-ghellal dasyn va er ny chasherickey ny adeyr ayns breïn e vayrey, dy astyrt, dy heaghney, as dy stroie; as myrgeddin dy hroggal seose, as dy phlantal.
She Ezekiel honnick yn ashlish ghloyroil, va er ny hoilshaghey da er fainagh ny cherubim.
Son ren eh gimraa er ny noidyn fo cowrey yn fliaghey, as hug eh shee dauesyn hie er y raad cair.
As jeh’n daa adeyr jeig lhig da’n imraa oc ve bannit, as lhig da ny craueyn oc blaaghey reesht ass yn oaie: son ren ad Jacob y gherjaghey, as ad y livrey liorish treishteil shickyr.
Kys ver mayd yn moylley feeu da Zorobabel? v’eh eer myr fainey er y laue-yesh.
Y lheid cheddin va Joshua mac Yosedec: ren ’sy traa ocsyn yn thie y hroggal, as chiamble casherick y hoiaghey seose gys y Chiarn, va kiarit son gloyr dy bragh farraghtyn.
As mastey’n chloan reiht va Nehemiah, hooar ennym mooar, ayns dy hrog eh seose dooin ny voallaghyn v’er duittym, as hoie eh seose ny giattyn, as ny boltyn, as hrog eh seose ny toltanyn ain ass-y-noa.
Agh er yn ooir cha row dooinney er ny chroo casley rish Enoch; son v’eh goit seose bio veih’n thalloo.
Chamoo va dooinney er ny ruggey casley rish Joseph, kiannoort er e vraaraghyn, kemmyrk da’n pobble, ny craueyn echey va soiaghey jeant jeu liorish y Chiarn.
Va Shem as Seth ayns ard-ooashley mastey deiney, as myr shen va Adam erskyn dy chooilley nhee bio v’er ny chroo ’sy theihll.
Simon yn ard-saggyrt, mac Onias, ren ayns earish e vea yn thie y choamrey reesht, as niartaghey yn chiamble.
As liorishyn v’er ny hroggal veih’n undin yn yrjid dooble, toor ard yn voalley mysh y chiamble.
’Sy lhing echeysyn va’n cistern dy ghoaill ushtey, ayns combaase myr faarkey, er ny choodaghey lesh plateyn prashey.
Ghow eh kiarail jeh’n chiamble nagh ragh eh naardey, as niartee eh yn ard-valley noi’n chaggey:
Kys v’eh er ny ooashlaghey ayns mean e phobble, tra haink eh magh ass yn ynnyd casherick!
V’eh myr rollage y voghrey mastey ny bodjallyn, as myr yn eayst ec y vullagh:
As myr y ghrian soilshean er chiamble yn er smoo syrjey, as myr y goll-twoaie coyrt soilshey ayns ny bodjallyn sollys:
As myr blaa roseyn ’syn imbagh cooie, myr lileeyn rish broogh ny hushtaghyn, as myr banglaneyn y villey-frankincense ayns traa yn touree:
Myr aile as incense ayns y censer, as myr saagh dy airh obbrit soit lesh dy chooilley horch dy chlaghyn costal:
As myr billey-olive aalin coyrt magh e vess, as myr billey-cypress ta sheeyney seose lesh ny bodjallyn.
Tra hug eh er yn coamrey dy ooashley, as dy row eh er ny choamrey lesh yn yrjid dy ghloyr, tra hie eh seose gys yn altar chasherick, ren eh yn garmad dy chasherickys y yannoo onnoroil.

Tra ghow eh ny ourallyn veih laueyn ny saggyrtyn, hass eh hene liorish chiollagh yn altar, as e vraaraghyn mygeayrt-y-mysh, myr billey aeg cedar ayns Libanus, as myr biljyn-palm chruinnee ad eh mygeayrt.
Myr shen va ooilley mec Aaron ayns nyn ghloyr, as chebballyn y Chiarn ayns nyn laueyn, kiongoyrt rish slane chaglym cloan Israel.
As coyrt jerrey er y chirveish ec yn altar, dy hoiaghey magh oural yn Ooilley-niartal smoo syrjey,
Heeyn eh magh e laue gys y chappan, as gheayrt eh jeh fuill y smeyr-feeyney; heb eh ec cass yn altar, oural dy hoar millish gys y ree smoo syrjey harrish ooilley.
Eisht dyllee mec Aaron, as heid ad ny trumpetyn argid, as hug ad er feiyr mooar dy v’er ny chlashtyn, son cooinaghtyn roish yn er smoo syrjey.
Eisht ren ooilley yn pobble siyr lesh-y-cheilley, as huitt ad sheese lesh nyn eddinyn gys y thalloo, dy chur ooashley da’n Chiarn Jee ooilley-niartal, smoo syrjey.
Ren ny fir-chiaullee myrgeddin goaill arraneyn-moyllee lesh nyn goraaghyn, lesh lane caghlaaghyn shiaull dy yannoo kiaulleeaght villish.
As ghuee yn pobble gys y Chiarn yn er smoo syrjey, liorish padjer ’syn enish echeysyn ta myghinagh, derrey va feailley-casherick y Chiarn ec kione, as v’ad er choyrt jerrey er e hirveish.
Eisht hie eh sheese, as hrog eh seose e laueyn harrish slane chaglym cloan Israel, dy chur bannaght y Chiarn lesh e veillyn, as dy ghoaill boggey ayns e ennym.
As chroym ad sheese ad hene dy choyrt ooashley yn nah cheayrt, son cosney bannaght veih’n er smoo syrjey.

Jean-jee nish er-y-fa shen yn Jee ta harrish ooilley y vannaghey, ta ny-lomarcan jannoo reddyn yindyssagh ayns dy chooilley voayl, ta bishaghey nyn laghyn veih’n vreïn, as dellal rooin cordail rish e vyghin.
Dy giall eh dooinyn gennallys cree, as dy vod shee ve ayns ny laghyn ainyn ayns Israel son dy bragh.
Dy jinnagh eh e vyghin y hickyraghey dooin, as shin y livrey ayns e hraa mie hene.
Ta daa cheint dy ashoon as ad dwoaie my chree, as y trass cha nee ashoon ad hene:
Adsyn ta goaill er slieau Samaria, as adsyn ta cummal mastey ny Philistinee, as y pobble mee-cheeayllagh shen ta cummal ayns Sichem.
Ta Yeesey mac Sirach dy Yerusalem er scrieu ’sy lioar shoh, yn ynsagh dy hoiggal as tushtey, ren ass e chree deayrtey magh creenaght.
Bannit t’eshyn ta cliaghtey eh hene ayns ny reddyn shoh, as hig eshyn dy ve creeney ta tashtey ad seose ayns e chree.

Son my nee eh ad y chooilleeney, bee eh fondagh ayns dy chooilley nhee: son ta soilshey yn Chiarn dy leeideil eh, ta coyrt creenaght da’n vooinjer chrauee. Bannit dy row yn Chiarn son dy bragh. Amen, amen.
Ver-yms booise dhyt’s, O Hiarn as Ree, as nee’m oo y voylley; O Yee my haualtagh, ta mee coyrt ard-voylley da dty ennym:

Son uss my endeilagh as my er-coonee, as t’ou er choadey my chorp veih toyrt-mow, as veih ribbey yn chengey scammyltagh, as veih ny meillyn ta cooiney breagyn, as t’ou er ve m’er-coonee noi my noidyn:

As t’ou er m’y livrey cordail rish earroo dty vyghinyn, as yrjid dt’ennym, veih ny feeacklyn ocsyn va aarloo dy my stroie, as veih laueyn nyn lheid as va shirrey lurg my vioys, as veih ny ymmodee seaghyn v’aym;
Veih plooghey aile er dy chooilley heu; as veih mean yn aile nagh ren mee y oaddey.
Veih diunid s’inshley niurin, veih chengey neu-ghlen, as veih goan brynnagh.
Liorish plaiynt gys y ree veih chengey neu-chairagh, hayrn m’annym er-gerrey eer gys baase, va my vioys er-gerrey da diunid yn oaie.
Ren ad my chruinnaghey er dy chooilley heu, as cha row dooinney erbee dy chooney lhiam: yeeagh mee son kemmyrk veih deiney, agh cha row veg.
Eisht smooinee mee er dty vyghin, O Hiarn, as er dty obbraghyn er-dyn chenn earish, kys t’ou livrey adsyn ta farkiaght ort, as sauail ad ass laueyn ny noidyn.
Eisht hrog mee seose m’accan veih’n ooir, as ghuee mee son livrey ys veih baase.
Deïe mee er y Chiarn, ayr my Hiarn, nagh vaagagh eh mee ayns laghyn my heaghyn, as ayns earish ny mooaralee, tra nagh row veg y chooney.
Nee’m dy kinjagh dty ennym y voylley, as ver-ym moylley dhyt lesh arrane dy hoyrt-booise; as myr shen va my phadjer er ny chlashtyn:
Son ren oo m’y hauail veih toyrt-mow, as m’y livrey veih’n traa gaueagh: shen-y-fa ver-ym booise dhyt, as oo y voylley, as dty ennym y vannaghey, O Hiarn.
Choud’s va mee foast aeg, as roish my jagh mee rieau magh ’sy theihll, ren mee creenaght y yeearree dy foshlit ayns my phadjer.
Ghuee mee er e son roish y chiamble, as nee’m ee y hirrey magh eer gys y jerrey.
Dy jarroo veih’n blaa, derrey va’n smeyr-feeyney appee, ta my chree er ghoaill taitnys aynjee: hie my chass jeeragh er y raad, veih m’aegid seose ren mee briaght er e son.
Chroym mee sheese my chleaysh ny veggan, as ren mee soiaghey j’ee, as hooar mee lane ynsagh.
Ren mee bishaghey ayn, shen-y-fa ver-ym yn ghloyr dasyn ta coyrt dou creenaght.
Son chiare mee dy yannoo ny lurg, as deiyr mee dy jeean er shen ny ta mie; myr shen cha bee’m er my choyrt naardey.
Ren m’annym streeu r’ee, as ayns m’obbraghyn va mee kiart: heeyn mee magh my laueyn gys niau heose, as ren mee dobberan my vee-hushtey mychione eck.
Ren mee m’annym y hoiaghey jeeragh lh’ee, as ayns glennid cree hooar mee ee: ta my chree er ve sniemmit r’ee er-dyn toshiaght, shen-y-fa cha bee’m er my hreigeil.
Va my chree seaghnit ayns shirrey er e son: shen-y-fa ta mee er gheddyn eiraght vie.
Ta’n Chiarn er choyrt chengey dou son my leagh, as lesh shen nee’m eh y voylley.
Tayrn-jee er-gerrey dou, shiuish neu-ynsit, as jean-jee cummal ’sy thie ynsee.
Cre’n-fa ta shiu moal, as cre ta shiu gra mychione ny reddyn shoh, fakin dy vel nyn anmeenyn feer phaagh?
Doshil mee my veeal, as dooyrt mee, Kionnee-jee diu hene ee gyn argid.
Cur-jee nyn mwannal fo’n whing, as lhig da nyn annym goaill ynsagh; er-gerrey dy laue t’ee ry-gheddyn.
Cur-jee my-ner lesh nyn sooillyn, kys nagh vel mee er ghoaill mooarane deinys, as ta mee er gheddyn dou hene lane fea.
Fow-jee ynsagh lesh sym mooar dy argid, as jean-jee lane airh y chosney lioree.
Lhig da nyn annym boggey ’ghoaill ayns e vyghin, as lhig dyn nearey ve erriu dy chur moylley dasyn.
Jean-jee nyn obbyr ayns traa, as ’syn imbagh cooie ver eh diu nyn leagh.
YN JERREY.
